column11: 0.015#TD4039E.TXT.r#1832239#1832239#TD4039E.TXT.r_2145# des ni 'jig rten 'di dang 'jig rten pha rol yang nyid kyi mngon par shes pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs  rgyas so zhes bya ba nas rgyas par sbyar ro // /

column13: 0.024#TD4039E.TXT.r#1828597#1828597#TD4039E.TXT.r_1691# de la  de bzhin gshegs pa ni slob dpon med par byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa ba bdun bsgoms nas nyid kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la de ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang gzhan gyi don ma lus pa las brtsams te tshe 'di nyid la skal pa yod pa gang yin pa rnams dang   skal pa med pa gang yin pa rnams dang  chos mthong ba gang yin pa rnams dang  chos ma mthong ba gang yin pa rnams de dag gi rnam pa thams cad mngon par mkhyen to // /
column14: 0.024#TD4054E.TXT.r#1018763#1018763#TD4054E.TXT.r_4653# rgyu'i nges pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'bras bu'i rgyun 'gyur ba'i phyir de mi bya bar bzlog par ni sangs  rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang mdzad par mi byed do // /

column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520422#520425#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9191;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9192# yang de nyid las gzhan pa'i phung po dang  skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang  zas dang bden pa dang  khams dang  dran pa  nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong pa dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag rnams kyis so so la de bzhin nyid dang  don dam pa dang  chos bdag med pa nyid yongs su tshol bar    mi byed kyi zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa kun du khyab pa'i don rnam pa gsum las brtsams nas / /

column5: 0.016#TD4019E.TXT.r#2481895#2481895#TD4019E.TXT.r_9719# de la 'dir byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis sgyu ma lta bu'i gzhan dbang so sor rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan nyid kyang / /
column6: 0.018#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#522308#522308#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9460# tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang pos ni sangs rgyas kyis mtshungs par gsungs pas ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bsngags pa brjod pa'o // /

column3: de las gzhan dang gzhan med shin tu zab cing rjes song phyir // /

column5: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#545238#545238#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12436# yul 'di la dmigs pa'i dbang gis sems rnam par dag pa thob pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no // /

column3: ji skad bshad bzhin don min bcom ldan dgongs pa shin tu zab // /

column5: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257657#257657#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5431;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5432# de la don dam pa'i mtshan nyid ni de bzhin nyid  rnam pa bdun bstan pa yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni gnyis pa don dam pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa ste / / +bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa las ji skad du / /
column6: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#457584#457584#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_1014;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_1015# thams cad yod par smra ba'i mdzod kyi bstan bcos las rnam pa gsum du bshad de / / +de'i phyir tshig le'ur byas pa las / /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520163#520172#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9164;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9165;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9166;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9167;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9168# zhes 'byung ste / / +'di nyid kyi 'grel pa las / / +don dam pa'i bden pa ni gcig pa dang  tha dad pa nyid dang bral ba'i phyir rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa yin par rig par bya'o // /

column3: de las chos thob de yod de las blo gros rab tu  skye // /

column5: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#545237#545237#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12435;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12436# de ci'i phyir zhe na / / +yul 'di la dmigs pa'i dbang gis sems rnam par dag pa thob pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no // /

column3: gang tshe de ni so so rang rig med na ji ltar nges // /
bdag gis mi shes sangs rgyas zab mo mkhyen ma yin // / +zab mo ci yi phyir na rtog ge'i yul ma yin // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520188#520198#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9170;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9171;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9172# mdo las sngar gong du tshig 'di lta bu gsungs pa med na / /

column3: ci phyir zab mo'i don rig pa dag thar 'gyur zhes // / +bya ba de ni skrag pa'i gnas su rigs  ma yin // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520197#520207#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9171;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9172;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9173# ci'i phyir yongs su bstan zhes gsungs / / +mdo sde shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang  mdo sde tshad med pa rnams las de bzhin nyid gsungs so // /

column3: dman par mos shing khams kyang shin tu dman // / +grogs po dman pa dag gis yongs bskor ba // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520208#520220#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9173# ngas skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang   zas dang  bden pa dang  khams dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag thams cad la / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520394#520405#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9191# yang de nyid las gzhan pa'i phung po dang  skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang  zas dang bden pa dang  khams dang  dran pa  nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong pa dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag rnams kyis so so la de bzhin nyid dang  don dam pa dang  chos bdag med pa nyid yongs su tshol bar    mi byed kyi zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa kun du khyab pa'i don rnam pa gsum las brtsams nas / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521326#521338#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9331# rab 'byor ji ltar phung po de dag phan tshun tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa dang  ji ltar skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang  zas dang  bden pa dang  khams dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag de dag phan tshun tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa de bzhin du zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni  gsum pa skyon rnam pa gsum dang bral bas ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par bshad pa ston to // /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2328111#2328115#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2079# 'phags pa'i bden pa la ji lta ba bzhin du dran ba nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang     rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag rnams la yang de bzhin du rgya cher bshad par bgyi lags so zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa byang chub kyi phyogs las brtsams nas ngo bo nyid med par gsungs pas khong  du chud par bstan pa'o // /
column8: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175292#175296#TD4035E.TXT.r_8903;TD4035E.TXT.r_8904# 'du shes dang tshor  ba 'gog pa'i bar dang  byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun te / / +dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag rnams dang  dge sbyong  gi 'bras bu bzhi ste / /
column9: 0.0#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2790234#2790240#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_12376# mngon par rtogs pa'i shes pa bden pa mngon par rtogs pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos kyi rab tu dbye bas rnam pa du ma yod do // /
column10: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3093599#3093602#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_104# gzugs rgyu mtshan dang  sems rgyu mtshan dang  sems las byung ba rgyu  mtshan dang  sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa rgyu mtshan dang  'dus ma byas rgyu mtshan dang  'dus byas rgyu mtshan dang  phung po rgyu mtshan dang  skye mched rgyu mtshan dang  khams rgyu mtshan dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rgyu mtshan dang  gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rgyu  mtshan dang  dbang po rgyu mtshan dang  bden pa rgyu mtshan dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rgyu mtshan dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag rgyu mtshan dang  lam rgyu    mtshan dang  chos kyi gzhi rgyu mtshan dang  zhi gnas rgyu mtshan dang  lhag mthong rgyu mtshan dang  rab tu 'dzin pa rgyu mtshan dang  btang snyoms rgyu mtshan dang  rkyen rgyu mtshan dang  ston pa rgyu mtshan dang  sa rgyu mtshan dang  chu rgyu mtshan dang  me rgyu mtshan dang  rlung  rgyu mtshan dang  nam mkha' rgyu mtshan dang  rnam par shes pa rgyu mtshan dang  'jig rten 'di rgyu mtshan dang  'jig rten pha rol rgyu mtshan dang  nyi ma rgyu mtshan dang  zla ba rgyu mtshan dang  sems can dmyal ba rgyu mtshan dang  dud 'gro dang  yi dvags dang  lha dang   mi rgyu mtshan dang  rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i rgyu mtshan dang  sum cu rtsa gsum dang  'thab bral dang  dga' ldan dang  'phrul dga' dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rgyu mtshan dang  bsam gtan dang po rgyu mtshan dang  bsam gtan gnyis pa dang  gsum pa dang  bzhi pa rgyu mtshan dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rgyu mtshan dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rgyu mtshan dang  'byung ba rgyu mtshan dang  'jig pa rgyu  mtshan dang  dngos po rgyu mtshan dang  dngos po med pa rgyu mtshan dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa rgyu mtshan dang  rnam par byang ba rgyu mtshan dang  mthong ba dang  thos pa dang  bye brag phyed pa dang  rnam par shes pa dang  thos pa dang  yongs su btsal ba rgyu mtshan  dang ; /
column11: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3108945#3108953#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2426;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2427# rab 'byor phung po rnams la rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni ngas don dam  pa yin par yongs su bstan cing rab 'byor skye mched rnams dang  rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang  zas rnams dang  bden pa rnams dang  khams rnams dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang      // /
column12: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3109019#3109027#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2437# yang de las gzhan pa'i phung po rnams dang  khams rnams dang  skye mched rnams dang  rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang  zas rnams dang  bden pa rnams dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang  yang dag pa'i  spong ba rnams dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang  dbang po rnams dang  stobs rnams dang  byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so so dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa so so la de bzhin nyid don dam pa chos bdag med pa yongs su tshol bar mi byed kyi / /
column13: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3109074#3109078#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2441# rab 'byor gzhan yang ji ltar phung po dang  skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang  zas dang  bden pa dang  khams dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi    rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag 'di dag phan tshun mtshan nyid tha dad pa dang  ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa phan tshun mtshan nyid tha dad pa yin pa de bzhin du / /
column14: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3113022#3113027#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3055# bden pa rnams la ji lta ba de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa    rnams dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang  dbang po rnams dang  stobs rnams dang  byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang  lam gyi yan lag rnams kyi yan lag re re la yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi lags so // /
column15: 0.014#TD4035E.TXT.r#187286#187290#TD4035E.TXT.r_10654# mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyang mi sdug pa'i 'bras bu mngon par 'grub pa la de de dang 'dra ba dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang  yang dag par spong ba  rnams dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang  dbang po rnams dang  stobs rnams dang  byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang  lam gyi yan lag byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams ni byang chub thob par bya ba la bya ba bsgrub pa'i spyi'i mtshan nyid kyis spyi'i mtshan nyid rnams  so // /
column16: 0.014#TD4036E.TXT.r#18377#18381#TD4036E.TXT.r_2669;TD4036E.TXT.r_2670# bcom ldan 'das kyis de dang de dag tu gdul ba de dang de dag dang gdul ba'i spyod pa rnams las brtsams  nas phung po dang ldan pa'i gtam dang  skye mched dang ldan pa dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang ldan pa dang  zas dang  bden pa dang  khams dang ldan pa dang  nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang      // / +yang dag par spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag dang ldan pa dang  mi sdug pa dang  dbugs rngub pa dang  dbugs 'byung ba dang  bslab pa dang / /
column17: 0.014#TD4039E.TXT.r#1815504#1815507#TD4039E.TXT.r_20# de dang der 'dul ba la gzigs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa dang  de'i 'og tu yang dag par sdud par byed pa rnams kyis bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa sbyar bar ci rigs par go  rims su phab ste gtam du sbyar ba dang  de bzhin du zas dang bden pa dang  khams dang tshor ba dang ldan pa dang  nyan thos dang  de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa dang ldan pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag par spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa  dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag dang  dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba dran pa dang  bslab pa rnams dang  shes nas dad pa dang ldan pa dang  'khor brgyad kyi dbang du byas nas 'khor dang ldan pa'o // /
column18: 0.014#TD4039E.TXT.r#1880486#1880490#TD4039E.TXT.r_7676;TD4039E.TXT.r_7677# byed pas sgo drug nas dge ba la brten te / / +dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag par spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag rnams so // /
column19: 0.020#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3110725#3110726#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2685# dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang  dbang po rnams dang  stobs rnams dang  byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi yang bka' stsal / /
column20: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543707#543707#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12245# dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi yang de bzhin du bka'  stsal zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa zlas sgo gzhan lnga po dag bstan pa'o // /
column21: 0.027#TD4031E.TXT.r#2960322#2960322#TD4031E.TXT.r_229# ngo tsha'i rnam par dbye ba dang  brtan pa dang  mi skyo ba dang  bstan bcos shes pa dang  'jig rten shes pa dang  rton pa dang  so  so yang dag par rig pa dang  tshogs gnyis dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag par spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  'phags pa'i lam dang  zhi gnas dang  lhag mthong dang  thabs la  mkhas pa dang  gzungs dang  smon lam dang  ting nge 'dzin dang  chos kyi sdom dang  de'i skad cig ma dang  bdag med pa dang  ngo tsha la sogs pa'i las mdor bsdus pa bstan pa'o // /

column3: zab cing rgya che legs par bshad pa'i chos // / +'di la gal te mos med grub pa yin // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520217#520228#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9173;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9174# ngas skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang   zas dang  bden pa dang  khams dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag thams cad la / /
column5: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519992#519992#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9138# rab 'byor ngas ni phung po thams cad la rnam par dag  pa'i dmigs pa gang yin pa'i don dam pa'i bden pa yin par yongs su bstan zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa rgya cher rnam par bshad pa bstan to // /

column3: thos rjes 'brangs te blo ldan thob nas ni //// / +gang zhig thos la rab tu gnas byed pa // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520229#520242#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9174;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9175;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9176# rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa gang  yin pa de ni don dam pa'i bden pa yin par yongs su bstan to zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa zlas skye mched la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pa dmigs pa don dam pa'i bden pa yin par rnam par bshad pa ste / /

column3: rnam pa sna tshogs dpag tu med lus la // / +rmongs pa gang gi phyir na nges par byed // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520241#520250#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9174;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9175;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9176;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9177;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9178# rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa gang  yin pa de ni don dam pa'i bden pa yin par yongs su bstan to zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa zlas skye mched la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pa dmigs pa don dam pa'i bden pa yin par rnam par bshad pa ste / / +de ci'i phyir zhe na / /

column3: don sgra ji bzhin yongs rtog na // / +bdag nyid snyems shing blo nyams 'gyur // /

column5: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2355381#2355381#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5194# 'dres pa tshad med pa'i chos la dmigs pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong zhes kyang gsungs na zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa 'dres pa'i chos la dmigs pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // /
column6: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397588#2397588#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10267# rigs kyi bu sa de dag ni rnam par dag pa bzhi dang yan lag bcu gcig gis bsdus par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column7: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#509348#509348#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7831# 'du byed rnams kyi bdag med pa tsam dang  ngo bo nyid med pa tsam gyis rab tu phye ba gang yin pa de don dam pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin par gyur na zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni / /
column8: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#548500#548500#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12783# ji lta ji ltar mngon  par zhen pa de lta de ltar gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid dang yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid la kun brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par zhen pa zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa mngon par zhen pa'i dbang gis 'khor ba'i chos can du gyur bar bstan to // /
column9: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2311921#2311921#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_129# gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid la kun brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mngon par zhen par mi byed de zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa sa la gnas pa'i gnas skabs rnam pa gnyis kyi phan yon zhes bya  ba ston to // /
column10: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#230991#230991#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2175# bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'dres pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa zhus pa dang  lan dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'dres pa'i chos rnam par 'byed pa ston to // /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520271#520278#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9180;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9181;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9182# pa'i mtshan nyid ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / / +phung po rnams las brtsams nas ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa dang  zlas skye mched la sogs pa'i ro gcig ba'i mtshan nyid rnam bar bshad pa'o // /

column3: theg pa  chen po mdo sde'i rgyan las theg pa chen po sgrub pa'i skabs kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o //// /

column5: 1.192#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520017#520018#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9142# rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa las brtsams nas ro gcig gi mtshan nyid bstan pa dang  rab 'byor dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa zhes bya ba man chad kyis khyab pa'i don rnam pa gsum las brtsams nas ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa dang  rab 'byor ji  ltar phung po de dag gis zhes bya ba man chad kyis skyon rnam pa gsum dang bral bar ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par bshad pa'o // /

column3: kun du 'gro dang khas len rtogs dang zil gnon par // / +dbye ba'i rang bzhin don rnam bzhi yi khyad par gyis // /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520322#520332#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9187# lam gyi yan lag gi bar thams cad la yang ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid dang  tha dad pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa zlas skye mched la sogs pa'i ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par  bshad pa'o // /

column3: de ni bskal pa stong phrag du mar bsgrub par dka' // / +gang phyir grub na sems can phan byed don che ste // /

column3: gang zhig rnam sangs rgyas nas sangs rgyas kun mnyam 'gyur // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520209#520215#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9173# ngas skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang   zas dang  bden pa dang  khams dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag thams cad la / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520391#520400#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9191# yang de nyid las gzhan pa'i phung po dang  skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang  zas dang bden pa dang  khams dang  dran pa  nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong pa dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag rnams kyis so so la de bzhin nyid dang  don dam pa dang  chos bdag med pa nyid yongs su tshol bar    mi byed kyi zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa kun du khyab pa'i don rnam pa gsum las brtsams nas / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521326#521333#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9331# rab 'byor ji ltar phung po de dag phan tshun tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa dang  ji ltar skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang  zas dang  bden pa dang  khams dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag de dag phan tshun tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa de bzhin du zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni  gsum pa skyon rnam pa gsum dang bral bas ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par bshad pa ston to // /
column7: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3108945#3108953#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2426;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2427# rab 'byor phung po rnams la rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni ngas don dam  pa yin par yongs su bstan cing rab 'byor skye mched rnams dang  rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang  zas rnams dang  bden pa rnams dang  khams rnams dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang      // /
column8: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3109072#3109077#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2441# rab 'byor gzhan yang ji ltar phung po dang  skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang  zas dang  bden pa dang  khams dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi    rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag 'di dag phan tshun mtshan nyid tha dad pa dang  ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa phan tshun mtshan nyid tha dad pa yin pa de bzhin du / /
column9: 0.0#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1598984#1598984#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_757# phung po dang  skye mched dang  khams dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang  bden pa dang  zas dang  bsam gtan dang  tshad med pa dang  gzugs med pa dang  rnam  par thar pa dang  zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang  zad par gyi skye mched dang  byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa dang  mngon par shes pa dang  so so yang dag par rig pa dang  smon nas shes pa dang  nyon mongs pa med pa la sogs pa'i gtam rgyud re re ni chos kyi  phung po'o zhes zer ro // /
column10: 0.0#TD4091E.TXT.r#697577#697577#TD4091E.TXT.r_472# phung po dang  khams dang  skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang  bden pa dang  zas dang  bsam gtan  dang  tshad med pa dang  gzugs med pa dang  rnam par thar pa dang  zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang  zad par gyi skye mched dang  byang chub kyi phyogs dang  mngon par shes pa dang  so so yang dag par rig pa dang  smon nas shes pa dang  nyon mongs pa med pa rnams kyi bshad pa  re re ni chos kyi phung po'o zhes zer ro // /
column11: 0.020#TD4050E.TXT.r#1097877#1097877#TD4050E.TXT.r_96# chos ni phung po dang  skye mched dang  khams dang  rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang  zas dang  bsam gtan  dang ; /

column3: blo ldan de ni khas len mchog tu shes par bya // / +sangs rgyas sras kyi mchog tu legs  par gang skyes pa // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520401#520414#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9191# yang de nyid las gzhan pa'i phung po dang  skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang  zas dang bden pa dang  khams dang  dran pa  nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong pa dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag rnams kyis so so la de bzhin nyid dang  don dam pa dang  chos bdag med pa nyid yongs su tshol bar    mi byed kyi zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa kun du khyab pa'i don rnam pa gsum las brtsams nas / /
column5: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543707#543707#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12245# dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi yang de bzhin du bka'  stsal zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa zlas sgo gzhan lnga po dag bstan pa'o // /

column3: sems dang shes rab dang ni tshogs ldan snying rje ni // / +sa bon ma dang mngal gnas ma ma mtshungs pa med // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520032#520034#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9142# rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa las brtsams nas ro gcig gi mtshan nyid bstan pa dang  rab 'byor dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa zhes bya ba man chad kyis khyab pa'i don rnam pa gsum las brtsams nas ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa dang  rab 'byor ji  ltar phung po de dag gis zhes bya ba man chad kyis skyon rnam pa gsum dang bral bar ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par bshad pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520415#520425#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9191;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9192# yang de nyid las gzhan pa'i phung po dang  skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang  zas dang bden pa dang  khams dang  dran pa  nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong pa dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag rnams kyis so so la de bzhin nyid dang  don dam pa dang  chos bdag med pa nyid yongs su tshol bar    mi byed kyi zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa kun du khyab pa'i don rnam pa gsum las brtsams nas / /

column6: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520033#520034#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9142# rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa las brtsams nas ro gcig gi mtshan nyid bstan pa dang  rab 'byor dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa zhes bya ba man chad kyis khyab pa'i don rnam pa gsum las brtsams nas ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa dang  rab 'byor ji  ltar phung po de dag gis zhes bya ba man chad kyis skyon rnam pa gsum dang bral bar ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par bshad pa'o // /

column3: sems can thams    cad smin par byed stobs thob // / +sangs rgyas bde chen mtha' yas zhi ba rnyed // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520445#520454#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9195;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9196;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9197;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9198# gsum po 'di dag phung po la sogs pa'i chos la khyab pa'i phyir gsum po 'di dag la ro gcig pa zhes bstan to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273362#273366#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7461;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7462;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7463;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7464# gnyis po de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu ba'o // /
column6: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233334#233336#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2466;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2467;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2468;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2469# byang chub sems dpa' gang gis brtson 'grus mnyam pa nyid rang  tu shes pa zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa brtson 'grus kyi mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun bstan to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu ba'o // /
column7: 0.014#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2354824#2354826#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5118;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5119;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5120# gcig tu bzlum pa dang  gcig tu bsdu ba dang  gcig tu brtul ba dang  phung po gcig tu byas nas 'di snyam du yid la byed do zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa  'dres pa la dmigs pa ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te rnam par bshad pa dang mjug bsdu ba'o // /
column8: 0.014#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248771#248773#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4410;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4411;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4412;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4413# sbyin gnas chen por grags pa'i khyim du zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu ba'o // /
column9: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#232736#232736#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2387;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2388;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2389# byang chub sems dpa' gang gis bdag nyid kyi las kyi rnam par smin  pa'i 'bras bu la shin tu mngon par yid ches pa la brten pas gnod pa thams cad nye bar gnas pa nang 'khrug pa mi bskyed pa zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa bzod pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun bstan to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +rnam par bshad pa dang mjug bsdu ba'o // /
column10: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2370169#2370169#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7055;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7056;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7057# bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas lan du yang dag par gsungs pa'o // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu ba'o // /
column11: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225360#225360#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1473# 'di yang rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug  bsdu bas bstan te / /

column7: 0.012#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238924#238925#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3204;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3205# 'di yang rnam pa gsum ste / / +bzlog pa'i rnam par bshad pa dang   rjes su mthun pa'i rnam par bshad pa dang  rgol ba'i lan bstan pa'o // /
column8: 0.014#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2370169#2370169#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7055;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7056;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7057# bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas lan du yang dag par gsungs pa'o // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu ba'o // /
column9: 0.022#TD4069E.TXT.r#679461#679461#TD4069E.TXT.r_7973;TD4069E.TXT.r_7974# mdo sde'i bshad pa'i shan 'di ni mdo sde'i BSHAD PA STE / / +rnam par bshad pa ni mdo sde'i bshad pa'o // /
column10: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241038#241038#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3482;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3483# las yongs su 'dzin pa'i  rnam par bshad pa yin no // / +yang na bdag po'i dbang du byas pa'i rnam par bshad pa yin te / /
column11: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#268290#268292#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6827;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6828;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6829;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6830# tshig rkyang pas bstan pa dang  tshigs su bcad pas bzlas te bstan pa'o // / +dang po  yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +rnam par bshad pa dang mjug bsdu ba'o // /
column12: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2320177#2320177#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1095;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1096;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1097# bdag nyid la smad pa'i dbang gis rtogs par mi 'gyur bar bstan pa dang  ma rtogs pa'i phyir yang bsod nams dang ye shes la brten par bstan pa'o // / +dang po yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu ba'o // /
column13: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520057#520057#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9143;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9144;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9145# de la dang po yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu ba'o // / +rnam par bshad pa yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / /

column3: de ni chos la dbang ba kun dang yang dag ldan // / +sangs  rgyas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ston pa'i rnam pa shes // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520467#520477#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9200;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9201;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9202# 'di ni dang po'o / / +'di ltar don dam pa'i bden pa ni don rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pas / /
column5: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2367715#2367715#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6732# 'phags pa shes rab  kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo las ni ming bcu gcig ston par mdzad de / /

column3: bslab pa bca' pas tshar gcod phan 'dogs byed la brtson // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520478#520487#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9202;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9203;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9204# 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo las ni ming bcu gnyis gsungs te / / +'di lta ste / /
column5: 2.384#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2367725#2367730#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6733;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6734# 'di lta ste / / +chos kyi dbyings dang  chos nyid dang  yang dag pa nyid dang  mi 'gyur ba nyid dang  mnyam pa nyid dang  skyon med pa nyid dang  chos nges pa nyid dang  chos gnas pa nyid dang  yang dag pa'i mtha' dang  nam  mkha'i khams dang  bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i khams so zhes gsungs so // /

column3: blon po chen po lta bur pha rol phyin la 'jug pa'i phyir // / +byang chub chen po'i phyogs mthun bdal la rtag tu spyan byed phyir // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520486#520507#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9204;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9205;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9206# de bzhin nyid dang  chos kyi dbyings  dang  chos nyid dang  yang dag pa nyid dang  rnam par mi 'gyur ba nyid dang  mnyam pa nyid dang  skyon med pa nyid dang  chos nges pa nyid dang  chos gnas pa nyid dang  yang dag pa'i mtha' dang  nam mkha'i khams dang  bsam gyis mi khyab  pa'i dbyings so // /

column3: gsang  ba'i gnas ni rnam gsum rtag tu yang dag 'dzin pa'i phyir // / +sems can mang don rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rab byed phyir // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520424#520425#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9191;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9192# yang de nyid las gzhan pa'i phung po dang  skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang  zas dang bden pa dang  khams dang  dran pa  nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong pa dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag rnams kyis so so la de bzhin nyid dang  don dam pa dang  chos bdag med pa nyid yongs su tshol bar    mi byed kyi zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa kun du khyab pa'i don rnam pa gsum las brtsams nas / / +ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa yin te / /
column5: 1.192#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520033#520034#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9142# rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa las brtsams nas ro gcig gi mtshan nyid bstan pa dang  rab 'byor dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa zhes bya ba man chad kyis khyab pa'i don rnam pa gsum las brtsams nas ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa dang  rab 'byor ji  ltar phung po de dag gis zhes bya ba man chad kyis skyon rnam pa gsum dang bral bar ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par bshad pa'o // /

column3: bsod nams phung chen srid gsum bla ma srid pa'i bde ba dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520516#520533#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9206;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9207;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9208;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9209;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9210# 'dir re zhig don rnam pa gsum las brtsams nas ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa yin te / / +de la de bzhin nyid ces bya ba ni rnam par rig pa  tsam du grub pa'i bstan bcos las ji skad du / /
column5: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2367491#2367493#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6691;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6692# de la de bzhin nyid  ces bya ba ni / / +bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ji skad du de bzhin nyid ces bya ba ni de kho na nyid de / /

column3: sdug bsngal phung po chen po rab zhi blo mchog bde ba dang / /
chos mang phung po mchog rab rtag pa'i sku ste dge ba'i tshogs // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520534#520543#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9208;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9209;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9210;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9211;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9212# de bzhin zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa nyid de mi bden pa ma yin par bstan to // / +nyid ces bya ba ni rtag pa nyid de / / +rnam par 'gyur ba med par rab tu bstan to // /

column3: bag chags bzlog cing srid dang zhi las rnam par grol bar 'thob // / +blo ldan nyan thos tshogs bcas dge ba rgya chen don chen dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520542#520559#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9211;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9212;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9213;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9214# 'di ltar yang dag pa nyid de / / +gnas skabs thams cad du  rtag par de kho na bzhin pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya ba ste / /

column3: mtha' yas rtag rgyun mi 'chad zad mi shes pas zil gyis gnon // /

column3: dge ba de yang 'jig rten 'jig rten ma yin yongs smin byed // / +dbang 'byor rnyed pa de ni phung po zhi bas zad mi shes // /

column3: 'di ni de dngos 'dod pas khas len de yang snying brtse las rig bya // /

column3: de las rnam pa kun mkhyen phan dang bde byed dka' la skyo ba med // /

column3: nges par 'byung la theg pa kun gyis rton pa'i yon tan rtag tu ldan // /

column5: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2367530#2367530#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6698# gzhan yang de nyid las don nyid brdzun pa dang  phyin ci log ma yin pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: brda dang chos nyid thob pa blo ldan rnams kyi skyabs 'gro 'di mchog yin // /

column3: skyabs su 'gro ba 'dir song don chen te // / +de ni dpag med yon tan tshogs 'phel 'gyur // /

column3: 'gro ba 'di  la snying rje'i bsam pas khyab // / +mtshungs med 'phags chen chos kyang rgyas par byed // /

column5: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#545137#545137#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12417;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12418# don dam pa ngo bo nyid med pa nyid ces kyang bya ste / / +de'i phyir bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las / /

column3: theg pa chen po mdo sde'i rgyan las skyabs su 'gro ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o //// /

column3: yod dang mchog dang mtshan nyid dang / / +rtags dang rigs rab dbye ba     // / +nyes dmigs dang ni phan yon dang / /

column5: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257689#257689#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5438;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5439# rgyu dang rkyen gang gi phyir de bzhin nyid rnam pa bdun la / / +don dam pa'i bden pa zhes bya zhe na / /

column3: dpe rnams gnyis te rnam pa bzhi // / +khams rnams dang ni mos pa dang / / +sgrub pa tha dad dbye ba dang / /
column4: 0.015#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257704#257708#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5443;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5444# 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes dang  rjes las thob pa'i 'jig rten pa'i ye shes te / / +don dam pa 'di la spros pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes pa gzhan gyi spyod yul ma yin no // /

column3: 'bras bu tha dad dmigs pa'i phyir // / +rigs yod nyid du nges par brjod // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520669#520682#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9233;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9234;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9235# 'jig rten  las 'das pa'i ye shes dang  rjes las thob pa'i 'jig rten pa'i ye shes so // / +don dam pa 'di spros pa med pa'i phyir ye shes gzhan gyi yul ma yin no // /
column5: 0.028#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#875778#875778#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_17611# rten pa mtshungs pa phan tshun ltos pa rnams ni reg pa'i tshogs smos pas smos pa'i    phyir na de don gzhan gyi dngos po ma yin yang / /

column3: de dge  khyad par 'phags pa dang / / +thams cad dang ni don chen dang / / +mi zad pa yi rgyu mtshan phyir // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520681#520697#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9234;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9235;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9236;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9237;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9238# don dam pa 'di spros pa med pa'i phyir ye shes gzhan gyi yul ma yin no // / +de las gzhan pa'i don rnams ni bden pa gnyis bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin no // /
column5: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2366807#2366807#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6602# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni bden pa gnyis bstan pa las 'byung ba bzhin  du rig par bya'o // /

column3: rigs mchog nyid ces brjod pa yin // / +rang bzhin dang ni rgyas pa dang / / +de ni rten dang brten pa dang / / +yod med nyid dang yon tan ni // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520691#520701#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9236;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9237;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9238# de la chos bdag  med pa nyid ces bya ba ni / / +bstan bcos mngon pa kun las btus pa las / /
column5: 0.021#TD4066E.TXT.r#2120059#2120060#TD4066E.TXT.r_2555;TD4066E.TXT.r_2556# chos mngon pa kun las btus pa las ji skad du / / +rjes su dran pa'i rnam par rtog pa gang zhe na / /
column6: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520874#520874#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9267;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9268# bstan bcos mngon pa kun las btus pa las / / +stong pa'i mtshan nyid gang zhe na / /

column3: sgrol ba'i don du shes  par bya // / +sbyor ba'i sngon du snying rje dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520702#520710#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9238;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9239;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9240# ji skad du bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid gang zhe na / / +'di lta ste / /
column5: 0.013#TD4049E.TXT.r#2297314#2297326#TD4049E.TXT.r_1764;TD4049E.TXT.r_1765;TD4049E.TXT.r_1766;TD4049E.TXT.r_1767;TD4049E.TXT.r_1768# bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid gang zhe na / / +ji ltar bdag tu smra ba rnams kyis bdag tu btags pa'i mtshan nyid des / /

column3: mos pa dang ni bzod pa dang / / +dge ba yang dag spyod pa ni // / +rigs kyi rtags su nges par bshad // / +rigs ni nges dang ma nges dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520709#520727#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9240;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9241;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9242# ji ltar bdag tu smra ba rnams kyis bdag tu brtags pa'i mtshan nyid ltar phung po dang  khams dang  skye mched ni mtshan nyid  de ma yin pa des ni phung po dang  khams dang  skye mched la bdag gi mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir / /
column5: 0.001#TD4010E.TXT.r#2278656#2278657#TD4010E.TXT.r_6124;TD4010E.TXT.r_6125# gang  gi phyir ming dang brdas rnam par gzhag pa'i mtshan nyid de ni rang gi mtshan nyid ma yin te / / +phung po dang  khams dang  skye mched la sogs pa 'dus byas dang  'dus ma byas dang  rang gi mtshan nyid dang  spyi'i mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir mtshan nyid ngo bo nyid med pa zhes brjod do // /
column6: 0.014#TD4054E.TXT.r#1009861#1009865#TD4054E.TXT.r_3185;TD4054E.TXT.r_3186;TD4054E.TXT.r_3187# mtshan nyid kyis bsdus pa dang  khams kyis bsdus pa dang  rigs kyis bsdus pa dang  gnas skabs kyis bsdus pa dang  grogs kyis bsdus pa dang  phyogs kyis bsdus pa dang  dus kyis bsdus pa dang   phyogs gcig gis bsdus pa dang  mtha' dag gis bsdus pa dang  gcig gis gcig bsdus pa dang  don dam pas bsdus pa'o // / +mtshan nyid kyis bsdus pa gang / / +phung po dang  khams dang  skye mched rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid des de dag nyid bsdus par rig par bya'o // /
column7: 0.014#TD4054E.TXT.r#1012107#1012108#TD4054E.TXT.r_3543;TD4054E.TXT.r_3544# 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid dang  bral ba'i mtshan nyid dang  nye ba'i mtshan nyid dang  chos kyi mtshan nyid dang  skad cig gi mtshan nyid dang  rgyun gyi mtshan nyid dang  nad la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang  sems sna tshogs kyi rnam par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid dang  longs spyod phun  sum tshogs pa rgud pa'i mtshan nyid dang  snod 'jig pa dang chags pa'i mtshan nyid do // / +med pa'i mtshan nyid gang phung po dang  khams dang  skye mched rnams la bdag dang bdag gi dus rtag tu med pa'o // /
column8: 0.029#TD4049E.TXT.r#2295359#2295359#TD4049E.TXT.r_1462# phung po dang khams dang  skye mched rnams kyi so so'i rang gi mtshan nyid gang yin pa dag nyid kyis de dag bsdus par blta'o // /

column3: rkyen rnams kyis ni mi 'phrogs dang / / +'phrogs pa nyid de mdor na rigs // / +dbye ba 'di ni rnam pa bzhi // /

column5: 0.028#TD4054E.TXT.r#1012107#1012107#TD4054E.TXT.r_3543;TD4054E.TXT.r_3544# 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid dang  bral ba'i mtshan nyid dang  nye ba'i mtshan nyid dang  chos kyi mtshan nyid dang  skad cig gi mtshan nyid dang  rgyun gyi mtshan nyid dang  nad la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang  sems sna tshogs kyi rnam par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid dang  longs spyod phun  sum tshogs pa rgud pa'i mtshan nyid dang  snod 'jig pa dang chags pa'i mtshan nyid do // / +med pa'i mtshan nyid gang phung po dang  khams dang  skye mched rnams la bdag dang bdag gi dus rtag tu med pa'o // /

column3: nyon mongs goms dang grogs ngan dang / / +'phongs dang gzhan gyi dbang nyid dang / /

column7: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2381115#2381115#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8398;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8399# gsum po de dag la gnas pa'i phyir lus dang longs spyod la lta ba dang  blo ma byang ba dang 'dre bar gnas pa dang  dge ba cung zad tsam gyis chog par 'dzin pas de'i dbang gis dge ba'i chos rnams mi sgrub pa'i phyir gags zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ste / / +bstan bcos  chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / /
column8: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2361188#2361194#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5877;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5878# chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las kyang de skad du ston to // /
column9: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2347967#2347967#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4261# 'di ni bstan bcos sa mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / /
column10: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2358455#2358455#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5554;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5555# theg  pa chen po bsdus pa ni brag pa med pa'i dbang du mdzad pa'i phyir sa bcu dang sbyar te bstan to // / +bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las ni rnam pa gsum du bsngags pa brjod nas 'bras bu lnga sdud par ston to // /
column11: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2364571#2364572#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6302# so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / /
column12: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224604#224604#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1393;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1394# rim gyis sgrib pa rab tu sel ba dang  sangs rgyas kyi chos sgrub pa dang  sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'o // / +bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun    las btus pa las ni / /
column13: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2317526#2317526#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_784;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_785# gnyis pa gzhan med do zhes gsungs pa yin no zhes bshad de / / +bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las kyang de skad du ston to // /
column14: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2354316#2354317#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5056;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5057# gang zag gnyis po de  nyid la mtshan ma med par spyod pa can zhes kyang bya'o zhes bshad do // / +bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las ni dad pa dang chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba gnyis ni tshogs kyi lam dang mthong ba'i lam la gnas pa / /
column15: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519413#519413#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9048;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9049# yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba ni yang dag  pa'i ngag dang  las kyi mtha' ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe'o // / +bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / /
column16: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#502831#502831#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7039# bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa la sogs pa las ni 'dod chags dang  zhe sdang dang gti mug gi rtsod pa'i ngo bo nyid do zhes bshad do // /
column17: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223930#223930#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1294# rgya cher ni bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus  pa la sogs pa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column18: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#528036#528036#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10248# de'i phyir bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / /
column19: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543035#543035#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12175# de'i phyir bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las rnam par rtog pa la  spyod pa ni dbugs rngub ba dang  'byung ba dran pa'i yul la dmigs so zhes bshad pa yin no // /
column20: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2320969#2320969#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1178# de'i phyir bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las ci'i phyir shin tu rgyas pa la sems can kha cig mos kyang nges par 'byung bar    mi 'gyur zhe na / /

column3: mdor na rigs kyi nyes dmigs ni // / +rnam pa bzhi ru shes par bya // / +ring mo zhig na ngan song du // /

column3: 'gro zhing myur du thar pa dang / / +de na'ang  sdug bsngal chung du myong // /

column7: 0.012#TD4047E.TXT.r#1143103#1143103#TD4047E.TXT.r_3157# de ltar na sgro 'dogs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa'i phyir dang  skur pa 'debs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa'i phyir / /
column8: 0.012#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1667686#1667689#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_11702;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_11703# dmigs pa la gcig tu phyin ci  log pa'i phyir dang  nges par rtog pa'i phyir dang  sgro 'dogs pa'i phyir te / /
column9: 0.019#TD4091E.TXT.r#731602#731602#TD4091E.TXT.r_6712;TD4091E.TXT.r_6713# dmigs pa la  phyin ci log pa'i phyir dang  nges par rtogs pa'i phyir dang  sbro 'dogs pa'i phyir ro // / +de la chad par lta ba dang log par lta ba ni med pa'i sgor zhugs pa'i phyir sgro 'dogs pa ma yin no // /
column10: 0.020#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2610635#2610635#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_9295# de bas na 'phags pa la nges par mi rtog pa'i sgo nas bdag tu lta ba  la sogs pa 'byung bar mi rung bas yongs su nyams pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir mthong bas spang bar bya ba spangs pas yongs su nyams pa med do // /
column11: 0.020#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2013394#2013394#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_5171;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_5172# gang gi phyir zag pa dang bcas pa la dmigs pa'i phyir thams cad sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar  bya bar 'gyur ba'am / / +de dag gis spang bar bya ba'i lta ba la dmigs pa'i phyir rnam pa bzhi yin pa de lta bas na tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa ni rnam pa gnyis kho na yin gyi rnam pa gcig ma yin zhing rnam pa bzhi ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'di ni brtag par bya ba yin no // /
column12: 0.020#TD4047E.TXT.r#1175233#1175235#TD4047E.TXT.r_7860;TD4047E.TXT.r_7861# skrag pa ni dka' bar 'dzin pa'i phyir ro // / +log par lta ba ni yid mi ches pa'i phyir ro // /
column13: 0.021#TD4009E.TXT.r#340992#340993#TD4009E.TXT.r_2758;TD4009E.TXT.r_2759# dul bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin / / +nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin la dmigs par lta ba yin te / /
column14: 0.021#TD4039E.TXT.r#1862064#1862064#TD4039E.TXT.r_5438# mthong bas spang bar bya ba dang  gong du bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa de rnams spang bar bya ba'i phyir log par lta ba sngon du 'gro ba'i lam ma yin pa la yang lam ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du  rab tu shes so // /
column15: 0.022#TD4068E.TXT.r#583362#583362#TD4068E.TXT.r_1625;TD4068E.TXT.r_1626# rtag pa dang chad par bltas na dbu ma'i lam de rtog par mi 'gyur bas na dbu ma'i lam nas 'byung ba la bgegs byed pa'o // / +log pa'i lta ba'i rang bzhin bstan pa'i phyir / /
column16: 0.022#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2928031#2928032#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_8387;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_8388# phyis kyang bdag de'i rkyen du mi 'gyur bar 'chad do // / +'bad pa med par lta ba la sogs pa'i bya ba byed par mi rigs par bstan pa'i phyir / /
column17: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#465882#465883#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_2163;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_2164# smras pa 'dir log par lta ba bsal ba'i phyir / / +log par lta ba 'jig par gsungs kyi shes pa ni ma gsungs so zhes 'byung ste / /
column18: 0.023#TD4032E.TXT.r#1929742#1929742#TD4032E.TXT.r_1596# stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin rab tu bstan pa yang sgro 'dogs pa dang skur pa 'debs pa'i gnyen por lta ba thams cad las  nges par 'byung ba'i bdag nyid du shes par byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column19: 0.024#TD4054E.TXT.r#1037026#1037026#TD4054E.TXT.r_7414# sla bar tha snyad gdags pa'i phyir dang  'jig rten pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir dang  'jig rten pa mi    skrag pa'i phyir dang  bdag go sla bar tha snyad gdags pa ji lta bu zhe na / /
column20: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#464377#464377#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_1951# kha cig ni nyan par mi byed pas chad par  lta ba dag gi phyir ni mtshams sbyor ba'i sems can yod do zhes bshad la / /
column21: 0.024#TD4032E.TXT.r#1931720#1931722#TD4032E.TXT.r_1929;TD4032E.TXT.r_1930# grangs can la sogs pa'i shes pas dag par mchog tu 'dzin pa'i phyir ro // /
column22: 0.024#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#1986952#1986954#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_1195;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_1196# gang zag log par lta ba 'am bdag tu lta ba zhig gzhan dag la 'jig rten pha rol tu med pa 'am bdag yod  par ston par 'dod pas ngag skyes par byed pa'i sems kha phyir bltas pa bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pas tshig tu smra bar byed kyi / / +lta ba dang mtshungs par ldan pas ni ma yin pa'i phyir na bar du chod par 'gyur ro // /
column23: 0.025#TD4047E.TXT.r#1200139#1200139#TD4047E.TXT.r_11181;TD4047E.TXT.r_11182# sdug bsngal ba'o zhes bya ba ni bde ba'i 'du shes can gyi lha dang mi rnams kyi 'du shes de spong du gzhug pa'i phyir ro // / +bdag med pa'o zhes bya ba ni bdag tu smra ba rnams kyi de spong du gzhug pa'i phyir ro // /
column24: 0.025#TD4043E.TXT.r#355594#355594#TD4043E.TXT.r_24# drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde la sgra ji bzhin du mngon par zhen pa rnams mtshan nyid kyi rjes su 'brang bas mdo sde'i ldem por dgongs pa la 'jug pa'i phyir byis pa'i lta ba thams cad spang bar bya ba dang  de nyid kyi phyir stong    pa nyid kyis skrag pa rnams kyi lta ba spang bar bya ba'i phyir ro // /
column25: 0.025#TD4010E.TXT.r#2286247#2286250#TD4010E.TXT.r_7100;TD4010E.TXT.r_7101# gzhan yang gzhon nu zhes bya ba la sogs    pas ni yid kyi sdom pa rnam pa gzhan bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to // / +log par lta ba spang ba'i phyir log par lta ba dang 'grogs par mi byed ces bya ba ni log par lta ba'i bag chags spang ba'i don to // /
column26: 0.026#TD4098E.TXT.r#1393866#1393866#TD4098E.TXT.r_624;TD4098E.TXT.r_625# dge ba ni gang rnam par shes pa lnga dang lhan cig rgyu ba de ni shes rab kyi yin gyi lta ba ma yin  te mi rtogs pa'i phyir ro // / +yid kyi sa gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba'o // /
column27: 0.027#TD4047E.TXT.r#1132884#1132884#TD4047E.TXT.r_1673# 'khor ba dang 'ga' ba'i dkar po'i chos 'jig rten pa dang las 'das pa ji ltar rigs pa'i dge sbyong gi 'bras bu rnam pa bzhi 'thob pa la rjes su mthun pa'i phyir dang  nye bar zhi bar byed pa la dgos pa'i phyir bzhi bar byed pa ste / /
column28: 0.028#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2930103#2930103#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_8646# ji ltar mi rigs par bstan pa'i phyir gang  gi phyir bdag tu lta ba ni thog ma med pa'i dus nas goms pa ste zhes bya ba smos te 'di ltar bdag tu lta ba ni 'khor ba thog ma med pa'i dus nas sems can gyis goms pa dang  'dris par byas zin pas na de la goms par bya ba'i phyir bshad ces byar mi rung ngo // /
column29: 0.028#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1068354#1068361#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2584;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2585;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2586;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2587# ji  ltar 'dod pa brjod par bya ste skye ba dang 'jig pa'i chos can yin pa'i phyir mi rtag pa'o // / +mi mthun par gyur pa'i phyir sdug bsngal ba'o // /

column3: dge ba dpag tu med pa'i gnas // / +ye shes dang ni dri med ldan // / +mthu rnams kyi yang gnas yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520761#520774#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9248;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9249;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9250;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9251# de'i phyir de nyid las bdag gir lta ba dang  mi mthun pa'i phyir stong pa'o // / +bdag tu lta ba  dang mi mthun pa'i phyir bdag ma yin pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520788#520793#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9254;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9255;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9256;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9250;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9251;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9252;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9253# bdag nyid kyis bdag ma yin pa'i  phyir bdag ma yin pa'o // / +gzhan yang de nyid las / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520789#520803#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9254;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9255;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9256;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9257# bdag nyid kyis bdag ma yin pa'i  phyir bdag ma yin pa'o // / +gzhan yang de nyid las / /
column7: 0.028#TD4061E.TXT.r#1517832#1517832#TD4061E.TXT.r_566# ha cang yun ring du gnas na bya ba mang zhing byed pa mang ba yin ba dang  snod spyad mang zhing 'tshog chas mang  ba yin pa dang  gnas la ser sna byed cing gnas la zhen pa yin pa dang  khyim la ser sna byed cing khyim la zhen pa yin pa dang  chags pa dang bcas pa bzhin du gnas de nas 'gro bar byed do zhes 'byung ba'i nyes dmigs lnga bstan pa'i phyir dang  de bzhin du chos gos la  sogs pa dang mi ldan pa'i phyir dang  mi dga' bas gnod pa'i phyir dang  nad kyis gzir ba'i phyir dang  'dod chags kyis gzir ba'i phyir dang  mi dang mi ma yin pas byas pas gzhan gyi lus dang sems la gnod pa byed pa'i phyir dang  rnyed pa la sogs pa 'dod     // /

column3: rin chen mchog rigs bzhin shes bya // / +byang chub chen po'i rgyu mtshan phyir // /
column4: 0.017#TD4047E.TXT.r#1161814#1161814#TD4047E.TXT.r_5975# phan gdags pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni nad med par bya ba'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.018#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2739176#2739180#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_5452;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_5453;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_5454# nyon mongs pa'i 'dod pa rnams ni ngo bo nyid kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa  can yin pa'i phyir ro // / +gzhan yang nyon mongs pa'i 'dod pa rnams kho nas dngos po'i 'dod pa rnams 'dod par byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column6: 0.018#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520788#520791#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9254;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9255;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9256# bdag nyid kyis bdag ma yin pa'i  phyir bdag ma yin pa'o // / +gzhan yang de nyid las / /
column7: 0.021#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1068354#1068361#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2584;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2585;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2586;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2587# ji  ltar 'dod pa brjod par bya ste skye ba dang 'jig pa'i chos can yin pa'i phyir mi rtag pa'o // / +mi mthun par gyur pa'i phyir sdug bsngal ba'o // /
column8: 0.021#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2062585#2062586#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_12248;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_12249# nang gi byed pa'i skyes bu dang  bral ba'i phyir ro // / +bdag nyid kyis bdag ma yin pa'i phyir bdag med pa'o zhes bya ba ni / /
column9: 0.021#TD4047E.TXT.r#1132884#1132884#TD4047E.TXT.r_1673# 'khor ba dang 'ga' ba'i dkar po'i chos 'jig rten pa dang las 'das pa ji ltar rigs pa'i dge sbyong gi 'bras bu rnam pa bzhi 'thob pa la rjes su mthun pa'i phyir dang  nye bar zhi bar byed pa la dgos pa'i phyir bzhi bar byed pa ste / /
column10: 0.022#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1068285#1068285#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2568;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2569;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2570# khur lta bur gyur pa'i phyir / / +sdug bsngal ba'o // / +nang gi skyes bu dang bral ba'i phyir stong pa'o // /
column11: 0.022#TD4047E.TXT.r#1158073#1158073#TD4047E.TXT.r_5445# sngon gyi smon  lam gyi dbang gi phyir dang  dgos pa med pa'i phyir dang  gdul bya rnams gus pa dang bcas pas bsgrub par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir / /
column12: 0.024#TD4054E.TXT.r#1037026#1037026#TD4054E.TXT.r_7414# sla bar tha snyad gdags pa'i phyir dang  'jig rten pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir dang  'jig rten pa mi    skrag pa'i phyir dang  bdag go sla bar tha snyad gdags pa ji lta bu zhe na / /
column13: 0.025#TD4003E.TXT.r#426278#426278#TD4003E.TXT.r_161# don dam par na byang chub kyi sems gdod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir de ltar ma rtogs pa'i 'gro ba rnams la sgyu ma'i skyes bu la sgyu ma'i skyes bu gzhan gnyis pa snying rje  bskyed pa ltar snying rje chen po bsgom par bya ste / /
column14: 0.025#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#505328#505328#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7344;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7345# gcig pa dang tha dad pa gnyis kar rtogs pa'i phyir rtogs par dka' ba'o // / +gzhan yang  thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi yul ma yin pa'i phyir shin tu phra ba zhes bya'o // /
column15: 0.025#TD4050E.TXT.r#1099709#1099709#TD4050E.TXT.r_385;TD4050E.TXT.r_386# gang phyir dge ba'i sems  la yang bdag go zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro // / +yul la rnam par rig pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'o // /
column16: 0.025#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520761#520763#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9248;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9249# de'i phyir de nyid las bdag gir lta ba dang  mi mthun pa'i phyir stong pa'o // / +bdag tu lta ba  dang mi mthun pa'i phyir bdag ma yin pa'o // /
column17: 0.026#TD4069E.TXT.r#622409#622409#TD4069E.TXT.r_60;TD4069E.TXT.r_61# yongs su byang ba ni rgyud rnam par grol bas  rnam par grol ba'i phyir te / / +zag pa zad pa'i rgyud la 'byung ba'i phyir ro // /
column18: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220786#220786#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_848# gzhan yang 'di las khyad par du 'phags par byas pa'i phyir dang  khyad par du 'phags par 'gro ba'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ste / /
column19: 0.027#TD4095E.TXT.r#96177#96177#TD4095E.TXT.r_6431;TD4095E.TXT.r_6432# phyir mi 'ong ba dbang po rnon po rnams ni gnas gtsang mar skye bar bya ba'i phyir dang  mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir ro // / +dbang po rtul po rnams ni nyon mongs pas 'jigs pa'i yang phyir te / /
column20: 0.028#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2050288#2050288#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_10451;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_10452# dbang po rno ba'i phyir na mi gyo ba ste / / +'di gyo bar mi nus pa'i  phyir mi gyo ba'i chos can no // /

column3: ye shes che dang ting 'dzin 'phags // / +sems can mang po'i don gnas phyir // /
column4: 0.012#TD4009E.TXT.r#347723#347725#TD4009E.TXT.r_3738;TD4009E.TXT.r_3739# dpag tu yod pa dang  dpag tu med pa'i 'bras  bu la ltos pa dang  zad pa dang  mi zad pa'i chos nyid dang  bde ba rgya chen por ma yin pa dang  rgya chen por sgrub par byed pa dang  ye shes kyi tshogs dang  de'i ngo bo nyid dang  des de sgrub pa'i phyir ro // / +gzhan yang rnam pa lngas phyug pa'i bdag por  gyur pa'i rgyu zil gyis gnon par rig par bya ste / /
column5: 0.013#TD4019E.TXT.r#2489887#2489888#TD4019E.TXT.r_10803;TD4019E.TXT.r_10804# gzhan ni don dam pa'i dngos por 'dod pas mi 'thad pa'o // / +gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pas dngos po mi rtag par 'dod pa 'gog ste / /
column6: 0.018#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1068354#1068360#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2584;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2585;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2586;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2587# ji  ltar 'dod pa brjod par bya ste skye ba dang 'jig pa'i chos can yin pa'i phyir mi rtag pa'o // / +mi mthun par gyur pa'i phyir sdug bsngal ba'o // /
column7: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2389033#2389033#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9262;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9263# 'di ltar bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag gis sems can la phan  'dogs pa'i phyir ro // / +gzhan yang de nyid las gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i nang na gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i spyod pa'o zhes 'byung ste / /
column8: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520763#520763#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9248;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9249# de'i phyir de nyid las bdag gir lta ba dang  mi mthun pa'i phyir stong pa'o // / +bdag tu lta ba  dang mi mthun pa'i phyir bdag ma yin pa'o // /
column9: 0.021#TD4050E.TXT.r#1107705#1107705#TD4050E.TXT.r_1473# dri ma med pas rnam par byang ba zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid de nyid nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa zhes bya ba'i dri ma dang bral bar gyur pa'i phyir gang rnam par dag pa'i de bzhin  nyid kyis rab tu phye ba'i sangs rgyas nyid do // /
column10: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#505327#505327#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7344;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7345# gcig pa dang tha dad pa gnyis kar rtogs pa'i phyir rtogs par dka' ba'o // / +gzhan yang  thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi yul ma yin pa'i phyir shin tu phra ba zhes bya'o // /
column11: 0.021#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#876243#876243#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_17677# ji ltar de bya ba'am bya bar nus par bya bar 'gyur ba yin pa de bzhin du de myong bar bya ba'am myong bar nus pa'i phyir  myong bar 'gyur ba'o // /
column12: 0.022#TD4039E.TXT.r#1867272#1867272#TD4039E.TXT.r_6037;TD4039E.TXT.r_6038# tshe 'di la mya ngan las 'da' bar lta bar lhung nas de'i rgyu de dang de'i rkyen des khams gsum gyi skye ba'i mun par ltung bar 'gyur te / / +ma rig pa'i mun pas bsgribs pa'i phyir bdag  nyid kyi lta ba bzung ba la log pa yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi mthong ngo // /
column13: 0.022#TD4091E.TXT.r#731417#731418#TD4091E.TXT.r_6682;TD4091E.TXT.r_6683# bdag gam bdag gi la ni ma yin no zhes rtogs  par bya ba'i phyir ro // / +bdag tu mngon par dga' ba'i dngos po de nyid las rtag par lta ba'am chad par lta ba'am mthar 'dzin par lta ba ste / /
column14: 0.024#TD4039E.TXT.r#1856661#1856661#TD4039E.TXT.r_4826;TD4039E.TXT.r_4827# des na de ma thob pa la thob po snyam du 'du shes par gyur la gzhan dag la yang brjod pa'i phyir ro // / +mi slob pa'i mngon pa'i nga rgyal can ni bdag ni zhi ba'o // /
column15: 0.028#TD4043E.TXT.r#381231#381231#TD4043E.TXT.r_3341;TD4043E.TXT.r_3342# nyes pa rnams kyi gnyen por 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni    bdag la chags pa dam por 'dzin pa'i lam 'gog par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro // / +gal te bdag kho na'o snyam du sems na ni de na nams kyang bdag med do snyam pa'i blo 'byung bar mi 'gyur bas mi rung ngo zhes bya ba ni bdag mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // /
column16: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#268819#268819#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6897;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6898# bdag gam bdag gir 'dzin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma'i kun du 'byung ba'i sa bon gyi stobs kyis tshe 'di la bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin par byed la / / +bdag dang bdag gir  'dzin pa'i phyir ni bdag gis mthong ngo zhes bya ba nas / /

column3: la la gcig tu nyes par spyod nges yod // / +la la dkar po'i chos rnams kun du bcom // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520788#520802#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9254;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9255;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9256;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9257# bdag nyid kyis bdag ma yin pa'i  phyir bdag ma yin pa'o // / +gzhan yang de nyid las / /
column5: 0.009#TD4061E.TXT.r#1521597#1521597#TD4061E.TXT.r_1160;TD4061E.TXT.r_1161;TD4061E.TXT.r_1162# gnyis pas ni yun ring po  nas 'jig pa'o // / +gsum pas ni dus nges par 'jig pa'o // / +bzhi pas ni 'gyur ba med par 'jig pa'o // /
column6: 0.010#TD4009E.TXT.r#347723#347725#TD4009E.TXT.r_3738;TD4009E.TXT.r_3739# dpag tu yod pa dang  dpag tu med pa'i 'bras  bu la ltos pa dang  zad pa dang  mi zad pa'i chos nyid dang  bde ba rgya chen por ma yin pa dang  rgya chen por sgrub par byed pa dang  ye shes kyi tshogs dang  de'i ngo bo nyid dang  des de sgrub pa'i phyir ro // / +gzhan yang rnam pa lngas phyug pa'i bdag por  gyur pa'i rgyu zil gyis gnon par rig par bya ste / /
column7: 0.012#TD4047E.TXT.r#1124486#1124486#TD4047E.TXT.r_447;TD4047E.TXT.r_448;TD4047E.TXT.r_449# bdag dang gzhan du mnyam pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas rigs dang ldan pa'i phyir / / +sems can la dga' ba yin no // / +rnam pa bcus ji ltar rigs par sems can la sogs pa'i yul la yang dag par sgrub par byed pas 'jug pa'i tshul khrims kyi rtags bstan pa'i phyir / /
column8: 0.012#TD4017E.TXT.r#2655828#2655828#TD4017E.TXT.r_407# slob pa'i sa rnams rdzogs pas 'gog pa'i bden pa'i mthar phyin pa'i phyir ro // /
column9: 0.012#TD4037E.TXT.r#1335581#1335581#TD4037E.TXT.r_2729;TD4037E.TXT.r_2731;TD4037E.TXT.r_2732;TD4037E.TXT.r_2733;TD4037E.TXT.r_2734# bsdigs pa'am / / +gsad pa'am / / +bcing ba'am / / +chad pas gcad pa'am / / +go rar gzhug pa'am / /
column10: 0.013#TD4054E.TXT.r#1024698#1024698#TD4054E.TXT.r_5582;TD4054E.TXT.r_5583# de dag ni sems kun nas nyon mongs pa can du 'gyur ba rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i bsam gtan gyi sgo nas gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad bsgribs pa'i lung du ma bstan par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // / +de la  sred pas ni ro myang ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pas kun nas nyon mongs so // /
column11: 0.013#TD4091E.TXT.r#748778#748779#TD4091E.TXT.r_9756# sdug bsngal ril gyis yongs su shes par bya ba dang  kun 'byung spang bar bya ba dang  'gog pa la mngon du bya bar mi nus  kyi lam ni zad par bsgom par mi nus par mngon par rtogs pa'i mtha' med pa'i phyir de la mngon par rtogs pa'i rjes las thob pa'i thob pa mi skye'o // /
column12: 0.014#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2389033#2389033#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9262;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9263# 'di ltar bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag gis sems can la phan  'dogs pa'i phyir ro // / +gzhan yang de nyid las gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i nang na gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i spyod pa'o zhes 'byung ste / /
column13: 0.015#TD4047E.TXT.r#1169088#1169088#TD4047E.TXT.r_7061;TD4047E.TXT.r_7062# sems nye bar brtan par byed pa'i phyir ro // / +zang zing gi sbyin pas phan 'dogs par byed pa mdor bsdus nas bstan pa'i phyir / /
column14: 0.015#TD4009E.TXT.r#340989#340989#TD4009E.TXT.r_2757;TD4009E.TXT.r_2758# sems yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir ma yin / / +dul bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin / /
column15: 0.015#TD4009E.TXT.r#341150#341153#TD4009E.TXT.r_2779;TD4009E.TXT.r_2780;TD4009E.TXT.r_2781# 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin / / +'gag par bya ba'i phyir ma yin / /
column16: 0.015#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235249#235249#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2723# sems can rnams kyi don tshegs chung dus sgrub pa'i phyir dang  sems can rnams kyis gces par bya ba bskyed pa'i phyir dang  bzo dang las kyi gnas shes par bya ba'i sbyin pa'i phan 'dogs pas bsdus pa'i  phyir ro // /
column17: 0.015#TD4029E.TXT.r#2134732#2134732#TD4029E.TXT.r_1864;TD4029E.TXT.r_1865# chos dang chos can dag tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro // / +de nyid kyi phyir mjug thogs su bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes pas de rnyed par rig par bya'o zhes bshad do gnyis mi dmigs pas rnyed pa  las ji skad bshad pa ltar gnyis mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni sngar phyir nang gi dmigs pa gnyis po thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rnyed pa ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa de gnyis nyid mi dmigs pa las rig pa bya'o zhes gnyi ga'i dmigs pa rnyed pa lta bu bshad pa yin te / /
column18: 0.015#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3096155#3096155#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_610# ji ltar ming rnam par gzhag pa bzhin du rgyu mtshan la de'i blo 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang  rgyu mtshan gcig la yang nye bar 'dogs pa mang ba'i phyir dang  sna tshogs pa'i phyir bdag nyid mang po 'thob par 'gyur bas /// /
column19: 0.015#TD4046E.TXT.r#2201119#2201122#TD4046E.TXT.r_710;TD4046E.TXT.r_711;TD4046E.TXT.r_712# de la nyes pa dang bcas pa ni kha na ma tho ba skye ba'i phyir ro // / +'gal ba dang bcas pa  ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro // /
column20: 0.015#TD4047E.TXT.r#1155762#1155762#TD4047E.TXT.r_5095;TD4047E.TXT.r_5096# rtag tu byed pa dang  gus par byed pa'i    sbyor ba las skyes pa'i phyir gsal ba'o // / +yang bsam pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i phyir brling ba'o // /
column21: 0.015#TD4047E.TXT.r#1162313#1162313#TD4047E.TXT.r_6047;TD4047E.TXT.r_6048;TD4047E.TXT.r_6049# gang gi tshe mngon par mtho ba las brtsams nas chos ston par byed pa'i tshe sbyin pa dang  tshul  khrims dang  mtho ris kyi gtam byed pa'o zhes bya ba'o // / +rnam par ma 'khrugs pa'i phyir ma 'dres pa'o // / +rnam par ma 'khrugs pa nyid bstan pa'i phyir 'jug sla zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // /
column22: 0.015#TD4052E.TXT.r#2847926#2847927#TD4052E.TXT.r_771;TD4052E.TXT.r_772# rnam pa gcig tu na thos  pa las byung ba dang bsams pa las byung ba dang  skyes nas thob pa'i shes pa dag gis mngon sum du ma byas pa'i phyir zab pa'o // / +'jig rten pa'i bsgoms pa las byung ba'i mngon sum ma yin pa'i phyir phra ba'o // /
column23: 0.015#TD4061E.TXT.r#1530640#1530640#TD4061E.TXT.r_2466# gzhan yang rtag tu bsgom pa'i phyir dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin par bsgom pa'i phyir dang  bar chad med par bsgom pa'i phyir dang  chog mi shes par bsgom pa'i phyir ro // /
column24: 0.015#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1078526#1078526#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_4380# bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sa pa'i kha dog gi 'dod chags med pa'i phyir dang  bde ba'i snying pos skyed pa'i phyir ro // /
column25: 0.018#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520837#520848#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9262;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9263;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9264# bdag gi mtshan nyid dang mi mthun pa'i phyir bdag ma yin pa'o // / +gzhan  yang de nyid las bdag gir lta ba'i gnyen po'i phyir stong pa'i rnam pa bsgom mo // /
column26: 0.018#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1068354#1068356#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2584;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2585;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2586# ji  ltar 'dod pa brjod par bya ste skye ba dang 'jig pa'i chos can yin pa'i phyir mi rtag pa'o // / +mi mthun par gyur pa'i phyir sdug bsngal ba'o // /
column27: 0.020#TD4050E.TXT.r#1107705#1107705#TD4050E.TXT.r_1473# dri ma med pas rnam par byang ba zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid de nyid nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa zhes bya ba'i dri ma dang bral bar gyur pa'i phyir gang rnam par dag pa'i de bzhin  nyid kyis rab tu phye ba'i sangs rgyas nyid do // /
column28: 0.021#TD4050E.TXT.r#1117931#1117931#TD4050E.TXT.r_2959;TD4050E.TXT.r_2960# gang gi phyir tshig gis bstan par mi nus pa dang  'jig rten  pa'i shes pas shes par mi nus pa'i phyir ro // / +yang rnam pa mi rtog pa'i rjes las thob pa de yang rab tu dbye ba rnam pa lnga blta bar bya ba yin pas rtogs pa dang  rjes su dran pa dang  rnam par gzhag pa dang  'dres pa dang  'byor ba la dpyod pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la / /
column29: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#505327#505327#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7344;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7345# gcig pa dang tha dad pa gnyis kar rtogs pa'i phyir rtogs par dka' ba'o // / +gzhan yang  thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi yul ma yin pa'i phyir shin tu phra ba zhes bya'o // /
column30: 0.021#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#876243#876243#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_17677# ji ltar de bya ba'am bya bar nus par bya bar 'gyur ba yin pa de bzhin du de myong bar bya ba'am myong bar nus pa'i phyir  myong bar 'gyur ba'o // /
column31: 0.022#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2903804#2903804#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_5016;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_5017# sems ni skad cig skad cig par 'dod chags par 'gyur ba dang  zhe sdang bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // / +bdag tu 'dzin pa'i gnyen por chos thams cad la bdag med par bsgom ste / /
column32: 0.022#TD4039E.TXT.r#1867272#1867272#TD4039E.TXT.r_6037;TD4039E.TXT.r_6038# tshe 'di la mya ngan las 'da' bar lta bar lhung nas de'i rgyu de dang de'i rkyen des khams gsum gyi skye ba'i mun par ltung bar 'gyur te / / +ma rig pa'i mun pas bsgribs pa'i phyir bdag  nyid kyi lta ba bzung ba la log pa yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi mthong ngo // /
column33: 0.022#TD4091E.TXT.r#731417#731418#TD4091E.TXT.r_6682;TD4091E.TXT.r_6683# bdag gam bdag gi la ni ma yin no zhes rtogs  par bya ba'i phyir ro // / +bdag tu mngon par dga' ba'i dngos po de nyid las rtag par lta ba'am chad par lta ba'am mthar 'dzin par lta ba ste / /
column34: 0.026#TD4052E.TXT.r#2847940#2847940#TD4052E.TXT.r_773;TD4052E.TXT.r_774# rnam pa gcig tu na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang  so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi  shes pas yongs su ma shes pa'i phyir zab pa'o // / +byang chub sems dpa' mos pas spyod pa'i shes pas shes par dka' ba'i phyir phra ba'o // /
column35: 0.026#TD4047E.TXT.r#1222784#1222784#TD4047E.TXT.r_14401;TD4047E.TXT.r_14402# byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i gzhi'i rnal 'byor gyi gnas tha ma las sa'i le'u ste gsum pa'i 'grel pa rdzogs so //// / +de ltar sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i  sbyor ba bstan pa'i phyir / /
column36: 0.026#TD4049E.TXT.r#2303395#2303395#TD4049E.TXT.r_2751;TD4049E.TXT.r_2752# dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang  mi nyams pa dang  phyir zhing 'byung  ba dang  'phel ba dang  yangs par bya ba'i phyir gang bsgom pa'o // / +bsal ba'i phyir bsgom pa gang zhe na / /
column37: 0.027#TD4009E.TXT.r#321207#321207#TD4009E.TXT.r_139;TD4009E.TXT.r_140# brgyad pa ni dam pa ma yin pa dang  kun du 'du ba'i don ji lta ba bzhin gyi byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa'i phyir log par sgrub pa'o // / +de las bzlog pa yang  dag par sgrub par bsdus pa bzhi pa phrag brgyad po sngar bstan pa rnams kyang gong nas gong du mngon par sgrub pas go rims su rig par bya ste / /
column38: 0.027#TD4019E.TXT.r#2464770#2464770#TD4019E.TXT.r_7598;TD4019E.TXT.r_7599# gal te mtshan  mar skyer zin na zhes pa ni sngar bstan pa ltar sgyu ma 'am gyi na zhes pa'i mtshan mar sgro 'dogs pa'o // / +gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pas thams cad sgyu ma lta bu'i don nyid gsal bar ston te / /
column39: 0.027#TD4062E.TXT.r#2964570#2964570#TD4062E.TXT.r_544;TD4062E.TXT.r_545;TD4062E.TXT.r_546# dbyangs kyi khyad par gang gis don go bar byed pa'o // / +las ni de slong bar byed pa'i sems pa'o // / +yi ge'i rnam pa yin pa'i phyir ram / /
column40: 0.027#TD4019E.TXT.r#2507753#2507753#TD4019E.TXT.r_13263# ces pa ni stong pa'i bdag nyid du gyur pa'i gzugs la sogs pa la byis pas de ltar mi rtogs pas mngon par 'dod cing tshol ba'o // /

column3: la la thar pa'i cha mthun dge ba med // / +dkar po  dman pa yod pa rgyu dang bral // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520799#520811#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9256;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9257;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9258# bdag gir lta ba'i gnyen po'i phyir stong pa'i rnam bsgom mo // / +bdag tu lta ba'i gnyen po'i phyir bdag ma yin pa'i rnam pa bsgom mo zhes 'byung ngo // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520848#520848#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9263;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9264# gzhan  yang de nyid las bdag gir lta ba'i gnyen po'i phyir stong pa'i rnam pa bsgom mo // / +bdag tu lta ba'i gnyen po'i phyir bdag ma yin pa'i rnam pa bsgom mo zhes 'byung ngo // /
column6: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2371716#2371717#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7247;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7248# ji skad du bstan pa'i 'phags pa'i gang zag dang bcas pa'i shes rab ni chos  rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi bdag nyid kyis bsdus pa yin no zhes 'byung ngo // / +bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las kyang mthong ba gang zhe na / /
column7: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2349865#2349866#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4504# de la spyi ni thams cad yod par smra ba'i gzhung bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las bshad pa rnam pa gcig yod de / /
column8: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#548860#548860#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12834;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12835# 'gro ba de phal cher lus btud de 'gro  pa'i phyir dang  yang na 'gro ba der dud de 'gro ba kha cig kyang yod pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las / /
column9: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#531018#531018#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10660;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10661# kun rdzob kyi grangs ni gzugs bzhin du bshad par bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las ni 'di ltar sgra dang  dri dang  ro dang  reg bya'i khams  kyang de bzhin te / /
column10: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#536409#536409#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11316;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11317# 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bas ni sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnams skye bar bstan pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las ni gzhan yang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i chos 'di dag la ni  rtsa ba yang yod / /

column3: zab cing rgya che bshad pa gzhan la phan phyir bstan pa'i chos chen la // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520812#520824#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9258;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9259;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9260# bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las kyang bshad pa rnam pa  gnyis yod de / /

column3: mi shes bzhin du mos pa shin tu rgya chen 'byung zhing sgrub la bzod // / +de dag tha mar rnam pa gnyis mchog phun sum tshogs 'gyur gang yin de // /
column4: 0.014#TD4044E.TXT.r#382671#382673#TD4044E.TXT.r_226;TD4044E.TXT.r_227;TD4044E.TXT.r_228;TD4044E.TXT.r_229# tshogs chen po'i nang du 'gro ba'am / / +gzhan dag dang 'gyed pa'am / / +phyir brgal ba'am / / +de las gzhan  pa'i las dka' ba dag la yang brtan pa yin zhes bya ba'o // /
column5: 0.015#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#894382#894382#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_715;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_716# stong pa zhes bya ba'i tshig kyang tshig gzhan la don gzhan 'byung bas brtag dka' ba'i phyir dka' ba'o // / +don rnams kyang rtogs par dka' bas na zab pa'o // /
column6: 0.015#TD4061E.TXT.r#1522637#1522637#TD4061E.TXT.r_1343;TD4061E.TXT.r_1344# shes rab kyis so sor 'bigs par byed pa ni bdag gis mngon sum du byas so zhes 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi rjes las thob pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes kyis nges par 'dzin pa'i phyir ro // / +gzhan  yang nyan pas ni thos pa las byung ba'i ye shes ston par byed do // /
column7: 0.015#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2070010#2070010#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_13311# rmad du byung ba ni sangs rgyas rnams las gzhan la med pa'i phyir dang  mdzad par dka' ba'i phyir dang  brnyes par dka' ba'i phyir ro // /
column8: 0.016#TD4037E.TXT.r#1335453#1335453#TD4037E.TXT.r_2700# gzhan dag la tshul 'chos pa'i phyir yang sbyin par mi byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column9: 0.016#TD4035E.TXT.r#179350#179350#TD4035E.TXT.r_9504# tshe 'di la bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang  gzhan dag gi sdig pa spang bar bya ba dang bde 'gror 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir dang  bdag gi nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar bya ba'i phyir ro // /
column10: 0.017#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2758463#2758463#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_8156# 'dod pa rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir dang  nyes dmigs kyi mtshan nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir ro // /
column11: 0.017#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1068354#1068356#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2584;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2585;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2586# ji  ltar 'dod pa brjod par bya ste skye ba dang 'jig pa'i chos can yin pa'i phyir mi rtag pa'o // / +mi mthun par gyur pa'i phyir sdug bsngal ba'o // /
column12: 0.018#TD4039E.TXT.r#1867272#1867272#TD4039E.TXT.r_6037;TD4039E.TXT.r_6038# tshe 'di la mya ngan las 'da' bar lta bar lhung nas de'i rgyu de dang de'i rkyen des khams gsum gyi skye ba'i mun par ltung bar 'gyur te / / +ma rig pa'i mun pas bsgribs pa'i phyir bdag  nyid kyi lta ba bzung ba la log pa yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi mthong ngo // /
column13: 0.018#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2026171#2026172#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_6953;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_6954# rtag pa dang chad pas brtags pa'i gzhi med pa'i phyir ro // / +gzhan la yang de dang 'dra bar brjod par bya'o // /
column14: 0.018#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914050#914050#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2990# bdag ma dul bar gzhan gdul bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro // /
column15: 0.018#TD4083E.TXT.r#686574#686574#TD4083E.TXT.r_297# de dag la bsod nams ma yin pa ches mang po yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur par bya    ba'i phyir dang  gzhan dag la yang phan par 'dod pas rjes su bstan pa'i phyir ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yang phyir mi dgug pa'i tshul gyis skrod par byed cing longs spyod par mi byed do // /
column16: 0.018#TD4041E.TXT.r#1275675#1275675#TD4041E.TXT.r_1035;TD4041E.TXT.r_1036# de'i rgyu las nyes par spyod pa kun tu spyod pa'i phyir bdag la gzhan gyis dbyung pa dang  bsad pa dang  bcing ba dang  brdeg pa dang  spyo ba dang  spyugs pa la sogs pa'i gnod pa skyed pa'i phyir bdag la gnod par  'gyur ba'o // / +bdag la ma yin yang gzhan la skyed pas gzhan la gnod par 'gyur ba'o // /
column17: 0.018#TD4091E.TXT.r#731417#731418#TD4091E.TXT.r_6682;TD4091E.TXT.r_6683# bdag gam bdag gi la ni ma yin no zhes rtogs  par bya ba'i phyir ro // / +bdag tu mngon par dga' ba'i dngos po de nyid las rtag par lta ba'am chad par lta ba'am mthar 'dzin par lta ba ste / /

column22: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#490232#490232#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5411# rgyal ba'i sras ji ltar na dngos po de 'phags pa rnams kyi 'phags pa'i shes pa dang  'phags pa'i mthong ba ming dang  brjod pa dang bral ba'i phyir mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas  shing brjod du med pa'i chos nyid de nyid gzhan dag mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir / /

column24: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2340922#2340922#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3495# de la chos gdags pa rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba ni chos rnams thams  cad brjod pa dang bral ba yin pas btags pa tsam du gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis kyi bstan pa zhes rnam par gzhag pa yin pas de'i phyir mdo 'di nyid las brjod du med pa'i chos nyid gzhan dag mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir btags pa'i ming dang 'du shes kyis  zhes gsungs pa dang  gzhan yang drin lan gsungs pa'i mdo las chos la brjod pa med kyang de bzhin gshegs pas shin tu thabs mkhas pas ming dang mtshan ma med pa'i chos la ming dang mtshan mar brjod do zhes gsungs pa dang  gzhan yang bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las  de ltar chos thams cad brjod du med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na / /
