column5: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2343065#2343065#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3743# don 'di'i bshad pa ni bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ji skad du bstan pa bzhin te / /
column6: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2373063#2373063#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7408# rnal 'byor gyi sgo de dag kyang bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ji skad du bstan pa bzhin te / /
column7: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224467#224468#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1378# bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ni ji skad du bstan pa bzhin te / /
column8: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2311816#2311816#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_116;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_117# slob dpon chos skyong ni bshad pa snga ma ltar 'dod de / / +bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ji skad du / /
column9: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2401106#2401106#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10717;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10718# mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon du phyogs pa nyid kyi  yid la byed pa rnam pa gnyis lhag par btang snyoms su gzhag par mi nus pa ste / / +bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ji skad du / /
column10: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2391006#2391006#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9510# bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ji skad du sbyor ba'i gnas skabs la gnas pa des mtshan ma'i 'ching ba yongs su ma bsal bas / /
column11: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229783#229783#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2026# mtshan nyid rnam pa drug ni bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las bstan pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir 'dir ma bstan to // /

column3: brtse bas bskyed pa'i  sdug bsngal 'jig rten gyi // / +bde ba thams cad zil gyis gnon 'gyur zhing // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529570#529582#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10460;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10461;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10462# gnyis pa bsags pa la don rnam pa gnyis yod de / / +chos rnams kyis sa bon rab tu bsags pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba dang  bstan bcos  theg pa chen po bsdus pa las / /

column3: don byas rnams kyang de dang mi ldan gang // / +de las ngo mtshar che ba ci zhig yod // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529583#529591#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10461;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10462;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10463# chos rnams kyis sa bon rab tu bsags pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba dang  bstan bcos  theg pa chen po bsdus pa las / / +chos rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su bsgos pa'i sa bon rnams kun du bsags pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa lta bu'o // /

column3: brtan pa'i brtse dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa yis // / +sbyin pa'i bde ba byed pa gang yin pa // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529592#529599#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10462;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10463;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10464;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10465# chos rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su bsgos pa'i sa bon rnams kun du bsags pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa lta bu'o // / +gnyis pa ni phyi rol gyi yul drug po dag kun du bsags pa dang  'phel bar byed pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: de la  khams gsum nye bar spyad rnams kyi // / +bde ba de yis char yang mi phod do // / +sems can don phyir brtse bas sdug bsngal gyi // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529600#529613#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10463;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10464;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10465;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10466;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10467# gnyis pa ni phyi rol gyi yul drug po dag kun du bsags pa dang  'phel bar byed pa'i phyir ro // / +gsum     // / +pa ni sdud pa zhes bya ste / / +dmigs par bya ba'i yul rnam pa sna tshogs sdud pa'i phyir te / /

column3: rang bzhin 'khor ba gang yin mi gtong na // / +snying rje can rnams gzhan la phan pa'i phyir // / +sdug bsngal ci ste khas len byed mi    'gyur // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529614#529634#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10467;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10468;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10469;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10470;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10471;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10472# dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  phung po lnga'i rab tu byed pa las bstan pa bzhin no // /
column5: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#531577#531577#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10721# bstan bcos chos mngon pa kun las btus pa dang  chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las kyang phung po lnga'i rab tu byed pa las bstan pa dang don mthun par 'byung ste / /

column3: brtse dang ldan pa'i snying rje'i sbyin pa gang // / +longs spyod dang ni de las byams pa dang / /
rjes su gzung bas bskyed dang de yi mthus // / +byas pa'i bde ba rtag tu 'phel bar 'gyur // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529633#529646#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10471;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10472;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10473;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10474# 'di yang don rnam pa gnyis dang ldan te / / +kun du bsags pa dang 'phel bar byed pa'o // /

column3: snying rjes rgyas par bya zhing 'phel bar bya // / +sbyin pas yongs  smin bya zhing bde bar bya // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526390#526390#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10033;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10034# rgyu la brten nas skyes pa'i phyir / / +rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa'i bstan bcos las mngon par brjod pa'i bag chags ni 'di lta ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529647#529655#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10473;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10474;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10475# 'di ltar gzugs la sogs pa'i dbang gis yul yongs su tshol bas kun du bsags pa dang 'phel bar  'gyur ba'i phyir ro // / +rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa'i bstan bcos las ni ming rnam pa bdun 'byung ste / /
column6: 1.788#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526469#526470#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10043# rgyu rkyen las skyes pa'i phyir rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa'i bstan bcos las / /
column7: 0.025#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#452485#452486#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_306;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_307;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_308# 'phags pa mi'i rgyal po'i mdo las  ji skad du mdo sde 'di'i ming dang tshig ni sangs rgyas brgya stong du mas gsungs so zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o // / +rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa'i bstan bcos las kyang / /
column8: 0.029#TD4065E.TXT.r#430919#430919#TD4065E.TXT.r_549# bstan bcos byed pas 'jug pa'i thabs bstan pa'i phyir / /

column3: kun du drang bar bya zhing bkri bya zhes // / +zhen pa rnams la rab tu smra dang 'dra // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529656#529665#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10474;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10475;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10476# rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa'i bstan bcos las ni ming rnam pa bdun 'byung ste / / +mdo 'di las bstan pa'i ming bzhi la yang gsum gyis bsnan na'o // /

column3: snying rjes sdug bsngal dag gis sdug bsngal ba // / +bde ma bskyed par gang gis bde bar 'gyur // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529666#529673#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10475;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10476# mdo 'di las bstan pa'i ming bzhi la yang gsum gyis bsnan na'o // / +ming gsum po de yang gang zhe na bstan bcos de nyid las ji skad du shes bya'i gnas zhes  kyang bya ste / /

column3: de phyir brtse dang ldan pas gzhan bde ba // / +bskyed  nas bdag nyid bde bar byed pa yin // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529674#529684#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10476;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10477;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10478# ming gsum po de yang gang zhe na bstan bcos de nyid las ji skad du shes bya'i gnas zhes  kyang bya ste / /

column3: snying rje can ni rtag tu rang sbyin la // / +ston dang 'dra ste rang bde mi 'dod pa // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529683#529692#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10477;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10478;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10479# kun nas nyon mongs pa dang  rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams kyi gnas byed pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste / / +'di ni bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ji skad du / /

column3: longs spyod rnams kyis gzhan dag bde bar gyis // / +yang na tha dad min bde bdag la'ang min // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529693#529704#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10479;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10480;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10481;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10482# khyad par du 'phags pa'i gsung rab rnam pa bcu bstan pa las / / +dang po zhes bya'o // /
column5: 0.015#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2398085#2398087#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10339;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10340# zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun gyis ston te gnyen por gyur ba bkod pa'i phyir ro // /
column6: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226991#226994#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1677;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1678# zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column7: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#490882#490882#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5500;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5501# rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rdo rje  gcod pa'i 'grel pa las bshad pa'i dgongs pa dang sbyar nas / /

column3: de ba des bde ba bdag gis sbyin pa ni // / +'bras  dang bcas te sems can rnams la byin // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#474727#474728#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3260;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3261# chos kyi sku mnyam pa la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su grub pa'i yon tan dang  mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa ston pa'i yon tan dang  sangs rgyas kyi sku gsum gyi yul yongs su mchad pa'i yon tan dang  'khor ba'i mtha' ji snyam par sems  can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba nye bar gnas pa'i yon tan dang  mi zad pa'i yon tan la sogs pa'o zhes bstan pa'o // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475085#475086#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3301;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3302# 'di ni yod pa dang med pa gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid de bzhin nyid mchog  tu rnam par dag par 'jug par mdzad pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las yongs su dag pa'i de bzhin nyid ni mtshan nyid med pa'i chos zhes bya'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#477882#477883#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3626;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3627# 'di nyid dang sbyar te yon tan gyi ming bshad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can dang  sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad par bstan pa rnams yongs su ma 'dres par gyur pa'o // / +slob dpon  dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#478758#478759#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3746;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3748;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3747# 'di ni mthar byon pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529705#529712#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10481;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10482;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10483# gnas kyi khyad par gyi khyad par du 'phags pa'i gsung zhes bstan pa lta bu'o // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column9: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529734#529738#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10487;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10488;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10486;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10489;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10490# slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las kyang / / +shes par bya ba yin pa'i phyir shes bya zhes bya'o // /
column10: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#533783#533783#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10975# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column11: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#535458#535458#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11199# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column12: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235701#235702#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2789;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2790# 'di ltar bsgom pa'i shes rab kyi dbang gis sems kyi kun tu spyod pa la dbang thob par byed cing de kho na nyid kyi don rtogs pas nyon mongs pa spangs nas 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba'o // / +slob dpon dbyig  gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column13: 0.015#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385675#2385675#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8907# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni sems can gyi dngos po rnams la log par sgrub pa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column14: 0.015#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238344#238344#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3123;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3124# 'di ni slob dpon thogs med kyis mdzad pa'i spyi mjug bsdu ba'o // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las / /
column15: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385429#2385429#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8880# bstan pa rnams brda sprod pa yang 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las so so'i skye bo dag gi mtshan nyid kyi sgrib pa zhes bstan pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column16: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386565#2386565#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8998# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni theg pa dman pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ma rig pa zhes  bstan pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las theg pa 'og ma'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ba yang kun du rmongs pa gcig bsdus pa yin yang don gyis ni kun du rmongs pa gnyi ga bstan to // /
column17: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227065#227065#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1688# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa dang mthun no // /
column18: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227748#227749#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1767;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1768# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis  byas pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las kyang / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad de mangs kyis dogs nas 'dir ma brjod do // /
column19: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228204#228204#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1816# phal cher slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i  'grel pa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad do // /
column20: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386812#2386812#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9023# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel  pa las ni rnam par rig pa tsam gyi mtshan ma rags pa kun du 'byung ba dag ni mtshan ma'i rnam pa'o // /
column21: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2390583#2390583#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9461# slob dpon dbyig  gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column22: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244504#244504#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3913;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3914# ces bshad pa lta bu'o zhes 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel    pa las kyang phal cher de skad du bstan to // /
column23: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#474855#474855#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3273;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3274# 'di ni shes bya la shin tu sgrib pa med par 'jug pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa ltar kha cig tu ni thogs pa dang    bcas la / /
column24: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475263#475264#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3329;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3330# 'dis ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lhun gyis grub pa rgyun mi 'chad par gnas pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen  gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column25: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475956#475957#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3415;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3416# 'di ni chos yang dag par rnam par gzhag pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig  gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column26: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#476539#476539#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3482;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3483# 'di ni phyi ma la chos 'byung ba rab tu mkhyen pa zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column27: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#477177#477178#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3541;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3542# 'di ni rten tshad med pas  sems can gdul bar sbyor ba'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column28: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#477548#477548#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3585;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3586# 'di ni chos kyi sku mnyam pa la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs  su grub pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column29: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#478129#478129#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3660;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3661# 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi sku gsum gyi yul yongs su ma chad pa yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column30: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#478551#478551#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3713;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3714# 'di ni 'khor ba'i mtha' ji tsam par sems can thams cad la phan pa dang  bde ba nye bar gnas pa zhes bya ba'i yon tan nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column31: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214117#214117#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_15# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel  pa las kyang kun tu rmongs pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang  gnas ngan len bcu gcig ces ston te / /
column32: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527912#527912#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10231# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang don 'di dang mthun par 'byung ngo // /
column33: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2316432#2316432#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_650# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column34: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403883#2403883#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11054# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni sa 'dir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos khyad par du 'phags pa gnas bas gnas 'di'i dbang gis rtsa  ba'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad bsregs nas thal bar brlags pas shes rab 'od 'phro ba can gyi sa zhes bshad de / /
column35: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387661#2387662#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9103# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur  ba las sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i bya ba rtsol ba la mi ltos pa'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ba dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column36: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#537125#537126#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11426;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11427;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11428# phyir dang zhes bya ba bstan pa nyid kyis bcu gnyis su gyur par rig par bya'o // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis ni / /
column37: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226753#226753#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1647# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni chos dang  zang zing dang  mi 'jigs pa gsum ni go rims bzhin du gzhan gyi dge ba'i rtsa  ba dang  lus dang  sems la phan 'dogs pas rgyu dang rkyen de'i phyir rnam pa gsum du bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // /
column38: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220616#220616#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_824# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni 'jig rten pa dang  nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i las yang dag par 'das pas na de'i phyir spyod pa pha rol tu phyin pa zhes brjod  do zhes bshad do // /
column39: 0.022#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#540238#540239#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11832# theg  pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyigs  dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa las ming ni gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid du rtogs so // /
column40: 0.022#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#536673#536673#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11361# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column41: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2404782#2404782#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11128# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni 'di ltar sa 'di la sbyor ba'i spyod pa'i  mthar phyin cing mtshan ma thams cad dang bral bas mi gyo ba yin yang mtshan ma med pa la da dung rtsol ba dang bcas pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad de / /
column42: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237797#237797#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3039;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3040# 'di ni rgyu dang po'o // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis 'grel pa las / /
column43: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2314615#2314615#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_419# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las  sems can mya ngan las 'da' ba'i rigs med pa gang yin pa de ni rgyu dang mi ldan pa zhes bya ste / /
column44: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#487057#487057#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4937;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4938# gsum pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar zhes bya ba ni dri ba dris pa'i gnas bstan pa'o // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa mdzad pa las ji skad du / /
column45: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403597#2403597#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11024# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las ni / /
column46: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252315#252315#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4771;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4772# rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column47: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2390234#2390234#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9416# slob dpon ngo bo nyid med dang dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa bzhin no // /
column48: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2391438#2391438#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9556# kha cig na re mdo'i tshig 'di ni mtshan nyid kyi dbang du mdzad de rab tu bstan na slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i  'grel pa la sogs pa dang mthun te / /

column3: gal te khyod kyis bdag la bya ba yod // / +de dag nyid la shin tu 'bras bur byos // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529713#529722#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10482;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10483;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10484;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10485;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10486# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / / +shes par bya ba yin pa'i phyir shes bya zhes bya'o // / +de yang 'di lta ste / /

column3: sbyin pa po ni longs spyod mi 'dod kyang // / +longs spyod shin tu mang la bzang dang phrad // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529721#529730#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10485;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10486;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10487# kun nas nyon mongs pa dang  rnam par byang ba'i  chos rnams te ngo bo nyid rnam pa gsum mo // / +gnas zhes bya ba ni rgyu'i don to zhes 'byung ngo // /
column5: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226070#226070#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1555;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1556# ci'i phyir pha rol tu  phyin pa drug po dag gi go rims bstan ce na 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa snga ma rnams pha rol tu phyin pa phyi ma 'byung ba dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las pha rol tu phyin pa phyi ma 'byung ba dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni longs  spyod la ma chags na tshul khrims bsrung nus so // /
column6: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#469130#469131#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_2589;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_2590# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis 'grel pa las ni 'di ltar sngar bstan pa'i rin po che sna bdun las 'od zer 'byung bas kun du gsal bar gyur pa yin no zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las kyang gong ma'i rnam par bshad pa gsum char dang ldan  no ;; /
column7: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#474177#474178#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3218;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3219# bcom ldan 'das  kyi yon tan khyad par can gsungs pa dang  gzhan dag rab tu dang ba bskyed pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las / /
column8: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226775#226776#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1647;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1648# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni chos dang  zang zing dang  mi 'jigs pa gsum ni go rims bzhin du gzhan gyi dge ba'i rtsa  ba dang  lus dang  sems la phan 'dogs pas rgyu dang rkyen de'i phyir rnam pa gsum du bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las ni rnam grangs gnyis kyis ston te / /
column9: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#478205#478206#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3668;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3669# sems can gang yang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang  sprul pa'i sku las gud na med do zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams la dbus dang mtha' med pa de  bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sa'i yon tan yang de bzhin te / /
column10: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2405392#2405392#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11183;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11184# blo gros shin tu dge ba'i phyir legs pa'i blo gros zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las ni 'di ltar so so  yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i shes pa khyad par du 'phags pa thob pas so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi nang nas mchog tu gyur cing / /
column11: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#476013#476013#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3423;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3424# de bzhin du byis pa chung du la sogs pas kyang khong du chud par 'gyur ba'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las / /
column12: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534911#534912#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11140;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11141# kun du rtog pa tsam du dmigs pa zhes bya ba ni nor ba'i rnam par shes pas brtags pa nyi tshe yod par 'gyur ba'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las ni / /
column13: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2356927#2356928#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5368;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5369# nyon mongs pa shin tu nyams smad par byed pa'i phyir yang 'jig  par byed pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las / /
column14: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233842#233843#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2534;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2535# de'i phyir bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa dang  go cha dang  sbyor  ba dang  zhum pa med pa dang  mi 'khrugs pa dang  chog bar mi 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni mdo las mthu dang ldan pa dang  brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang  spro ba dang ldan pa dang  brtul ba brtan pa dang  dge ba la brtson pa mi gtong ba dang  go rims bzhin du sbyar bar rig par bya'o zhes  'byung ngo // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las / /

column3: bdag ni bde ba de 'dod ma yin te // / +'di  ltar bdag ni sbyin la brgyud dang ldan // /
column4: 0.016#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529712#529712#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10482;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10483# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / / +shes par bya ba yin pa'i phyir shes bya zhes bya'o // /

column3: bdag ni rtag tu brtse bas bdog pa kun // / +yongs su gtong ba gang yin de ltos la // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529739#529747#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10488;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10489;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10490;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10491;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10492# shes par bya ba yin pa'i phyir shes bya zhes bya'o // / +gnas ni 'di lta ste / / +brtan pa'i gnas te / / +sgras ni rten par byed pa nyon mongs pa  dang  rnam par byang ba 'dus byas kyi chos rnams gzung gi / /

column3: des na khyod kyis bdag ni de'i 'bras la // / +don gnyer med pa nyid du shes par bya // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529748#529758#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10491;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10492;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10493;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10494;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10495# sgras ni rten par byed pa nyon mongs pa  dang  rnam par byang ba 'dus byas kyi chos rnams gzung gi / / +'dus ma byas ni ma yin te / / +de la gnas pa don med pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.011#TD4051E.TXT.r#1233024#1233027#TD4051E.TXT.r_91;TD4051E.TXT.r_92;TD4051E.TXT.r_93# 'dus ma byas rnams ni ma yin te / / +gnas kyi don med pa'i phyir ro // / +de dag gi gnas ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ste rgyu yin pa dang  rten yin pa'i phyir ci rigs su sbyar ro // /

column3: gal te khyod 'bras thob pa mi gtong na // / +sbyin la mngon dga' yin par mi 'gyur te // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529759#529768#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10494;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10495;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10496# gnas ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa nyid yin te / / +de dag gi rgyu yin pa'i phyir dang de dag 'dren par byed pa'i phyir ci rigs par    bya'o zhes 'byung ste / /

column3: 'di ltar skad cig tsam yang sbyin med na // / +sbyin la mngon bar dga' ba nyid ma yin // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529769#529777#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10496;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10497# de la slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ste / /

column3: ma byas pa la 'bras bu mi 'byin te // / +'di ltar lan bltas bdag gi cha ma yin // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529778#529785#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10497;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10498# ngo bo nyid rnam pa gsum char kun gyi gnas byed par ston to // /
column5: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2322007#2322008#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1311;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1312# stong pa nyid la log par zin pa ni gzhan gyi dbang la brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid ni med la / / +gzhan    gyi dbang dang yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid ni yod do zhes bstan na mngon par yid mi ches shing chos thams cad ni gtan med pa'o zhes mngon par zhen par byed pa ni stong pa nyid log par zin pa zhes bya ste / /
column6: 0.022#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2763614#2763614#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_8886# skur pa 'debs pa'i mtha' ni gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid dang  yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa la med do zhes rang gi mtshan nyid la skur pa 'debs pa gang yin pa ste / /
column7: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#260548#260548#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5821# gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid dang  yongs    su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid la med do zhes pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid la skur pa 'debs pa'i mtha' yin par rig par bya ste / /

column3: khyod kyi lan la lta dang bral bas na // / +'bras bu shin tu gzhan la gtong ba yin // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529786#529793#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10498;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10499# slob dpon ngo bo nyid med ni gzhan gyi dbang kho na'i ngo bo nyid dang gnas byed kyi / /

column3: rgyal sras rnams kyi brtse bas sbyin pa ni // / +kha na ma tho med cing dag pa'i gzhi // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529794#529806#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10499;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10500# kun brtags dang  yongs su  grub pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi gnas ni mi byed do zhes ston to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529803#529815#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10500;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10501# de la de dag gi rgyu yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i char gtogs pa'i gzhan gyi dbang gi gnas byed pas so // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529810#529823#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10500;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10501;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10502# de la de dag gi rgyu yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i char gtogs pa'i gzhan gyi dbang gi gnas byed pas so // / +de dag 'dren pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rnam par byang ba'i char gtogs pa'i gzhan gyi  dbang gi gnas byed pas so // /

column3: bde ba 'dren par byed pa nyid dang ni // / +rjes su srung bcas tshol med gos pa med // /
column4: 0.021#TD4048E.TXT.r#1690030#1690031#TD4048E.TXT.r_888;TD4048E.TXT.r_889# yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ni rnam par byang ba'i char gtogs pa'o // / +gzhan gyi dbang de nyid ni de gnyi ga'i char gtogs pa ste / /
column5: 0.026#TD4032E.TXT.r#1957537#1957537#TD4032E.TXT.r_5897;TD4032E.TXT.r_5898# yod pa ma yin yang gnyis po med pa'i ngo bor snang ba'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa'i phyir ro // / +gnas ni gzhan gyi dbang ste / /
column6: 0.026#TD4051E.TXT.r#1247702#1247702#TD4051E.TXT.r_2124;TD4051E.TXT.r_2125# de dag kyang gnas kyi mtshan nyid dang zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid dag ste / / +de ni gnyi ga'i gnas yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column7: 0.027#TD4032E.TXT.r#1944870#1944871#TD4032E.TXT.r_3893;TD4032E.TXT.r_3894# 'thob pa ni sangs rgyas dang rang byang chub nyid 'thob pa'o // / +de la gzhan gyi dbang nyid ni skyes pas 'thob par 'gyur gyi bud med  kyis 'thob par mi 'gyur te / /
column8: 0.029#TD4018E.TXT.r#3060678#3060680#TD4018E.TXT.r_7356;TD4018E.TXT.r_7357# de de lta bur dgongs pa'o // / +gang yang brtags pa'i rang bzhin dang   gzhan gyi dbang lta bur grub pa'i rang bzhin med do zhes rtog pa de ni chos kyi gnod pa 'byung ba'i las sgrub par byed / /

column3: rgyal sras rnams kyi brtse bas sbyin pa ni //// / +mtha' dag rgya che gtso dang rtag pa dang / /
column4: 0.009#TD4070E.TXT.r#2815265#2815266#TD4070E.TXT.r_2053;TD4070E.TXT.r_2054# 'di  btags pa'i yod pa bstan pa'i phyir / / +de ni khong khro ba'i char gtogs pas te zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras so // /
column5: 0.021#TD4048E.TXT.r#1690030#1690031#TD4048E.TXT.r_888;TD4048E.TXT.r_889# yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ni rnam par byang ba'i char gtogs pa'o // / +gzhan gyi dbang de nyid ni de gnyi ga'i char gtogs pa ste / /
column6: 0.026#TD4035E.TXT.r#155442#155442#TD4035E.TXT.r_5305;TD4035E.TXT.r_5306# las zad par 'gyur ba ni las gsum char yang spong ba'i gnyen por gyur pa'i phyir / / +'jig rten las 'das pa'i zag pa med pa'i las gang yin pa'o // /

column3: dga' dang zang zing med dang dag pa dang / / +byang chub la gzhol dge la gzhol ba yin // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529824#529831#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10501;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10502;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10503;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10504# de dag 'dren pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rnam par byang ba'i char gtogs pa'i gzhan gyi  dbang gi gnas byed pas so // / +ni'i phyir bstan bcos 'di gnyis mi mthun par gyur ce na / /

column3: ji ltar ba de ba gsum gyis tshim pa'i yid // / +brtse ldan yongs su gtong bas dga' 'gyur ba // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529832#529842#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10502;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10503;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10504# ni'i phyir bstan bcos 'di gnyis mi mthun par gyur ce na / / +smras pa / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis spyi'i gnas las brtsams pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid rnam pa gsum spyir bstan to // /

column3: longs  spyod can dag nye bar spyad pa yis // / +de ltar dga' bar 'gyur ba ma yin no // / +bkren la brtse dang ma rungs ba la brtse // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529841#529852#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10504;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10505;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10506# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis spyi'i gnas las brtsams pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid rnam pa gsum spyir bstan to // /

column3: kun 'khrugs la brtse bag med rnams la brtse // / +yul gyi gzhan dbang can la snying rje dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529851#529863#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10505;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10506;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10507# ngo bo nyid med na ni nye bar gyur pa'i gnas las brtsams  pa'i phyir / / +gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo kho na dang sbyar nas bstan te / /
column5: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#546013#546013#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12537# de'i phyir mdo nyid las so so nas don re re smos pa'i phyir 'gal ba med do // /
column6: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#546135#546135#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12550# rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa'i bstan bcos la sogs pa ni de kho na nyid kyi sgo nas bstan pas so so nas don re re smos pa'i phyir 'gal ba med do // /

column3: log par mngon par zhen la snying rje'o // / +bde dang sdug bsngal bde rgyu las // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529864#529872#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10507;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10508;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10509# so so nas don re re smos pas 'gal ba med do // /

column3: byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje ste // / +rgyu dang bshes gnyen rang bzhin las // / +byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529873#529880#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10508;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10509;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10510# yang na rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa zhes kyang bya ste / / +'khor na dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu rab tu 'dren  pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste / /

column3: byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje ni // / +mnyam par shes bya de bsam phyir // / +sgrub phyir 'dod chags bral  phyir dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529881#529896#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10509;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10510;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10511;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10512# 'khor na dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu rab tu 'dren  pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste / / +de la rnam par smin pa zhes bya ba yang don rnam pa gsum gyi phyir te / /

column3: mi dmigs phyir dang dag phyir ro // / +rang gi sems kyis byams la sogs // / +sgom pa chos la mos pa dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529896#529908#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10511;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10512;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10513# dang po ni rnam par gyur nas rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i phyir rnam par smin pa zhes bya'o // / +gnyis pa ni dus tha dad pa na rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i phyir rnam par smin pa  zhes bya'o // /

column3: bsam dang dbang 'byor nyid dang ni // / +rnam par mi rtog gcig phyir mchog / /
de ltar bcom ldan 'das la dang ba rab skyes shing // / +rdzas dang bkur sti chen pos shin tu rgyun mchod ldan // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529909#529921#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10513;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10514;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10515# gsum pa ni ris tha dad pa rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i phyir rnam par smin pa zhes bya ste / / +de yang rgyu ni dge ba dang mi dge ba yin la 'bras bu ni lung du mi ston pa yin pa'i phyir rnam par smin pa zhes brjod do // /

column3: yon tan mang ldan phan byed shes la rtag sten pa // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529922#529929#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10514;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10515;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10516# de yang rgyu ni dge ba dang mi dge ba yin la 'bras bu ni lung du mi ston pa yin pa'i phyir rnam par smin pa zhes brjod do // / +rnam pa gsum las 'dir ni gsum pa'i sa  tha dad pa bzung ste / /

column3: 'gro la rjes su brtse ba grub pa kun thob 'gyur // / +theg pa chen po mdo sde'i rgyan las / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529930#529948#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10516;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10517;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10518;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10520# snga ma gnyis ni spyi'i ming yin pas rnam par smin pa gzhan du yang gtogs pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917242#917242#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3396# de snang ba zhes bya ba'i rnam par shes pa la snang ba'i gzung ba'i chos rnams la bya ste / /

column3: mchod pa dang bsten pa dang tshad med pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad  pa'o ; /// /
column4: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475770#475770#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3390;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3391# 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i  chos yang dag pa mu stegs thams cad kyis phyir bzlog mi nus te de dag zil gyis mnan nas yang dag pa'i lam rab tu ston pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste / / +de ni 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i yang dag pa'i chos rnams ni lha'i bu'i bdud dang  mu stegs can dag gis  phyir mi bzlog go zhes 'byung ba'i tha tshig go // /
column5: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2354993#2354993#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5141# 'dres pa'i chos la dmigs pa'ang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis shes pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste / /
column6: 0.023#TD4037E.TXT.r#1370594#1370594#TD4037E.TXT.r_7270;TD4037E.TXT.r_7271# gnas pa bdun pa 'di la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bskyed pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // / +gnas pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sbyor ba las byung ba'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pas bsdus pa  dang ; /
column7: 0.024#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1457586#1457586#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_6760# yig 'bru'i yan lag  rnams go bar bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni 'di ni log par smras pa yin no zhes bya ba yin te / /
column8: 0.026#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#795813#795813#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_4871;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_4872# sprin dang bcas pa dang  sprin med pa'i mtshan mo dang  nyin mo'i gzugs la lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste / / +de la snang ba dang bral ba'i phyir mun pas zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir mtshan mo sgang gshong spel ma dag la phyin ci log tu lta ba de  bzhin du / /
column9: 0.028#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2063465#2063465#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_12366;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_12367# thams cad smos pa ni rdzas dang kun rdzob nye bar gzung bar bya ba'i phyir ro // / +de ltar byas nas zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste / /

column3: ngo tsha mi mthun phyogs spangs dang / / +rnam par mi rtog ye shes ldan // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529949#529967#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10518;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10520;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10521# shin tu rnam par dag pa'i zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi gnas su gyur pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung     // / +'di ni gya nom par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i gnas skabs su me long lta bu'i ye shes dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems kyi bdag nyid la dri ma med pa'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ste / /
column5: 0.028#TD4018E.TXT.r#3059639#3059639#TD4018E.TXT.r_7221;TD4018E.TXT.r_7222# zhes sems tsam ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa 'phos pa la dgongs pa'o // / +de sangs rgyas kyi sa la sogs pa bzhin du me long lta bu'i ye shes so // /

column3: kha na ma tho me dang man yul // / +sems can smin byed brtan pa'i yin // /
pha rol phyin pa drug po yi // / +mi mthun phyogs ni 'phel ba dang / / +gnyen po 'grib  bas byang chub sems // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529965#529981#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10521;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10522# shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ye shes dang   ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa zag pa med pa'i lam gyi chos kyi gnas su gyur pa'i phyir dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan bkod pa'i mdo las ji skad du / /
column5: 0.022#TD4027E.TXT.r#557165#557166#TD4027E.TXT.r_846;TD4027E.TXT.r_847# de gnyis zhi ba'i phyir 'gog pa'i bden pa'o // / +gnyen po'i phyir lam gyi bden pa'o // /
column6: 0.023#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1059868#1059868#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_1234;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_1235# gong du 'gro ba'i chos ni gong du 'gro ba'o // / +mdo las ni de ma phye bar bstan pa'i phyir mdo las skyes bu dam pa'i 'gro ba bdun zhes gsungs so // /
column7: 0.023#TD4043E.TXT.r#355971#355971#TD4043E.TXT.r_74;TD4043E.TXT.r_75# de la sbyor ba'i phyir ro // / +de yang tshangs pa chen pos zhus pa'i mdo las / /
column8: 0.023#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#847180#847180#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_13252;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_13253# che ge mo zhig gi med pa'o zhes dgag pa tsam du ni mi rung ngo zhes gang smras pa de la lung dang 'gal ba bstan pa'i phyir / / +mdo las mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te / /
column9: 0.027#TD4091E.TXT.r#742653#742654#TD4091E.TXT.r_8642;TD4091E.TXT.r_8643# gong du 'gro ba'i chos ni gong du 'pho ba dag ste / / +mdo las ni ma phye bar bstan pa'i phyir    skyes bu dam pa'i 'gro ba bdun zhes gsungs so // /

column3: mi zad ngo tsha skye bar 'gyur // / +brtan rnams pha rol phyin pa drug / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#524300#524311#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9752;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9753;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9754;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9755# de bzhin gshegs pa'i dri med rnam shes ni // / +shin tu dag cing zag med dbyings yin pas // /

column3: brtan pa la ni le lo dang / / +nyon mongs rjes su mthun chos la // / +sbyor ba las kyang ngo mtshar 'gyur // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529987#529996#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10523;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10524;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10525;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10526# shin tu dag cing zag med dbyings yin pas // / +sgrib pa  thams cad las ni rnam par dgrol // /

column3: mnyam gzhag ngo bo nyid min chung // / +'bring dang dman pa'i    sa pa dang / / +bsam pa dman dang ngar bcas pa'i // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529997#530007#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10525;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10526;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10527# me long lta bu'i ye shes mtshungs par ldan // / +zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o // /
column5: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2348503#2348504#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4316;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4317# zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +rnam par rig pa tsam du rgya cher rnam par bshad pa ni bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa la sogs pa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column3: ngo tsha dman de las gzhan lhag / / +blo ldan khrel med tshul min las // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#530008#530020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10527;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10528;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10529# rgya cher rnam par bshad pa ni bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa'i 'grel ba las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //// /
column5: 0.014#TD4035E.TXT.r#194942#194943#TD4035E.TXT.r_12275;TD4035E.TXT.r_12276# tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pas ni bstan pa'i don rgyas par bstan to //// / +bam po nyi  shu gcig pa / /
column6: 0.017#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#538220#538221#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11584;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11585# ngo bo nyid gsum bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o //// /
column7: 0.024#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1475827#1475828#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_8836;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_8837# 'o na ni 'dod pa tha dad pa'i phyir zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni  dbang phyug gi 'dod pa yang tha dad pa'i phyir la rgyu gcig pa nyid du yang khas blangs pa'i phyir phyogs snga ma dang 'gal bas phyogs kyi chos kyi rang gi ngo bo las bzlog par gyur par 'gyur ro //// / +bam po nyi shu gcig pa / /
column8: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235458#235458#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2749# ye shes  ni rgya cher bshad pa ni bstan bcos mngon pa kun las btus pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column9: 0.029#TD4037E.TXT.r#1372877#1372877#TD4037E.TXT.r_7544;TD4037E.TXT.r_7545# byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i gzhi'i rnal 'byor gyi  gnas tha ma las skye ba'i le'u ste dang po'o //// / +bam po nyi shu pa / /
column10: 0.029#TD4039E.TXT.r#1878743#1878743#TD4039E.TXT.r_7454;TD4039E.TXT.r_7455;TD4039E.TXT.r_7456# rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las gzhi bsdu ba / / +bam po nyi shu gcig pa / / +rnam par ma dag pa'i sems can  zhes bya ba ni so so'i skye bo rnams so // /

column3: nyon mongs dang len khro ba dang / / +yal bar 'dor dang nga rgyal gyis // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#530021#530028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10529;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10530# blo gros yangs pa len pa'i rnam par shes pas gnas dang  rnam par gzhag pa byas pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa tshogs drug po dag 'jug pa 'di lta ste / /

column3: sems can rnams dang tshul khrims 'joms // / +'gyod  pas nyams dang bcas 'gyur zhing // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#530029#530037#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10529;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10530# blo gros yangs pa len pa'i rnam par shes pas gnas dang  rnam par gzhag pa byas pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa tshogs drug po dag 'jug pa 'di lta ste / / +mig gi rnam par shes pa dang  rna ba dang  sna dang  lce dang  lus dang  yid kyi rnam  par shes pa'o zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa rnam par shes pa rnams lhan cig 'jug pa'i bye brag ston par mdzad do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4054E.TXT.r#997971#997975#TD4054E.TXT.r_1061;TD4054E.TXT.r_1062# rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug ste / / +mig gi rnam par shes pa dang  rna ba dang  sna dang  lce dang  lus dang  yid kyi rnam  par shes pa'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1750175#1750179#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_6580;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_6581# rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug ste / / +mig gi rnam par shes pa dang  rna ba dang  sna dang  lce dang  lus dang  yid kyi rnam  par shes pa'o / /
column7: 2.384#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3109475#3109478#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2493;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2494# rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug po 'di lta ste / / +mig gi rnam par shes pa dang  rna ba dang  sna dang  lce dang  lus dang  yid  kyi rnam par shes pa dag 'byung ngo // /
column8: 2.384#TD4050E.TXT.r#1099081#1099084#TD4050E.TXT.r_299;TD4050E.TXT.r_300# blo gros yangs pa len pa'i rnam par shes pa de la brten cing gnas nas rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug po 'di lta ste / / +mig gi rnam par shes pa dang  rna ba dang  sna dang  lce dang  lus dang  yid kyi rnam par shes pa dag 'byung ngo // /
column9: 0.011#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1407842#1407843#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_894# de ltar na spyi la dmigs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni ji ltar yid kyi rnam par shes pa mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa dag  phyir bsdus te 'dzin par byed pas de spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi yul can du rnam par gzhag pa de bzhin du / /
column10: 0.011#TD4035E.TXT.r#124990#124991#TD4035E.TXT.r_26;TD4035E.TXT.r_27# rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga gang zhe na / / +mig gi rnam par shes pa dang  rna ba dang  sna dang  lce dang  lus dang  yid kyi rnam par  shes pa'o // /
column11: 0.011#TD4036E.TXT.r#26876#26878#TD4036E.TXT.r_4109;TD4036E.TXT.r_4110# de la rnam par shes pa'i khams gang zhe na / / +mig gi rnam par shes pa dang  rna ba dang  sna dang  lce dang  lus dang  yid kyi rnam par  shes pa gang yin pa'o // /
column12: 0.014#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1757942#1757943#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_7372;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_7373# rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug gang zhe na / / +mig gi rnam par shes pa dang  rna ba dang  sna dang  lce dang  lus dang  yid kyi rnam par shes pa ste  'di ni rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug ste drug tshan gsum pa'o // /
column13: 0.015#TD4010E.TXT.r#2245050#2245051#TD4010E.TXT.r_1790;TD4010E.TXT.r_1791;TD4010E.TXT.r_1792# zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / / +mig dang rna ba dang  sna dang  lce  dang ; / +lus dang  yid kyi rnam par shes pa rang rang gi yul gzugs dang  sgra dang  dri dang  ro dang  reg bya dang  chos rnams 'dzin pa'i dbang po de dag gis yul la de dag dmigs pa de kho na nyid kyi ngo bor gal te gyur na ni sems can thams cad kyang 'bad pa med par grol bar  'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir / /
column14: 0.015#TD4036E.TXT.r#29694#29695#TD4036E.TXT.r_4547;TD4036E.TXT.r_4548# de yang rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug po dag ste / / +mig gi rnam par shes pa dang  rna ba dang  sna dang  lce dang  lus dang  yid kyi rnam par shes pa dag go // /
column15: 0.015#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1704078#1704079#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_845;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_846# rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug ste / / +mig gi rnam par shes pa dang  rna ba dang   sna dang  lce dang lus dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa ste / /

column17: 0.015#TD4035E.TXT.r#157830#157830#TD4035E.TXT.r_5703;TD4035E.TXT.r_5704# mig gi rnam par shes pa ji lta bar / / +rna ba dang  sna dang  lce dang  lus dang  yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnams kyang ci rigs par blta bar bya ste / /
column18: 0.016#TD4079E.TXT.r#765209#765209#TD4079E.TXT.r_1474# de bzhin du mig dang rna ba dang  sna dang  lce dang  lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang med cing / /
column19: 0.018#TD4049E.TXT.r#2290291#2290291#TD4049E.TXT.r_512;TD4049E.TXT.r_513# rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug ste / / +mig gi rnam par shes pa dang  rna ba dang  sna dang  lce dang  lus dang  yid kyi rnam par  shes pa'o // /
column20: 0.019#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2713373#2713374#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_1468;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_1470;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_1469# de la rab tu skye ba ni reg pa bcu drug las tshor ba rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste / / +mig dang  rna ba dang  sna dang  lce dang  lus dang  yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnams dang  thogs pa'i 'dus te reg pa dang  tshig bla dags  kyi 'dus te reg pa dang  bde ba'i tshor ba dang mthun pa'i 'dus te reg pa dang  sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dang mthun pa'i 'dus te reg pa dang  sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba dang mthun pa'i 'dus te reg pa dang  rjes su chags pa'i 'dus te reg  pa dang ; /
column21: 0.025#TD4067E.TXT.r#1096942#1096942#TD4067E.TXT.r_1776# mig dang  rna ba dang  sna dang  lce dang  lus dang  mig  gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas yid kyi khams kyi bar du'o // /
column22: 0.026#TD4066E.TXT.r#2119957#2119958#TD4066E.TXT.r_2535# sems kyi khams bdun ni mig dang  rna ba dang  sna dang  lce dang  lus dang  yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnams so // /

column3: bkur sti dman pa thob 'gyur des // / +dad ldan mi min tshogs dang ni // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#530038#530046#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10530# mig gi rnam par shes pa dang  rna ba dang  sna dang  lce dang  lus dang  yid kyi rnam  par shes pa'o zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa rnam par shes pa rnams lhan cig 'jug pa'i bye brag ston par mdzad do // /

column3: ston pas kyang ni btang snyoms mdzad // / +rgyal sras chos dang mthun rnams kyis // / +rnam par smod cing 'jig rten las // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#530047#530058#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10530;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10531;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10532;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10533# mig gi rnam par shes pa dang  rna ba dang  sna dang  lce dang  lus dang  yid kyi rnam  par shes pa'o zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa rnam par shes pa rnams lhan cig 'jug pa'i bye brag ston par mdzad do // /
column5: 0.018#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520005#520006#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9139;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9140# 'di yang rnam pa gsum gyis bstan te / / +chos dang  dpe dang  dpe dang don du sbyar ba'o // /

column3: mthong ba'i chos la  mi snyan 'thob // / +gzhan du phyir zhing mi khom skye // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#530057#530066#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10532;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10533;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10534# don dang dpe dang  dpe dang don du sbyar ba'o // / +dang po yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / /

column3: des na chos dkar thob pa dang / / +ma thob pa las rnam nyams 'gyur // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#530067#530075#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10534# len pa'i  rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug po dag dang lhan cig 'jug pa bstan pa dang  blo gros yangs pa gal te zhes bya ba man chad kyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa lnga po dag dang  lhan cig 'jug pa'i mang nyung bstan pa'o // /

column3: de phyir sdug bsngal gnas pa dang / / +yid kyang rnal du mi gnas 'gyur // / +rgyal sras ngo tsha ldan rnams la // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#530076#530087#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10534;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10535# len pa'i  rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug po dag dang lhan cig 'jug pa bstan pa dang  blo gros yangs pa gal te zhes bya ba man chad kyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa lnga po dag dang  lhan cig 'jug pa'i mang nyung bstan pa'o // /

column3: nyes pa 'di dag  kun mi 'byung // / +mkhas pa rtag tu lha dag dang / / +mi rnams su ni yang dag skye // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#530088#530095#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10535;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10536# de yang dang po ni rtsa ba yan lag la  ltos nas lhan cig 'jug pa rnam par 'byed pa yin la / /

column3: blo ldan ngo tshas myur du ni // / +rdzogs pa'i byang chub tshogs rdzogs byed // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#530096#530104#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10536;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10537# phyi ma ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa lnga po dag la ltos nas lan cig 'jug pa bstan pa yin no // /

column3: rgyal ba'i sras ni sems can rnams // / +smin byed skyo bar mi 'gyur nyid // / +de rtag mi mthun  phyogs dang ni // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#530105#530115#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10537;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10538# bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa la sogs pa las ni don dang po las brtsams nas lhan cig 'jug pa ston to // /

column3: gnyen po bral dang mi 'bral 'gyur // / +de ltar rgyal sras ngo tsha ldan // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#530112#530124#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10537;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10538;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10539# bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa la sogs pa las ni don dang po las brtsams nas lhan cig 'jug pa ston to // / +'dir nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyi lhan cig 'jug pa bstan pa'i rigs pa las ma bstan pa ni / /

column3: phan yon de dag 'thob par 'gyur // / +byis pa shin tu gos bzang gyon yang ni // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#530122#530134#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10538;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10539;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10540;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10541# 'dir nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyi lhan cig 'jug pa bstan pa'i rigs pa las ma bstan pa ni / / +dang po dang tha ma smos pas yid kyi shes par 'gyur ba'i phyir mdor bsdus nas ma bstan te / /

column3: khrel dang bral phyir nyes pas dri ma can // / +rgyal sras ngo tsha shes pa'i gos can  ni ; / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#530133#530143#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10539;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10540;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10541;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10542# dang po dang tha ma smos pas yid kyi shes par 'gyur ba'i phyir mdor bsdus nas ma bstan te / / +de'i phyir rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa la sogs pa las / / +nyon mongs pa can  gyi yid kyang bsdus nas cig car lhan cig 'jug pa ston pa yin no // /

column3: dgab pa med kyang nyes pa'i dri ma bral // / +rgyal ba'i sras ni khrel dang ldan gyur pa // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#530144#530152#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10541;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10542;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10543# nyon mongs pa can  gyi yid kyang bsdus nas cig car lhan cig 'jug pa ston pa yin no // / +dang po yang rnam pa gnyis kyis bstan te / /
