column5: 0.011#TD4026E.TXT.r#530221#530222#TD4026E.TXT.r_2880# yang ci'i phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyis dgongs pa de dang des theg pa gcig pa nyid du bshad ce na / /

column3: gang phyir yod pa  mi mthong med mthong ba // /

column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#531886#531893#TD4026E.TXT.r_3020;TD4026E.TXT.r_3021# so so yang dag par rig pa yid la byed pa ni ser sna dang sbyin pa la sogs pa mi  mthun pa'i phyogs dang gnyen po dag la skyon dang yon tan du so so yang dag par rig pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: byang chub sems dpas  bsod nams ye shes kyi // /

column5: 0.026#TD4026E.TXT.r#531902#531902#TD4026E.TXT.r_3021;TD4026E.TXT.r_3022# bsags pa rjes su dran pa yis // / +dga' dang don chen mthong ba dang / /

column5: 0.019#TD4013E.TXT.r#1099137#1099138#TD4013E.TXT.r_304# bdug pa smos pas ni bdug pa'i khyad par ga bur dang  aa ga ru dang  tsan dan la sogs pa bcos ma ma  yin pa dang  bcos ma ste sbyar ba'i khyad par gyis bskyed pa lha'i dang mi'i las 'das pa gang dag yin pa dag bsdu'o // /
column6: 0.019#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3109564#3109564#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1943;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1944# de nas  nyin zhag de nyid kyi snga dro dge slong rab tu mang po chos gos bgos khar gsil thogs te rgyal po'i khabs tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na / / +rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la rgyu ba'i dge slong mang po de dag gis 'di skad du thos te / /

column5: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#498009#498010#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7502# mu stegs can rnams dang sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams dang rigs dang  rus dang cho rigs 'byor pa dang  rgyud pa tha dad pa rnams dang  nyes pa spyad pa spyod pa rnams dang  tshul  khrims ral ba rnams dang  ngan song rnams dang  theg pa dman pa rnams dang  bsam pa dang sbyor ba dman pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams so zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas dngos po brgyad rnyed sla ba'i lan du gsungs pa'o // /

column3: blo dang ldan pas gnyis po med rig nas // / +de mi  ldan pa'i chos kyi dbyings la gnas // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#531956#531963#TD4026E.TXT.r_3028# sbyin pa la sogs pa byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i ngo bo'i don gyis byang chub chen po 'thob  pa'i don du yang dag par mthong ba'i phyir ro // /

column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#422322#422325#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1930;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1931# byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i sems dang  snying brtse ba dang ldan pa ni sbyin pa sbyin pa na pha rol nas phan 'dogs su re ba med de / /

column7: 0.0#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3109597#3109602#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1945# bcom ldan 'das rdza mkhan bharga'i  khang pa na tshe dang ldan pa phu skar sa ri khams drug rab tu rnam par dbye ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyis btul cing bkod la bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung nas log ste ring po ma lon par pa be'u gzhon nu 'brangs pa zhig gis 'tsho ba dang phral bar gyur te / /
column8: 0.029#TD4026E.TXT.r#532407#532407#TD4026E.TXT.r_3067;TD4026E.TXT.r_3068# yang dag pa'i sbyor ba yid la byed pa ni / / +phyin ci ma log par sgrub pa'i phyir tshul rol du mi gnas pa'i yid la byed pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: de la rten pa'i nyes tshegs tshang tshing dag / /

column3: skye dang ngag sems dge dang mi dge     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#532054#532064#TD4026E.TXT.r_3038;TD4026E.TXT.r_3039;TD4026E.TXT.r_3040# spong ba'i mthu ni thob pa dang  ngo mtshar ngo mtshar med pa la // / +'di shes rnam pa bzhi nyid do // /

column3: bskyed // / +de yi gnas dang 'byung ba mngon sum gang // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#532065#532076#TD4026E.TXT.r_3040# pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyis log par 'dzin pa rnam pa bdun spong ba'i mthu pa yid la byed pa la log pa rnam pa    bdun ni med pa la yod par 'dzin pa dang  nyes pa dang ldan pa la yon tan dang ldan pa nyid du 'dzin pa dang  yon tan dang ldan pa la yon tan dang ldan pa ma yin pa nyid du 'dzin pa dang  'du byed thams cad la rtag pa dang  bde bar log par 'dzin  pa gnyis dang  chos thams cad la bdag tu log par 'dzin pa dang  mya ngan las 'das pa la ma zhi bar log par 'dzin pa ste / /
column5: 0.023#TD4026E.TXT.r#532635#532635#TD4026E.TXT.r_3092;TD4026E.TXT.r_3093# pha rol tu    phyin pa mchog gi chos la zhugs pas bdag nyid gtso bo'i yang dag par mthong ba'i phyir ro // / +pha rol phyin bcu'i rgyus byung ba / /

column3: shes pa kun 'gro rab tu dbye bcas la // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#532077#532093#TD4026E.TXT.r_3040# pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyis log par 'dzin pa rnam pa bdun spong ba'i mthu pa yid la byed pa la log pa rnam pa    bdun ni med pa la yod par 'dzin pa dang  nyes pa dang ldan pa la yon tan dang ldan pa nyid du 'dzin pa dang  yon tan dang ldan pa la yon tan dang ldan pa ma yin pa nyid du 'dzin pa dang  'du byed thams cad la rtag pa dang  bde bar log par 'dzin  pa gnyis dang  chos thams cad la bdag tu log par 'dzin pa dang  mya ngan las 'das pa la ma zhi bar log par 'dzin pa ste / /

column3: thogs med brtan pa thob pa'i mthu yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#532087#532095#TD4026E.TXT.r_3040# pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyis log par 'dzin pa rnam pa bdun spong ba'i mthu pa yid la byed pa la log pa rnam pa    bdun ni med pa la yod par 'dzin pa dang  nyes pa dang ldan pa la yon tan dang ldan pa nyid du 'dzin pa dang  yon tan dang ldan pa la yon tan dang ldan pa ma yin pa nyid du 'dzin pa dang  'du byed thams cad la rtag pa dang  bde bar log par 'dzin  pa gnyis dang  chos thams cad la bdag tu log par 'dzin pa dang  mya ngan las 'das pa la ma zhi bar log par 'dzin pa ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#532182#532186#TD4026E.TXT.r_3045;TD4026E.TXT.r_3046# ngo mtshar med pa rnam pa bzhi ni / / +pha rol tu phyin pa rnams rgya che ba dang yun ring ba nyid yin na 'bras bu sangs rgyas nyid mngon par 'grub pa dang / /

column3: bsam gtan bzhi ba shin tu dag thob nas // / +mi rtog ye shes yongs su bzung ba dang / /

column3: ji ltar rnam gnas yid la byed pa las // / +mthu grub pa yi dam pa thob par 'gyur // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#532118#532126#TD4026E.TXT.r_3040;TD4026E.TXT.r_3041# pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyis log par 'dzin pa rnam pa bdun spong ba'i mthu PA YID LA BYED PA LA LOG pa rnam pa    bdun ni med pa la yod par 'dzin pa dang  nyes pa dang ldan pa la yon tan dang ldan pa nyid du 'dzin pa dang  yon tan dang ldan pa la yon tan dang ldan pa ma yin pa nyid du 'dzin pa dang  'du byed thams cad la rtag pa dang  bde bar log par 'dzin  pa gnyis dang  chos thams cad la bdag tu log par 'dzin pa dang  mya ngan las 'das pa la ma zhi bar log par 'dzin pa ste / / +de dag gi gnyen por stong pa nyid la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsum dang  chos kyi sngom bzhi ston to // /

column5: 0.0#TD4061E.TXT.r#2759669#2759681#TD4061E.TXT.r_1440;TD4061E.TXT.r_1441;TD4061E.TXT.r_1442# ri dags tshig go zhes bya ba lta bu'o // / +mos te zhes bya ba ni mos pa yid la byed pa nyid ston pa yin no // /
column6: 0.026#TD4013E.TXT.r#1103302#1103303#TD4013E.TXT.r_597# de nas tshul khrims 'chal na sems can yongs su smin par byed pa rnyed par dka'o // /

column8: 0.027#TD4013E.TXT.r#1104578#1104578#TD4013E.TXT.r_708# yang dag pa'i sgrub pa la nan tan byed pas kun du mnyes par bya'o // /
column9: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#2116523#2116523#TD4047E.TXT.r_6499# de'i gnyen po'i phyogs kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba     // /

column3: gnas pa dpe med rgya ches rtag tu gnas // /

column5: 0.017#TD4043E.TXT.r#668006#668006#TD4043E.TXT.r_1577# de ltar na ji ltar sems can gyi don bya ba dang gang gi mthus bya ba de dag mdor bsdus te bstan to // /

column7: 0.026#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1484362#1484362#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_8416# stong pa nyid ni 'du byed rnams nang gi byed pa'i skyes bu dang bral ba yin la / /
column8: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1697710#1697710#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5506# bye ba'i char yang mi 'gro zhes bya bas na / /

column10: 0.028#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2703346#2703346#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_10766# zhes ji skad bshad pa'i lugs 'di ma yin par gyur na / /
column11: 0.029#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#3027288#3027288#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_11479# 'di ltar gang zhig phra rgyas ldan pa ma yin par 'dod pa de yang 'di thams cad phra rgyas kyis byas par ni mi 'dod kyi nyon mongs pas byas pa kho nar 'dod do // /
column12: 0.029#TD4013E.TXT.r#1103302#1103302#TD4013E.TXT.r_597# de nas tshul khrims 'chal na sems can yongs su smin par byed pa rnyed par dka'o // /
column13: 0.029#TD4064E.TXT.r#758592#758592#TD4064E.TXT.r_15# shes bya'i sgrib ba ni shes bya thams cad la ye shes 'jug pa'i bar du gcod par gyur pa nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i mi shes pa ste / /

column3: phyogs su de song sangs rgyas sems can rnams // /

column3: chags dang 'jig bcas sems can bcas pa yi // /

column3: 'od zer btang bas shin tu sdug bsngal ba'i // / +ngan  song ba dag mtho ris 'gro bar byed // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#532196#532210#TD4026E.TXT.r_3046;TD4026E.TXT.r_3047# pha rol tu phyin pa rnams rgya che ba dang yun ring ba nyid yin na 'bras bu sangs rgyas nyid mngon par 'grub pa dang / / +gnyis po de nyid yod na rang dang gzhan la sems mnyam par 'jog pa dang  de dag pas khyad par du 'phags par du 'phags pa brgya byin la sogs  pa las mchod pa la sogs pa rnyed du zin kyang lan la re ba med pa dang  'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i lus dang longs spyod 'thob tu zin kyang rnam par smin pa la mi lta ba nyid ro // /
column5: 0.012#TD4037E.TXT.r#2403393#2403393#TD4037E.TXT.r_1559;TD4037E.TXT.r_1560# dung dang  rnga bo che dang  rnga pa ta ha'i sgra rnams yin no // / +sgra chung ngu rnams ni tha na rna bar gshug gzhug pa'i sgra yan chad do // /
column6: 0.020#TD4099E.TXT.r#229783#229783#TD4099E.TXT.r_3934;TD4099E.TXT.r_3935# thams cad spong bar byed pa dag / / +sdig  pa rnams ni spangs phyir de // /
column7: 0.021#TD4037E.TXT.r#2404822#2404822#TD4037E.TXT.r_1667# de ltar na rnam pa bzhi po 'di dag ni brtson 'grus kyi mthu yin  te ; /
column8: 0.026#TD4037E.TXT.r#2396759#2396759#TD4037E.TXT.r_1062;TD4037E.TXT.r_1063# phyis kyang gzugs kyi bdag nyid la gdags pa'i tshig gis bsdus pa'i gzugs su nye bar 'dogs par byed na yang / / +de lta na ni gzugs zhes 'dogs pa'i tshig nye bar 'dogs  pa de med bzhin du yang gzugs zhes bya bar 'gyur ba'i chos dang  gzugs zhes bya bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po de la gzugs kyi blo 'jug par 'gyur pa'i rigs na mi 'jug ste / /

column3: 'dud gnas gzhal med khang mtho mdzes pa dag / /

column3: bdud bcas kun du bskyod cing skrag par byed // /

column3: de ni mchog tshogs nang du ting nge 'dzin // /

column3: bzo dang skye dang mchog gi  sprul pa yis // /

column5: 0.010#TD4026E.TXT.r#508638#508639#TD4026E.TXT.r_840# de ni dge ba'i las dang snying brtse ba gnyis  'phel bar byed pas rtag tu dge ba dang ldan ba dang  snying brtse ba dang ldan par yang 'gyur te / /
column6: 0.024#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1938124#1938124#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2494# 'dod pa'i srid pa dang  gzugs kyi srid pa dang  gzugs med pa'i srid par phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can yin zhes gsungs pa der ni de'i thob pa dang bral ba las dgongs te gsungs pa yin no // /

column8: 0.025#TD4009E.TXT.r#624757#624757#TD4009E.TXT.r_3042# 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims thob pa ni tshul khrims thob pa rnam par dag par ston / /

column10: 0.025#TD4051E.TXT.r#2261164#2261165#TD4051E.TXT.r_2077# dper na 'ga' zhig mtshungs pa yid la  bsams nas 'di gang yin pa de nga'o zhes bya ba lta bu yin gyi / /
column11: 0.026#TD4065E.TXT.r#787265#787266#TD4065E.TXT.r_804# gal te mig gi yul sngon po la sogs pa de dag thams cad gcig tu zin na de'i tshe rtsig pa la sogs  pa dag gi tshu rol gyi cha zin la pha rol gyi cha ma zin pa cig car du mi 'gyur ro // /
column12: 0.027#TD4037E.TXT.r#2482642#2482643#TD4037E.TXT.r_7451;TD4037E.TXT.r_7452# gnyis pa la ni dad pas mos pa rnam par dag go // / +gsum pa la ni lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag go // /
column13: 0.028#TD4064E.TXT.r#760076#760076#TD4064E.TXT.r_120# shes pa dang brjod pa ma gtogs par  don gyi dngos kyi rang gi ngo bo yongs su gcod pa'i thabs gzhan med pas de'i phyir gtso bo'i rang gi ngo bo'i yul la shes pa dang brjod pa med pas don gyi dngos po med par khong du chud par bya'o // /
column14: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#975457#975457#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12018# de'i tshe don gyi 'du shes rnam par bshig pa de la yid kyi brjod pa thos pa'i chos kyi bag chags kyi rjes su 'gro ba de dag don du snang ba thams cad 'byung ba'i skabs med pa'i phyir / /
column15: 0.029#TD4061E.TXT.r#2761137#2761139#TD4061E.TXT.r_1551# 'di ni phung po'i lhag ma med pa la bya bar mngon te / /
column16: 0.029#TD4026E.TXT.r#544820#544820#TD4026E.TXT.r_4323# sbyin pa des rjes su bzung ba'i sems can de dag ni de lta ma yin te / /
column17: 0.029#TD4036E.TXT.r#94539#94539#TD4036E.TXT.r_7785# gang gi tshe gzhan dag gi da ltar gyi phung po rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dag yid la byed pa de'i tshe na ni phyi rol gyi lus dang chos rnams kyi bar la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa    yin no // /
column18: 0.029#TD4035E.TXT.r#356800#356800#TD4035E.TXT.r_11625# ces bya ba ni ji ltar lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa nyams na ngan 'gro'i rgyur 'gyur ba dang  yang dag par bsgrubs na bde 'gro'i rgyur 'gyur ba dang  bslab pa phyi ma gnyis med par yang 'ba' zhig gis sgrub nus pa de ston to // /

column3: sems can rnams kyi don du dus kun gnas // /

column10: 0.027#TD4026E.TXT.r#506537#506537#TD4026E.TXT.r_615;TD4026E.TXT.r_616# byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' ste // / +don gnyis ldan pa'i sems 'byung ba // /

column3: 'dab gshog kun du rgyas pa'i bya bzhin du // /

column3: sems can smin par byed par nus pa nyid // / +sangs rgyas las ni shin tu bsngags pa 'thob // /

column6: 0.025#TD4099E.TXT.r#229799#229799#TD4099E.TXT.r_3936;TD4099E.TXT.r_3937# dge sbyong bram ze de yin no // / +gang zhig sdig chos rab spangs shing // /
column7: 0.027#TD4086E.TXT.r#2343065#2343065#TD4086E.TXT.r_1561# gang gi tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal du rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa de'i tshe yang kun du dga' zhing rab tu dga' la / /

column3: zad par skye mched bcu dang ting nge 'dzin // / +dpag tu med pa brtan pa thob pa'i mthu // /

column6: 1.192#TD4035E.TXT.r#253559#253560#TD4035E.TXT.r_1941# kun nas nyon mongs pa dang  rnam par byang ba'i dngos po ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams so // /
column7: 0.015#TD4037E.TXT.r#2403225#2403225#TD4037E.TXT.r_1547# de la sgra 'phags pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas rnams dang  sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams dang  byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang  rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sgra dang  de las gzhan pa'i sems  can rnams kyis de dag thos nas rjes su sgrogs par byed de / /
column8: 0.019#TD4037E.TXT.r#2404607#2404607#TD4037E.TXT.r_1647;TD4037E.TXT.r_1648# bdag dang gzhan  yang 'jigs pa chen po las yongs su skyob par byed pas na / / +bzod pa des bdag dang gzhan la yang phan 'dogs so // /
column9: 0.024#TD4037E.TXT.r#2403708#2403708#TD4037E.TXT.r_1581# byang chub sems dpas lha'i  mig gis phyogs bcu'i sems can rnams kyi las kyi spyod pa dge ba dang  mi dge ba dag gzigs nas ci rigs ci 'os par de dag la nan tan mdzad do // /
column10: 0.024#TD4037E.TXT.r#2405222#2405222#TD4037E.TXT.r_1692# rang bzhin gyis tshe rabs dgongs pa dang  sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir so sor brtags nas sdug bsngal yun ring ba rnam pa sna tshogs mi bzad pa rgyun mi 'chad pas mi mjed pa dang  sems can rnams kyi don kho na'i phyir sems  can gyi don sgrub pa'i sdug bsngal bas dga' ba dang  dga' ldan du skyes nas tshe'i tshad ji srid par dga' ldan na gnas pa dang  dga' ldan du skyes pa'i lha'i bu gzhan rnams gnas gsum po lha'i tshe dang  lha'i mdog dang  lha'i grags pas zil gyis gnon pa dang  yum gyi  lhums su gshegs pa na snang ba chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par mdzad pa dang  yang dag par mkhyen bzhin du yum gyi lhums su gshegs pa dang  gnas pa dang  bltam kha dang  bstams pa dang  bltams ma thag tu yang sus kyang ma brten par sa la gom pa bdun 'dor zhing tshig kyang  gsung ba dang  bltams pa na lha dang  klu dang  gnod sbyin dang  lha ma yin dang  nam mkha' lding dang  mi'am ci dang  lto 'phye chen po dang che ba dag gis lha'i me tog phreng dang  rol mo'i sgra dang  'dug pa dang  na bza' 'bul ba dang  gdugs dang  rgyal mtshan dang  ba dan la sogs     // /
column11: 0.024#TD4099E.TXT.r#221252#221252#TD4099E.TXT.r_2837# mi ni rtag tu dran pa ldan pa dang  rtag tu kha zas kyi ni tshod shes pa // /
column12: 0.026#TD4086E.TXT.r#2330938#2330938#TD4086E.TXT.r_749;TD4086E.TXT.r_750# de'i lam srid du dpag tshad nyi shu / / +zheng du dpag  tshad phyed dang gnyis yod pa dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa gser gyi phye ma bdal zhing tsandan gyi chus chag chag btab pa zhig yod de / /
column13: 0.027#TD4099E.TXT.r#221519#221519#TD4099E.TXT.r_2872# mi gang khyim 'bigs byed pa dang / /
column14: 0.028#TD4099E.TXT.r#224979#224979#TD4099E.TXT.r_3336# ji ltar khang steng gyogs legs na // /

column3: dben dang dge ba mchog la mngon par dga' // /
column4: 0.017#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#496662#496662#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7426# mthu chen po dang  ldan pa lha'i bu nyi ma dang zla bas phyin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir dang  sems can thams cad kyi thun mong gi las kyi dbang gis mngon par grub pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: rgyal ba'i sras kyi yan lag ldan pa yi // / +yang dag yongs su smin pa'i mtshan nyid do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#532751#532765#TD4026E.TXT.r_3107;TD4026E.TXT.r_3108;TD4026E.TXT.r_3109# nga rgyal phra dang nga rgyal med par 'dod // /

column3: de ltar dngos po rnam dgus smin pa'i  bdag / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#532764#532773#TD4026E.TXT.r_3108;TD4026E.TXT.r_3109;TD4026E.TXT.r_3110# chos yongs su tshol ba ni rnam pa bcu gsum ste / / +rgyas pa ni thos pa la mos pa rgyas  pas so ; / /

column3: pha rol yongs su smin byed rung dang ldan // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#532772#532783#TD4026E.TXT.r_3109;TD4026E.TXT.r_3110;TD4026E.TXT.r_3111# rgyas pa ni thos pa la mos pa rgyas  pas so ; / / +lhag pa'i bsam pa ni chos kyi sgo'i rgyun gyis so // /
column5: 0.024#TD4026E.TXT.r#531827#531827#TD4026E.TXT.r_3015# rten yin dbang phyug la sogs min // /

column3: chos kyi rang bzhin rgyun 'phel bdag nyid can // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#532784#532799#TD4026E.TXT.r_3111;TD4026E.TXT.r_3112;TD4026E.TXT.r_3113# chen po ni dbang 'byor pa thob pa rnams kyi'o // /

column3: rtag tu 'gro ba'i gnyen mchog gyur pa yin // /
ji ltar rma dang zas la de dag gi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#532800#532809#TD4026E.TXT.r_3113;TD4026E.TXT.r_3114;TD4026E.TXT.r_3115# spang ba med pa ni gnyis pa'o // / +dbang 'byor pa ni gsum pa'o // /

column3: gzag dang spyad du rung ba smin 'dod ltar // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#532808#532819#TD4026E.TXT.r_3114;TD4026E.TXT.r_3115;TD4026E.TXT.r_3116# dbang 'byor pa ni gsum pa'o // / +sku med pa ni thos pa dang bsams pa las byung ba ste / /

column3: de bzhin rten 'dir phyogs gnyis  zhi ba dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#532818#532827#TD4026E.TXT.r_3115;TD4026E.TXT.r_3116;TD4026E.TXT.r_3117# sku med pa ni thos pa dang bsams pa las byung ba ste / / +chos  kyi sku dang bral ba'i phyir ro // /

column3: de bzhin spyad pa nyid du smin pa bstan // / +lus can bral bar smin byed de bzhin du // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#532828#532844#TD4026E.TXT.r_3116;TD4026E.TXT.r_3117;TD4026E.TXT.r_3118;TD4026E.TXT.r_3119# chos  kyi sku dang bral ba'i phyir ro // / +sku dang bcas pa ni mos pas spyod pa ni bsgoms pa las byung ba'o // /

column3: yongs smin rab smin mthun par smin byed gzhan // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#532842#532853#TD4026E.TXT.r_3118;TD4026E.TXT.r_3119;TD4026E.TXT.r_3120# sku thob pa ni sa bdun po dag la'o // /

column3: legs par smin byed rtogs pas smin byed dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#532852#532861#TD4026E.TXT.r_3119;TD4026E.TXT.r_3120;TD4026E.TXT.r_3121# sku yongs su rdzogs pa ni sa lhag pa rnams la'o // / +nga rgyal mang ba ni mos pas spyod pa'i sa la'o // /

column3: rtag smin gong du smin byed bshad par 'dod // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#532862#532870#TD4026E.TXT.r_3120;TD4026E.TXT.r_3121;TD4026E.TXT.r_3122# nga rgyal mang ba ni mos pas spyod pa'i sa la'o // / +nga rgyal phra ba ni sa bdun pa dag  la'o ; / /

column3: ji ltar rgyal sras  phan pa'i bsam pas 'dir // / +'gro kun rnam par smin byed gnas pa ltar // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#525753#525756#TD4026E.TXT.r_2438;TD4026E.TXT.r_2439# yang dag pa ma yin pa las kun brtags pa da kun rdzob kyi bden par dmigs so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#532871#532878#TD4026E.TXT.r_3121;TD4026E.TXT.r_3122;TD4026E.TXT.r_3123# nga rgyal phra ba ni sa bdun pa dag  la'o ; / / +nga rgyal med pa ni sa lhag ma rnams la'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#532879#532886#TD4026E.TXT.r_3122;TD4026E.TXT.r_3123# nga rgyal med pa ni sa lhag ma rnams la'o // / +rgyu gnyis kyi chos yongs su btsal ba la tshigs su bcad pa / /

column3: de bzhin pha dang ma dang gnyen bshes rnams // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#532887#532895#TD4026E.TXT.r_3123;TD4026E.TXT.r_3124# rgyu gnyis kyi chos yongs su btsal ba la tshigs su bcad pa / /
column5: 1.192#TD4037E.TXT.r#2391921#2391923#TD4037E.TXT.r_675# bden pa'i tshig dang ldan zhing phra ma med pa dang  tshig rtsub po med pa dang  tshig kyal pa med pa la goms pa ni tshig btsun pa'i rgyu yin no // /

column3: bu dang gnyen pa rnams la legs mi gnas // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#532896#532905#TD4026E.TXT.r_3124;TD4026E.TXT.r_3125# bstan bcos gzugs dang gzugs min la // /

column3: ji ltar brtse bdag bde dang phan phyir sbyor // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#532906#532923#TD4026E.TXT.r_3125;TD4026E.TXT.r_3126;TD4026E.TXT.r_3127;TD4026E.TXT.r_3128# mtshan dang de bzhin nad med dang / / +mngon shes rnams kyis dbang phyug dang / /
column5: 0.028#TD4035E.TXT.r#258172#258172#TD4035E.TXT.r_2334# de la so thams thams dang  kyi hud zer dang  aa cu zer ba ni tshig tu brjod pa las sems can de dag gi ming du btags pa'o // /
column6: 0.028#TD4086E.TXT.r#2368070#2368070#TD4086E.TXT.r_3271;TD4086E.TXT.r_3272# dbyibs legs shing blta na  sdug la mdzes ba dngul las grub pa ste / / +de na gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje rnams gnas so // /

column3: sems can gzhan la byams 'dod de ltar ni // /
skye bo bdag la'ang byams par mi 'dod na // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#532924#532932#TD4026E.TXT.r_3127;TD4026E.TXT.r_3128# de zad me shes nyid kyi rgyu // / +chos ni gzugs la ni mtshan gyi rgyu'o // /

column3: rab sdug skye bo gzhan brten smos ci dgos // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#532933#532942#TD4026E.TXT.r_3128;TD4026E.TXT.r_3129;TD4026E.TXT.r_3130# chos ni gzugs la ni mtshan gyi rgyu'o // / +gzugs ma yin pa la ni nad med pa'i rgyu ste / /
column5: 0.020#TD4086E.TXT.r#2330351#2330351#TD4086E.TXT.r_694# ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang nas  dpag tshad bcu'i tshu rol na mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba zhig yod de / /

column3: byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang longs spyod dag / / +gzhan la mi sbyin pa ni yod med de // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#532943#532957#TD4026E.TXT.r_3129;TD4026E.TXT.r_3130;TD4026E.TXT.r_3131# gzugs ma yin pa la ni nad med pa'i rgyu ste / / +nyon mongs pa'i nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.014#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#2967153#2967159#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_6514;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_6515# kham  gyi zas ni rags pa dang phra ba'o // / +phra ba ni srid pa bar ma rnams kyi yin te / /
column6: 0.017#TD4047E.TXT.r#2218047#2218047#TD4047E.TXT.r_14471# de ltar sems mnyam par gzhag pa ni shes bya ji lta ba bzhin shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba smras pa / /
column7: 0.022#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#821442#821442#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_287# lha'i rna bas chos thos so // /
column8: 0.024#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2651723#2651723#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7477;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7478# bam po bco brgyad pa / / +de lta bas na ma 'ongs pa'i dus la yang snga phyi med pa'i phyir te ma 'ongs pa'i dus 'chol bar 'dug pa'i phyir rnam par smin pa'i rgyu snga la rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu 'phyi  bar rung ba ma yin no // /
column9: 0.024#TD4027E.TXT.r#1000775#1000775#TD4027E.TXT.r_684;TD4027E.TXT.r_685# thob par bya ba'i don dam pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste don gyi dam pa    yin pa'i phyir ro // / +sgrub pa don dam pa ni lam ste de'i don ni dam pa yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column10: 0.024#TD4035E.TXT.r#357010#357011#TD4035E.TXT.r_11645;TD4035E.TXT.r_11646# log par mi slob pa'i phyir / / +mkhas pa'i mtshan nyid du ston to // /
column11: 0.024#TD4095E.TXT.r#187942#187942#TD4095E.TXT.r_7348;TD4095E.TXT.r_7349# de dag kyang / / +ji ltar stobs ni dang po dang / /
column12: 0.025#TD4051E.TXT.r#2271331#2271331#TD4051E.TXT.r_2938;TD4051E.TXT.r_2939# tshigs su bcad  pa 'dis ni sbyor ba'i lam bstan to // / +ji ltar mngon sum du 'gyur pa de ltar ston te / /
column13: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#840980#840980#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_1856;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_1857# 'phags pa kun dga' bo la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i chos rnams zlos pa de dag ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa dang tha dad pa med pa'i phyir 'di zhes bstan la / / +de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du bshad pas yang dag pa yin te / /
column14: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1751622#1751622#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9509# pha rol tu phyin pa drug rdzogs shing mthar phyin par bya ba'i phyir sbyin pa gtong zhing go gyon nas shes rab sgrub cing go gyon par byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column15: 0.029#TD4043E.TXT.r#655310#655310#TD4043E.TXT.r_687;TD4043E.TXT.r_688# de bzhin du yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni rgyu gcig cing dus gcig pa'i rnam par shes pa la brten pa ste bag chags sgo bar byed pa'i  phyir te / / +de dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i 'dod chags la sogs pa bzhin no // /
column16: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1732552#1732555#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8054# gzugs su nor pa  'di ni sngon po 'di ni ser po zhes rtogs pa'i mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa la bya ste / /
column17: 0.029#TD4086E.TXT.r#2330161#2330161#TD4086E.TXT.r_679;TD4086E.TXT.r_680# bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do // / +nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched pa'i tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa nyid khri ste / /

column3: phan 'dogs rnam pa gnyis kyis gzhan smin byed // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#532956#532967#TD4026E.TXT.r_3131;TD4026E.TXT.r_3132# mngon par shes pa rnams kyis dbang phyug rgyu yang yin no // /

column3: mnyam par sbyin pa'i yon  tan ngoms mi 'gyur // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#532965#532980#TD4026E.TXT.r_3132;TD4026E.TXT.r_3133;TD4026E.TXT.r_3134# de dag zag mi shes pa nyid kyi rgyu yang yin te / /
column5: 0.014#TD4086E.TXT.r#2322271#2322271#TD4086E.TXT.r_187;TD4086E.TXT.r_188# de bas ches shas chung ba dang  de bas chas yang bas ni bsdus gzhom du'o // / +de bas ches shas chung ba dang  de bas ches yang bas ni thig nag tu'o // /

column3: brtan pa rang bzhin lhag par 'tshe ba med // / +bdag dga' bag yod 'di la gzhan 'god cing // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#532980#532991#TD4026E.TXT.r_3134;TD4026E.TXT.r_3135# ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa na yang rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.027#TD4043E.TXT.r#655722#655722#TD4043E.TXT.r_722# ji skad du 'phags pa la dkar gshegs pa'i mdo las kyang / /
column6: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#896461#896461#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6157;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6158# stong pa    nyid du lta ba la mngon par zhen nas ji ltar skra nyag ma gcig la / / +cha drug cur gses pa tsam du lta na yang ngas mi snang ngo // /
column7: 0.029#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#2982694#2982694#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_7851# gang zag 'di'i dbang po 'di ni dus 'di srid kyis yul che ge mo zhig tu gang 'di la brten nas nyes pa 'di yongs su spangs shing yan lag 'di nye bar bsgrubs pa'i phyir sbyor ba 'dis nam skyes pa ni skye bar 'gyur ro // /

column3: phan rnam gnyis 'dogs rnam par smin pa dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#532990#532999#TD4026E.TXT.r_3135;TD4026E.TXT.r_3136# de nyid kyi phyir tshangs pas zhus pa'i mdo las / /

column3: rgyu mthun yon tan brgyud pas gzhan smin byed // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#532998#533007#TD4026E.TXT.r_3135;TD4026E.TXT.r_3136;TD4026E.TXT.r_3137# de nyid kyi phyir tshangs pas zhus pa'i mdo las / / +chos bzhi dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos yongs su tshol bar 'gyur te / /

column3: gzhan gnod byed la phan byed blo ldan  pa ; / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#533008#533019#TD4026E.TXT.r_3136;TD4026E.TXT.r_3137# chos bzhi dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos yongs su tshol bar 'gyur te / / +dkon pa'i don gyis rin  po che'i 'du shes dang  nyon mongs pa'i nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i don gyis sman gyis 'du shes dang  chud mi za ba'i don nyis nor gyi 'du shes dang  sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi ba'i don gyis mya ngan las 'da' ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa zhes gsungs so // /

column3: gnod byed drag po dag kyang rab tu bzod // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#533020#533029#TD4026E.TXT.r_3137# dkon pa'i don gyis rin  po che'i 'du shes dang  nyon mongs pa'i nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i don gyis sman gyis 'du shes dang  chud mi za ba'i don nyis nor gyi 'du shes dang  sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi ba'i don gyis mya ngan las 'da' ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa zhes gsungs so // /
column5: 0.029#TD4037E.TXT.r#2404927#2404927#TD4037E.TXT.r_1674;TD4037E.TXT.r_1675# zhi zhing rab tu zhi la sems  'dod chags dang bral bas sems can rnams kyi nang na gnod pa med cing rnam par mi 'khrugs pas gzhan la phan 'dogs so // / +bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu phyi ma la ye shes rnam par dag pa dang  mngon par shes pa mngon par sgrub pa dang  rnam par dag pa'i lhar skye bar 'gyur te / /

column3: thabs rig gnod byed bzod pa de dag gis // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#533030#533040#TD4026E.TXT.r_3137# dkon pa'i don gyis rin  po che'i 'du shes dang  nyon mongs pa'i nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i don gyis sman gyis 'du shes dang  chud mi za ba'i don nyis nor gyi 'du shes dang  sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi ba'i don gyis mya ngan las 'da' ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa zhes gsungs so // /

column3: gnod byed dge ba yang dag len du 'jug / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#533038#533048#TD4026E.TXT.r_3137;TD4026E.TXT.r_3138# dkon pa'i don gyis rin  po che'i 'du shes dang  nyon mongs pa'i nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i don gyis sman gyis 'du shes dang  chud mi za ba'i don nyis nor gyi 'du shes dang  sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi ba'i don gyis mya ngan las 'da' ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa zhes gsungs so // /
column5: 0.022#TD4026E.TXT.r#527106#527106#TD4026E.TXT.r_2575;TD4026E.TXT.r_2576# yang dag min rtog yang dag min // / +yang dag ma yin min mi rtog / /

column5: 0.020#TD4013E.TXT.r#1099383#1099383#TD4013E.TXT.r_318# bkod pa'i rnam pa thams cad kyi rab kyi mthar phyin pa dang  gang chos kyi mchod pa bla na med pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rang bzhin  snying rje chen po dang byang chub kyi sems kyis bsdus ba'i mchod pa de lta bu de dag gis rgyal ba de dag la mchod par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyor ro // /

column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#533590#533595#TD4026E.TXT.r_3180# rab dga'i yid kyis sems can sdug bsngal rnams la sbyin rnams rgya chen rtag gtong na // /

column3: gnas gyur chos dkar yon  tan mchog rab ldan pa thob pa sangs rgyas nyid // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#533617#533631#TD4026E.TXT.r_3181;TD4026E.TXT.r_3182;TD4026E.TXT.r_3183# chos yangs skye dgu rnams la rnam pa kun tu phan byed tshegs ches rnyed min zhing // / +shin tu btang yang zad med 'phel 'gyur ba lta lan cig ma yin smos ci  dgos ; / /
column5: 0.022#TD4026E.TXT.r#522907#522910#TD4026E.TXT.r_2190# de ni bag chag rtogs dang zhi ba dang  rab tu rtogs pas rnams par grol bar byed // /
column6: 0.022#TD4026E.TXT.r#522972#522975#TD4026E.TXT.r_2196;TD4026E.TXT.r_2197;TD4026E.TXT.r_2198# gnyis po de yang ci'i  phyir sde snod ces bya zhe na / / +smras pa // / +bsdus pa'i phyir te / /
column7: 0.024#TD4013E.TXT.r#1099428#1099428#TD4013E.TXT.r_321;TD4013E.TXT.r_322# zhes bya ba gsungs so // / +de bas na bdag gis de ltar ji skad smos pa kun du bzang po spyod pa yongs su sbyang ba bya    pa bstan pa'i tshogs mchod pa'i yo byad kyi khyad par 'jig rten thams cad las shin tu 'das pa skye bo thams cad kyi yid 'phrog pas rgyal ba de dag thams cad la phyag 'tshal te mchod par bya'o zhes bya ba yin no // /
column8: 0.028#TD4026E.TXT.r#522897#522897#TD4026E.TXT.r_2189# bsdus pa'i phyir te rgyu ni dugs 'dod do // /
column9: 0.028#TD4026E.TXT.r#522953#522953#TD4026E.TXT.r_2194# nyan thos kyi sde snod dang  byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod do // /

column3: de ni mi rtog rab dag shin tu yul chen ye shes lam gyis 'thob // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#533632#533647#TD4026E.TXT.r_3182;TD4026E.TXT.r_3183# shin tu btang yang zad med 'phel 'gyur ba lta lan cig ma yin smos ci  dgos ; / / +byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni snying rjes srog dang longs spyod tshegs chen pos rnyed cing zad par 'gyur bas snying po med pa dag kyang sems can sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba rnams la sbyin pa rgya chen po rtag tu gtong na / /
column5: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#2395594#2395598#TD4037E.TXT.r_965;TD4037E.TXT.r_966# de bzhin nyid tsam du 'dzin pa ma gtogs par chos gang yang    rung ste / / +ji lta bur yang rnam par rtog par mi byed do // /
column6: 0.016#TD4086E.TXT.r#2325541#2325543#TD4086E.TXT.r_395# 'dzam bu'i  gling gi mi rnams kha cig ni khru tshad de ltar brtsis pa'i khru phyed dang bzhi pa'o // /

column3: de bzhin gshegs pa de ni der bzhugs nas // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#511276#511281#TD4026E.TXT.r_1080# gcig gis ni tshogs chen po bas gas pa dang  ting nge 'dzin la brten nas ngas ma pa'i phyir chos  bsam pa nyid du rnam par nges pa nyid dang  yid kyi brjod pa yin pa'i phyir chos de dag don du snang bar rtogs lnga'i phyir de la 'jug pa rab tu ston te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#522249#522254#TD4026E.TXT.r_2121;TD4026E.TXT.r_2122;TD4026E.TXT.r_2123# de bzhin khyad par 'gro ba dang / / +chos ni mngon par rtogs pa dang / /
column6: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#533648#533656#TD4026E.TXT.r_3183# byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni snying rjes srog dang longs spyod tshegs chen pos rnyed cing zad par 'gyur bas snying po med pa dag kyang sems can sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba rnams la sbyin pa rgya chen po rtag tu gtong na / /
column7: 0.017#TD4026E.TXT.r#542232#542234#TD4026E.TXT.r_4077;TD4026E.TXT.r_4078# tshigs su bcad pa gsum po 'di dag gis ni gdams ngag gi che ba nyid ston te / / +gang gis chos  kyi sgo'i rgyun la gdams ngag 'thob pa des ni rtag tu sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ro // /
column8: 0.028#TD4026E.TXT.r#504744#504744#TD4026E.TXT.r_444# dge ba rnam pa bzhi bshad pa gang yin pa de yang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten ma yin pa dang  yongs su smin par byed pa dang  dbang 'byor pa rnyed pas te // /

column3: ri dbang mtho steng bzhugs bzhin 'gro la gzigs // /

column3: zhi bar mngon dga'i 'gro la'ang  thugs rje na // /
srid la mngon dga'i skye bo gzhan ci smos // /

column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#533742#533743#TD4026E.TXT.r_3190;TD4026E.TXT.r_3191# skye bo nyid kyi chos la kun nas drangs te nyid zhi zhal gyi sgo // / +rnam par dag pa rgya chen thun mong zad mi shes la yang dag bkod // /
column6: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#2440861#2440871#TD4037E.TXT.r_4412# byang chub sems dpa'i sems mngon par spro ba sbyangs pa bar chad med pa phyin ci ma log pa dang  de las byung ba'i lus dang ngag dang  yid kyi yongs su gyo ba gang yin  pa ste ; /
column7: 0.0#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2701459#2701470#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_10624;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_10625# de ni gsum 'dus tshun chad do // / +zhes bya ba ni skye mched drug po de ni gsum 'dus tshun chad de dbang po dang  yul dang rnam par shes pa gsum 'dus tshun chad do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig  go // /
column8: 0.0#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3109877#3109887#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1967;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1968;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1969# dge slong dag rigs kyi bu de'i skye ba ni 'gag pa ste / / +chos rnams la chos rnams rjes su rab tu shes te / /
column9: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#461914#461918#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4789# tshul khrims kyis ni bde zhing zhi bar byed pa'i phyir bsil byed  ces bya'o ; / /
column10: 0.029#TD4009E.TXT.r#596192#596192#TD4009E.TXT.r_939# shes rab kyis rab  tu brtags nas 'du byed rnams kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs pa ni stong pa nyid do // /
column11: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#2114889#2114889#TD4047E.TXT.r_6356# yang thams cad kyang 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid bzhir tu mi 'dor bar zhes bya bas rnam pa dgu po nyid mtshan nyid rnam pa  bzhi por gzhag par bya ste / /
column12: 0.029#TD4068E.TXT.r#1095380#1095380#TD4068E.TXT.r_4511# nam lha sbyin gyi mig gi  rnam par shes pa skyed par byed pa dang  nam lha sbyin gyi mig gi dbang pos mig gi rnam par shes pa mi skyed pa'i mig gnyi ga yang mig gi dbang por rigs 'dra bas na de dang mtshungs pa zhes bya'o // /
column13: 0.029#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#2963613#2963613#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_6229;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_6230# yang ci tshor ba reg pa'i 'og tu 'byung ngam / / +'on te dus mnyam du 'byung zhe na / /

column3: gnas la 'jug dang rab 'jug mi 'jug dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#533687#533697#TD4026E.TXT.r_3186;TD4026E.TXT.r_3187;TD4026E.TXT.r_3188# 'phel bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos / / +chos la don med pa nyid dang don yod pa nyid kyi tshigs su bcad pa gnyis te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#2963620#2963622#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_6230;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_6231# 'on te dus mnyam du 'byung zhe na / / +bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re phan tshun du lhan cig tu 'byung ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir dus mnyam mo zhes zer ro // /
column6: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#422412#422413#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1938# 'di dag gi mtshan nyid rgya cher bshad pa ni slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa dang  'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje gcod pa'i 'grel pa slob  dpon yon tan byin gyis mdzad pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column8: 0.020#TD4047E.TXT.r#2114899#2114900#TD4047E.TXT.r_6356;TD4047E.TXT.r_6357# yang thams cad kyang 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid bzhir tu mi 'dor bar zhes bya bas rnam pa dgu po nyid mtshan nyid rnam pa  bzhi por gzhag par bya ste / / +ji ltar rigs par rang gi mtshan nyid dang  rab tu dbye ba'i mtshan nyid dang  rgyu'i mtshan nyid dang  'bras bu'i mtshan nyid do // /
column9: 0.020#TD4068E.TXT.r#1095388#1095389#TD4068E.TXT.r_4511# nam lha sbyin gyi mig gi  rnam par shes pa skyed par byed pa dang  nam lha sbyin gyi mig gi dbang pos mig gi rnam par shes pa mi skyed pa'i mig gnyi ga yang mig gi dbang por rigs 'dra bas na de dang mtshungs pa zhes bya'o // /
column10: 0.023#TD4037E.TXT.r#2455669#2455669#TD4037E.TXT.r_5464;TD4037E.TXT.r_5465# bgo skal gcig pa la mi 'drid pa yin / / +rin po che'am / /
column11: 0.023#TD4064E.TXT.r#759116#759116#TD4064E.TXT.r_51;TD4064E.TXT.r_52# kun rdzob tu yang dngos po med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // / +rten med na kun rdzob du mi rung  ba ste / /
column12: 0.027#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#2963865#2963866#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_6245;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_6246# dper nas bon snga la myu gu 'phyi ba dang  'o ma  snga la zho 'phyi ba dang  bsnun pa snga la sgra 'phyi ba dang  yid snga la yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'phyi ba zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'o // / +rgyu dang 'bras bu dag snga phyi'i dngos por ma grub pa yang ma yin mod kyi lhan cig pa'i dngos por yang 'grub ste / /

column3: ldog dang kun 'jug gnyis dang mi gnyis dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#533698#533709#TD4026E.TXT.r_3187;TD4026E.TXT.r_3188# chos la don med pa nyid dang don yod pa nyid kyi tshigs su bcad pa gnyis te / / +gang phyir so so rang rig bya phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis chos ma bstan // /
column5: 0.013#TD4037E.TXT.r#2397721#2397722#TD4037E.TXT.r_1140# 'di ni re zhig 'thad pas sgrub pa'i rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa yin te / /

column5: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#453094#453094#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4209# de la dang po bcom ldan 'das kyis  'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni 'chad pa po dang  nyan pa po smos so // /
column6: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#468816#468817#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5290# ltung ba  las 'byung ba bstan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni drug pa ltung ba las 'byin pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa ni sdig pa bshags shing nyes pa las 'byin pa'i chos yin te / /
column7: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#483770#483771#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6482;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6483# nam mkha' la sogs pa la med pa lta bu'o // / +rtsol ba ma yin pa bar chad med pas bskyed par dam bca' ba ni / /

column13: 1.192#TD4037E.TXT.r#2397967#2397967#TD4037E.TXT.r_1164# btags pa de dag ni dngos po de de'i bdag nyid yin no zhes bya bar de ltar mi bzhed de / /
column14: 1.192#TD4086E.TXT.r#2340795#2340795#TD4086E.TXT.r_1396# ra ba de la rtsig skyabs gser las byas pa dang  dngul las byas pa dang  bee d'urya las byas pa dang  shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhi  yod do // /
column15: 1.192#TD4086E.TXT.r#2341359#2341360#TD4086E.TXT.r_1435# bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang  sbrang rtsi dang  sbrang chang gi btung ba dag kyang yod do // /

column17: 1.192#TD4086E.TXT.r#2347820#2347820#TD4086E.TXT.r_1872# thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang  skad yid du 'ong ba dang  skad snyan pa dang   'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to // /
column18: 1.192#TD4086E.TXT.r#2366105#2366105#TD4086E.TXT.r_3101# rgyal  po sa bdag gi bu tsha rgyud dang tsha bo dang yang tsha'i rgyud kyi rgyal po stong gis yang grong khyer 'thab med du rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas so // /
column19: 1.192#TD4099E.TXT.r#222271#222271#TD4099E.TXT.r_2971# nam mkha' la ni rjes lta bur // /

column21: 1.192#TD4099E.TXT.r#222720#222721#TD4099E.TXT.r_3030;TD4099E.TXT.r_3031# 'jig rten ma rgyal chung zad med // /
column22: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#454810#454810#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4338;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4339# de'i gzhung gis 'dod pa'i so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa la bdag nyid med pa'i phyir ro // / +'dir  yang theg pa chen po'i bstan pa las ni / /
column23: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#482984#482984#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6426# bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las ni de ltar 'byung ba'i phyir zhes 'byung ste / /
column24: 0.016#TD4037E.TXT.r#2391342#2391342#TD4037E.TXT.r_629# phan pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni bde ba sbyin    pa yin par shes par bya ste / /

column26: 0.016#TD4086E.TXT.r#2360514#2360514#TD4086E.TXT.r_2744;TD4086E.TXT.r_2745# de nas sems can bskal pa'i rang bzhin gzhan zhig gis sa'i bcud mdzub mo'i thor tos blangs te myangs so // / +ji tsam du myong bar byed pa de tsam du sred par 'gyur ro // /

column5: 0.029#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2701463#2701463#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_10625# zhes bya ba ni skye mched drug po de ni gsum 'dus tshun chad de dbang po dang  yul dang rnam par shes pa gsum 'dus tshun chad do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig  go // /

column5: 0.020#TD4026E.TXT.r#533800#533800#TD4026E.TXT.r_3194;TD4026E.TXT.r_3195# nyon mongs pa dang  shes bya'i sgrib pa bag chags dang bcas pa rnam par dag pas rnam par dag pa rgya che ba dang  sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba dang  gtan du ba'i phyir zad mi shes pa yang yin no // / +de ltas rnal 'byor can gyis sgom pa gang  yin de ni don med min // /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#473556#473558#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5665# sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun tshul khrims rnam pa bzhi po dag la mngon par yid ches pa gang yin pa ste / /

column6: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#536669#536672#TD4026E.TXT.r_3492;TD4026E.TXT.r_3493# sangs rgyas la brnyas pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por gsungs pa ni 'di ltar nga nyid de'i dus na yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs su gyur to zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o // / +chos la brnyas pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por gsungs pa ni / /
column7: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#2386197#2386199#TD4037E.TXT.r_185;TD4037E.TXT.r_186# don dang ldan pa'i brtsal ba chen po dag la yang shas cher skyo bar mi byed na / /
column8: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#2403320#2403323#TD4037E.TXT.r_1553# sgra 'phags pa ma yin pa rnams ni sems can rnams kyi brdzun du smra ba dang  phra ma dang  ngag rtsub po dang  tshig kyal pa'i sgra gang yin pa rnams dang  'og tu  ngan song du skyes pa rnams dang  gong du lha'i nang du skyes pa rnams dang  thad kar mi'i nang du skyes pa rnams kyi'o // /
column9: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#2404779#2404781#TD4037E.TXT.r_1664# dge ba'i phyogs la brtson pas gzhan la lus dang  ngag gis rnam par mi 'tshe ba dang  gzhan dag kyang brtson 'grus rtsom pa la 'dun pa skyed de / /
column10: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#2405035#2405036#TD4037E.TXT.r_1683# thams cad du rigs par lung 'bogs pas tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la phan pa dang  bde bas sems can rnams la yang phan 'dogs so // /
column11: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#2405364#2405368#TD4037E.TXT.r_1695# 'jig rten du dam pa'i chos bshad par  bskul ba dang  'brug sgra chen po yang mi gsan cing mi bzhengs pas snyoms par 'jug pa zhi ba dang  byang chub sems dpa' la ri dvags dang  bya dang  tha na ri dvags phra mo rnams kyang mchog tu yid rton te / /
column12: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#2406122#2406126#TD4037E.TXT.r_1745;TD4037E.TXT.r_1746# yongs su smin pa ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa drug tu rig par bya ste / /
column13: 0.0#TD4086E.TXT.r#2357137#2357139#TD4086E.TXT.r_2495# sa chen po 'di dang  ri'i rgyal po ri rab bsregs shing tshig pa'i du ba yang med / /
column14: 0.0#TD4086E.TXT.r#2357533#2357535#TD4086E.TXT.r_2540;TD4086E.TXT.r_2541;TD4086E.TXT.r_2542# dge slong dag 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa / / +mi brtan pa / /
column15: 0.0#TD4099E.TXT.r#226115#226117#TD4099E.TXT.r_3481;TD4099E.TXT.r_3482# skyo ba nye bar zhi gyur pa // / +de yis yid ni zhi gyur cing // /
column16: 0.016#TD4035E.TXT.r#237855#237858#TD4035E.TXT.r_495;TD4035E.TXT.r_496# 'gro ba lta ga la 'gyur / / +de'i phyir mi 'gro na yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro // /
column17: 0.016#TD4086E.TXT.r#2357708#2357710#TD4086E.TXT.r_2559# dge slong dag gang yun ring mo zhig 'das nas zhes bya ba nas de'i dus kyang yod la de'i skabs kyang yod do zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs te / /
column18: 0.016#TD4099E.TXT.r#220982#220984#TD4099E.TXT.r_2804# me nang lhung ba'i phye ma leb dang 'dra // /
column19: 0.026#TD4026E.TXT.r#536820#536820#TD4026E.TXT.r_3506# gang dag sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'  rnams la gnod pa byed pa de dag thams cad ni mtho ris su 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba lta bu'o // /

column3: sangs rgyas gzugs kyang mi snang ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#474727#474728#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5764;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5765# des brtags pa'i sems can yang med par skur ba btab pa'i phyir ro // / +sems yang dag par yod par 'dzin pa ni chos su sgro 'dogs pa'i mtha'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#475085#475087#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5790;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5791# 'jig rten rtag go zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du chos nyid las brtsams nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#477882#477883#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6011# de la 'du byed thams cad mi rtag ces bya ba ni 'dus byas rnams spyir bsdus pa'o // /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#478758#478759#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6082# 'di ltar sems can rnams da ltar bde ba dang  sdug bsngal gang ci myong ba dag ni las dge ba dang  mi dge ba la gnas pa nyid du  mthong bas las yongs su dag pa dang  yongs su ma dag pa dag gis ni gdon mi za bar 'bras bu rab tu 'dren cing chud mi za bar rab tu shes pas bdag bde ba dang  sdug bsngal myong ba ci yang med pa kho na rab tu shes pa'o // /
column8: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#529705#529706#TD4026E.TXT.r_2833;TD4026E.TXT.r_2834# rang gi mtshan nyid rang dang gzhan du 'gyur // / +kun nas nyon mongs pa dang khyab  bar la ; / /
column9: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#535458#535458#TD4026E.TXT.r_3362# rab tu 'jog pa dang  rnam par 'byed pa dang  rnam par 'brel pa ni go rims bzhin du stan pa dang   rnam par 'byed pa dang  the tshom gcod pa rnams kyis so // /
column10: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#235701#235701#TD4035E.TXT.r_297# gnyid kyis brtas nas de'i kun nas dkris pa mi bzod pa dang  bya ba yod pa de la sems gtad nas / /
column11: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#2385163#2385164#TD4037E.TXT.r_108;TD4037E.TXT.r_109# klan ka mi tshol lo // / +nor bu dang  mu tig dang  bee d'u rya dang  dung dang  man shel dang  byi ru dang  gser dang  dngul dang  rdo'i snying po dang  spug dang  rin po che dmar po dang  gyas su 'khyil pa la sogs pa yo byad kyi rnam pa dag la rmongs shing sems     // /
column12: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#2385917#2385918#TD4037E.TXT.r_164# bdag gi bran la sogs pa gyog 'khor rnams la yang snyan par smra zhing pha rol gyi zhe gcod pa mi smra na gzhan dag lta la ci smos yon tan la dga' ba yin te / /
column13: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#2386810#2386811#TD4037E.TXT.r_244;TD4037E.TXT.r_245# sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba shin tu chung ngu des reg na yang shas cher skyo ba skyed par 'gyur ro // / +der skyes pa'i sems can sdug bsngal ba de dag la yang 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi snying rje chen po'i rgyu'i rigs de nyid kyis bskul bas / /
column14: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#2387048#2387049#TD4037E.TXT.r_263;TD4037E.TXT.r_264# shas cher rgyun du brtson pa dang mi ldan pa 'di ni rgyu  gsum pa'o // / +gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang yang phrad la byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa dag la yang phyin ci ma log par slob cing / /
column15: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#2405036#2405036#TD4037E.TXT.r_1683# thams cad du rigs par lung 'bogs pas tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la phan pa dang  bde bas sems can rnams la yang phan 'dogs so // /
column16: 0.0#TD4086E.TXT.r#2357965#2357966#TD4086E.TXT.r_2575;TD4086E.TXT.r_2576# rgyar ni dpag tshad sa ya gcig dang  nyis 'bum dang  dpag tshad bzhi brgya lnga bcu  yod do // / +mtha' skor du ni dpag tshad sa ya phrag gsum dang  drug 'bum dang  dpag tshad sum brgya lnga bcu yod do // /
column17: 0.0#TD4099E.TXT.r#220614#220615#TD4099E.TXT.r_2760# ring byas rgyang ring byas pas gdung bar 'gyur // /
column18: 0.015#TD4035E.TXT.r#238344#238344#TD4035E.TXT.r_547# sgyu ma byas pa mthong ba bzhin no // /
column19: 0.015#TD4037E.TXT.r#2385673#2385675#TD4037E.TXT.r_147# 'di lta ste zhing las dang  tshong bya ba dang  ba lang 'tsho ba dang  rgyal po'i zha 'bring bya ba dang  yi ge bri ba dang  rtsis  bya ba dang  shod dgod pa dang  grangs bzung ba dang  lag rtsis bya ba dang  rje bo dang bsdums pa dang  khyim mi dang bsdums pa dang  mdza' bshes dang mi mdza' ba bsdums pa dang  rgyal po dang bsdums pa dang  longs spyod rnams sgrub pa dang  bsrung ba dang  bsdu ba dang  phyir  'gyed pa dang  gtong ba dang  bag ma gtong ba dang  bag ma len pa dang  lhag par za ba dang  'dus shing za ba rnams dang  de lta bu dang mthun pa dag la grogs byed du 'gro bar byed kyi / /
column20: 0.015#TD4037E.TXT.r#2398087#2398087#TD4037E.TXT.r_1176# dmigs pa de spong zhing btang snyoms can du gnas te / /
column21: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#473462#473463#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5657# de la thob pa lnga ni mngon du byas pa thob pa dang  shes pa mngon du byas pa thob pa dang  dad pa mngon du byas pa thob pa dang  'bras bu  mngon du byas pa thob pa dang  yon tan mngon du byas pa thob pa'o // /
column22: 0.016#TD4035E.TXT.r#238006#238007#TD4035E.TXT.r_506;TD4035E.TXT.r_507# ma'i mngal du 'jug par  'gyur ro // / +de la skye gnas kyi nyes ba gang zhe na / /
column23: 0.019#TD4037E.TXT.r#2390583#2390583#TD4037E.TXT.r_568# de la mya ngan las 'das pa dang  mya ngan las 'das pa yang dag par thob par byed pa dag dang  mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyogs 'jig rten pa dang  'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos de dag ni mdor bsdu na byang  chub sems dpa'i bdag dang gzhan gyi don phan pa'i rgyu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba yin te / /
column24: 0.019#TD4035E.TXT.r#244504#244504#TD4035E.TXT.r_1108;TD4035E.TXT.r_1109# de yang gnya' shing 'dzin dang mnyam mo de dag gang gi tshe ri rab las thag ring du rgyu ba de'i tshe ni dgun du mngon no // / +gang gi tshe nye bar rgyu ba de'i tshe ni tsha ba'i dus su mngon no // /
column25: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#474855#474855#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5774;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5775# 'dod pa lnga'i bde ba la  spyod pa gang yin pa de ni bde ba'i mtha'o // / +bdag nyid ltogs bzhin du dka' ba spyod pa gang yin pa de ni sdug bsngal la spyod pa'i mtha' ste / /
column26: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#475263#475264#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5803;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5804# rgyu dang rkyen gang gi phyir dngos po dgu po de dag la bsam par mi bya zhe na / / +smras pa / /
column27: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#475956#475956#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5851# rnam pa des gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po de yongs su shes pa'i phyir ro // /
column28: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#476539#476539#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5899# ming gi tshogs dang tshig gi tshogs dang  yi ge'i tshogs gang dag gis phung po rnams gdags par 'gyur ba'i phung po'i gdags pa de ni ming gi tshogs dang  tshig gi tshogs dang  yi ge'i tshogs de dag la ltos pa yin te / /
column29: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#477177#477177#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5950# 'thad pa sgrub pa'i rigs pa ni dam pa rnams kyi snying po 'phrog par byed pa'i tshad ma gsum po de dag gis 'di lta ste / /
column30: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#477548#477550#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5983# mtshan nyid lnga yang dag par bshad pa dang  rgol ba dag gi rjes su bzlas te bshad pa'o // /
column31: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#478129#478129#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6033# yid kyis myong ba'i mngon sum ni 'di lta ste / /
column32: 0.020#TD4037E.TXT.r#2403883#2403883#TD4037E.TXT.r_1594;TD4037E.TXT.r_1595# gya nom pa'i sems can 'di lta ste / / +gzugs med par skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyi yang mkhyen to // /
column33: 0.020#TD4084E.TXT.r#2316432#2316432#TD4084E.TXT.r_99;TD4084E.TXT.r_100# 'di rnams mtho ris chos  dag gi // / +'bras bu dag kyang mdor bsdus pa'o //// /
column34: 0.020#TD4037E.TXT.r#2387661#2387661#TD4037E.TXT.r_315;TD4037E.TXT.r_316# de la rkyen bzhi gang zhe na / / +'di la rigs kyi bu'am / /
column35: 0.021#TD4099E.TXT.r#227748#227748#TD4099E.TXT.r_3693# tshul khrims brtul  zhugs tsam dag gam // /
column36: 0.026#TD4026E.TXT.r#536820#536820#TD4026E.TXT.r_3506# gang dag sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'  rnams la gnod pa byed pa de dag thams cad ni mtho ris su 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba lta bu'o // /
column37: 0.029#TD4041E.TXT.r#2314671#2314671#TD4041E.TXT.r_1227;TD4041E.TXT.r_1228# phyi ma'i mtha' ni da ltar byung ba rnams la zad pa'i chos nyid du mi shes pa gang yin pa'o // / +sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' ni ma 'ongs pa rnams skye ba'i chos nyid dang skyes pa rnams zad  pa'i chos nyid du mi shes pa gang yin pa'o // /

column3: ji ltar me ni gzhan du 'bar // / +gzhan du zhi bar 'gyur ba ltar // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#533788#533799#TD4026E.TXT.r_3194;TD4026E.TXT.r_3195# nyon mongs pa dang  shes bya'i sgrib pa bag chags dang bcas pa rnam par dag pas rnam par dag pa rgya che ba dang  sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba dang  gtan du ba'i phyir zad mi shes pa yang yin no // /

column3: de bzhin sangs rgyas rnams la yang // / +snang dang mi snang shes par bya // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#533800#533815#TD4026E.TXT.r_3194;TD4026E.TXT.r_3195;TD4026E.TXT.r_3196# nyon mongs pa dang  shes bya'i sgrib pa bag chags dang bcas pa rnam par dag pas rnam par dag pa rgya che ba dang  sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba dang  gtan du ba'i phyir zad mi shes pa yang yin no // / +de ltas rnal 'byor can gyis sgom pa gang  yin de ni don med min // /

column3: ji ltar rnga dag ma brdungs par // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#533814#533824#TD4026E.TXT.r_3195;TD4026E.TXT.r_3196# de ltas rnal 'byor can gyis sgom pa gang  yin de ni don med min // / +de ltas bde bar gshegs kyi bstan pa gang yin de yang don med min // /
column5: 0.027#TD4013E.TXT.r#1099486#1099488#TD4013E.TXT.r_324# bstod pa bya ba dang  mchod pa'i mchog rnams kyis bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags nas / /

column3: sgra ni kun du  'byung ba ltar // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#525237#525238#TD4026E.TXT.r_2396# glo bur ba nyid rtogs pa dang  snang ba'i rgyu mtshan  rtogs pa dang  don mi dmigs pa rtogs pa dang  dmigs pa mi dmigs pa rtogs pa dang  chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa dang  gang zag la bdag med pa rtogs pa dang  chos la bdag med pa rtogs pa dang  bsam pa dman pa rtogs pa dang  yangs shing bdag nyid chen po'i     // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#533821#533832#TD4026E.TXT.r_3196;TD4026E.TXT.r_3197# de ltas bde bar gshegs kyi bstan pa gang yin de yang don med min // /
column6: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#240520#240522#TD4035E.TXT.r_747;TD4035E.TXT.r_748# 'di lta ste / / +pha ma gnyis kyis thog ma kho nar khu ba dang khrag gis sgrub par byed do // /
column7: 0.025#TD4099E.TXT.r#230940#230941#TD4099E.TXT.r_4078;TD4099E.TXT.r_4079# gang zhig 'dod chags zhe sdang dang / / +nga rgyal 'chab pa 'joms pa de // /
column8: 0.028#TD4026E.TXT.r#528537#528537#TD4026E.TXT.r_2723# med pa la yang med pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba'o // /

column3: de bzhin rgyal ba gzo med par // / +bshad pa dag ni kun du 'byung // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#533830#533845#TD4026E.TXT.r_3196;TD4026E.TXT.r_3197;TD4026E.TXT.r_3198# de ltas bde bar gshegs kyi bstan pa gang yin de yang don med min // / +gal te thos pa tsam gyis don mthong 'gyur na sgom pa don med 'gyur // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#545545#545549#TD4026E.TXT.r_4374# 'di ltar thabs de ni yid la byed pa thams cad mngon par 'grub par byed pa yin no // /
column6: 0.025#TD4026E.TXT.r#525237#525237#TD4026E.TXT.r_2396# glo bur ba nyid rtogs pa dang  snang ba'i rgyu mtshan  rtogs pa dang  don mi dmigs pa rtogs pa dang  dmigs pa mi dmigs pa rtogs pa dang  chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa dang  gang zag la bdag med pa rtogs pa dang  chos la bdag med pa rtogs pa dang  bsam pa dman pa rtogs pa dang  yangs shing bdag nyid chen po'i     // /

column3: ji ltar nor bu 'bad med par // / +rang gi 'od ni ston pa ltar // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#533844#533856#TD4026E.TXT.r_3197;TD4026E.TXT.r_3198;TD4026E.TXT.r_3199# gal te thos pa tsam gyis don mthong 'gyur na sgom pa don med 'gyur // / +gal te ma thos par yang sgom 'jug 'gyur na bstan pa don med 'gyur // /

column3: sangs rgyas rnams kyang gzo med par // / +de bzhin mdzad pa nges pa ston // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#533858#533871#TD4026E.TXT.r_3199;TD4026E.TXT.r_3200# de lta bas na rnal 'byor  can rnams kyi bsgom pa don med par mi 'gyur te / /
column5: 0.024#TD4051E.TXT.r#2246454#2246454#TD4051E.TXT.r_943# nying mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes  pa'i dus na bsod nams dang  bsod nams ma yin pa dang  mi gyo ba'i 'du byed 'gags nas yun ring ba'i phyir ro // /

column3: ji ltar mkha' la 'jig rten gyi // / +bya ba  rgyun mi 'chad par snang // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#533870#533890#TD4026E.TXT.r_3200;TD4026E.TXT.r_3201;TD4026E.TXT.r_3202# de'i dbang gis so so rang gis rig par bya ba'i chos rtogs pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: de bzhin zag med dbyings na yang // /
rgyal ba'i mdzad pa rgyun mi 'chad // / +ji ltar mkha' la rtag tu ni // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#533891#533904#TD4026E.TXT.r_3202;TD4026E.TXT.r_3203# rigs par bshad pa'i chos rnams kyis nyid kyi chos nyid la skye bo kun nas 'dren pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: bya ba nyams shing 'byung ba ltar // / +de bzhin zag med dbyings na yang // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#533905#533924#TD4026E.TXT.r_3202;TD4026E.TXT.r_3203;TD4026E.TXT.r_3204# rigs par bshad pa'i chos rnams kyis nyid kyi chos nyid la skye bo kun nas 'dren pa'i phyir ro // / +bsgom pa dang  bshad pa ji ltar na don med par mi 'gyur ba de ni tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyis ston to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#534137#534140#TD4026E.TXT.r_3224;TD4026E.TXT.r_3223# bzhi pas ni bden pa gnyis kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid dang  rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid kyi de kho na nyid rnam pa gnyis ston par 'gyur ro // /
column6: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#266095#266096#TD4035E.TXT.r_3048;TD4035E.TXT.r_3049# rtag pa'i chos ni skye ba'i  rgyu 'am / / +thob pa'i rgyu 'am / /
column7: 1.192#TD4035E.TXT.r#242248#242248#TD4035E.TXT.r_910# de bzhin  du 'jig rten zhig pa yang bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur gnas so // /
column8: 0.016#TD4035E.TXT.r#256224#256224#TD4035E.TXT.r_2160# des sems can de dag lcags kyis gzhi la kun tu gcod cing / /
column9: 0.018#TD4035E.TXT.r#248951#248952#TD4035E.TXT.r_1490# de'i 'og tu de dang 'byung ba yid la byed pa nye bar gnas par gyur na / /
column10: 0.020#TD4035E.TXT.r#258661#258662#TD4035E.TXT.r_2377# zas dang skom la sgrib pa yod pa rnams gang zhe na / /
column11: 0.020#TD4099E.TXT.r#228651#228651#TD4099E.TXT.r_3804;TD4099E.TXT.r_3805# sbrul gyis  dug btang ba la sman bzhin du // / +chags pa langs pa 'dul ba'i dge slong gang // /
column12: 0.023#TD4099E.TXT.r#228866#228867#TD4099E.TXT.r_3825;TD4099E.TXT.r_3826# gti mug ma lus drungs 'byin dge slong gang // / +de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po // /
column13: 0.024#TD4037E.TXT.r#2405615#2405616#TD4037E.TXT.r_1706;TD4037E.TXT.r_1707# myos pa dang  sems 'khrugs pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong na rang gi sems thob par 'gyur ba dang  bud med mngal mi mthun par gnas pa rnams mngal mthun par gnas par 'gyur ba dang  long ba rnams mig thob par 'gyur ba dang  'on pa rnams rna bas  thos par 'gyur ba dang  chags pa rnams 'dod chags kyi kun nas dkris pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang  zhe sdang ba rnams zhe sdang gi kun nas dkris pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang  rmongs pa rnams gti mug gi kun nas dkris pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang  de lta bu dang mthun pa rnams ni  mthong bas phan 'dogs par mdzad pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i mthu yin par rig par bya'o // / +de la 'phags pa'i spyod pa dang  gnas pas bsdus pa lhan cig skyes pa'i mthu ni 'di lta ste / /
column14: 0.025#TD4035E.TXT.r#270215#270215#TD4035E.TXT.r_3451# skye mched bcu gnyis po ji snyed pa thams cad yod do zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa de yang / /
column15: 0.026#TD4037E.TXT.r#2384463#2384464#TD4037E.TXT.r_51# de la yang dag  par bsgrubs pa'i rigs ni sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba goms par byas pa las thob pa gang yin pa ste / /
column16: 0.026#TD4037E.TXT.r#2384830#2384831#TD4037E.TXT.r_82# nyan thos ni nyan thos kyi byang chub kyi 'bras bu thob par byed do / /
column17: 0.026#TD4037E.TXT.r#2385684#2385684#TD4037E.TXT.r_147# 'di lta ste zhing las dang  tshong bya ba dang  ba lang 'tsho ba dang  rgyal po'i zha 'bring bya ba dang  yi ge bri ba dang  rtsis  bya ba dang  shod dgod pa dang  grangs bzung ba dang  lag rtsis bya ba dang  rje bo dang bsdums pa dang  khyim mi dang bsdums pa dang  mdza' bshes dang mi mdza' ba bsdums pa dang  rgyal po dang bsdums pa dang  longs spyod rnams sgrub pa dang  bsrung ba dang  bsdu ba dang  phyir  'gyed pa dang  gtong ba dang  bag ma gtong ba dang  bag ma len pa dang  lhag par za ba dang  'dus shing za ba rnams dang  de lta bu dang mthun pa dag la grogs byed du 'gro bar byed kyi / /
column18: 0.026#TD4035E.TXT.r#246630#246630#TD4035E.TXT.r_1269;TD4035E.TXT.r_1270# gang des ma mthong ma thos par bdag nyid kyis bsams shing gcal la nye bar brtags nas / / +de la brten te / /
column19: 0.026#TD4035E.TXT.r#247471#247472#TD4035E.TXT.r_1320;TD4035E.TXT.r_1321# rgyur byas pa'i  gzugs la byed pa yin par rig par bya'o // / +gzugs 'dus pa la yang rdul phra rab ni nams kyang skye bar mi 'gyur ro // /
column20: 0.026#TD4035E.TXT.r#260979#260979#TD4035E.TXT.r_2554# ji lta ji ltar rkyen shin tu drag pa dang  shin tu mad ba dang  shin tu sna tshogs su gyur pa de lta de  ltar sdug bsngal gyi bye brag tu 'gyur ro // /
column21: 0.026#TD4035E.TXT.r#273162#273162#TD4035E.TXT.r_3735# des na bdag med bzhin du 'du byed tsam la bdag tu lta ba'i dbang gis bdag yod do snyam  du sems pa mi rung ste / /
column22: 0.026#TD4037E.TXT.r#2386840#2386840#TD4037E.TXT.r_247# 'di lta bu dang mthun pa dag gis na / /
column23: 0.026#TD4037E.TXT.r#2403468#2403471#TD4037E.TXT.r_1565# de la sgra sprul pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa sems la dbang thob pa rnams kyis  rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'dus byas pa gang yin pa rnams so // /
column24: 0.026#TD4086E.TXT.r#2334726#2334726#TD4086E.TXT.r_998# gang gi tshe 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du 'byung ba'i tshe rgya mtsho chen po dpag tshad gnyis kyi bar du chu skam zhing med par 'gyur te / /
column25: 0.026#TD4099E.TXT.r#227468#227468#TD4099E.TXT.r_3654;TD4099E.TXT.r_3655# sangs rgyas bstan la rab dang bas // / +mya ngan 'das dang nye ba'i phyir // /
column26: 0.026#TD4099E.TXT.r#228689#228689#TD4099E.TXT.r_3808;TD4099E.TXT.r_3809# sbrul gyis dug btang ba la sman bzhin du // / +khro ba langs pa 'dul ba'i dge slong gang // /
column27: 0.026#TD4099E.TXT.r#228981#228981#TD4099E.TXT.r_3836# mthu chung 'dam bu'i rags la klung chen ltar // /
column28: 0.026#TD4099E.TXT.r#229505#229505#TD4099E.TXT.r_3895;TD4099E.TXT.r_3896# de dag nyid la chags byed pa // / +byis pa'i skye bo blo ngan rnams // /
column29: 0.026#TD4099E.TXT.r#230802#230802#TD4099E.TXT.r_4061# bdag med su la'ang gnod mi byed // /
column30: 0.027#TD4035E.TXT.r#233239#233239#TD4035E.TXT.r_75# kha dog dang dbyibs dang rnam par rig byed thams cad kyang mig gi spyod yul dang  mig gi yul dang  mig gi rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul dang  mig gi rnam par shes pa'i yul dang  mig gi rnam par  shes pa'i dmigs pa dang  yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul dang  yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i yul dang  yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i rnam grangs su gtogs pa'o // /
column31: 0.029#TD4099E.TXT.r#214636#214636#TD4099E.TXT.r_1978;TD4099E.TXT.r_1979# gang zhig stong phrag stong dag gi / / +mi yi gyul las rgyal ba bas // /

column3: sangs rgyas 'phrin las skye zhing 'bri // / +snga ma phyi mar khyad med  kyang // /

column5: 0.018#TD4026E.TXT.r#542647#542649#TD4026E.TXT.r_4115# las rnams dag gis 'di na yid 'byung 'gyur ba med // /

column3: sgrib pa kun gyi dri med pa // / +de bzhin nyid ni sangs rgyas 'dod // /

column3: dag pa ma yin ma dag min // /
stong pa nyid ni rnam dag na // / +bdag med mchog gi bdag thob pas // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#533955#533969#TD4026E.TXT.r_3208;TD4026E.TXT.r_3209;TD4026E.TXT.r_3210# sa  dang gzugs ni thams cad dang / / +nam mkha' las kyang 'byung ba yin // /

column3: sangs rgyas dag pa'i bdag thob phyir // / +bdag nyid chen po'i bdag tu 'gyur // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#533970#533991#TD4026E.TXT.r_3210;TD4026E.TXT.r_3211;TD4026E.TXT.r_3212# de la dbang 'byor pa las ni sa chen po la zhugs pa rnams kyi gang yin pa'o // /
column5: 0.025#TD4026E.TXT.r#522652#522652#TD4026E.TXT.r_2165# mos pa'i bsod nams kyi khyad  par la tshigs su bcad pa gnyis te / /
column6: 0.025#TD4026E.TXT.r#542698#542698#TD4026E.TXT.r_4120# tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis kyis ni ldang ba'i thabs ston te / /

column3: de phyir  sangs rgyas yod min zhing // /
med par yang ni mi brjod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#533992#533999#TD4026E.TXT.r_3211;TD4026E.TXT.r_3212;TD4026E.TXT.r_3213# gzugs thams cad las ni shing dang sil snyan la sogs pa'i bar las kyang 'byung ba yin no // / +lhag ma ni don go  bar zad do // /

column3: de ltar sangs rgyas de skad 'dri // / +lung ma bstan pa'i tshul du 'dod // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#534000#534013#TD4026E.TXT.r_3212;TD4026E.TXT.r_3213;TD4026E.TXT.r_3214;TD4026E.TXT.r_3215# lhag ma ni don go  bar zad do // / +ston pa phun sum tshogs pa la tshigs su bcad pa gnyis te / /

column3: ji ltar lcags la tsha ba dang / / +mig la rab rib zhi ba ltar // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#534014#534028#TD4026E.TXT.r_3214;TD4026E.TXT.r_3215;TD4026E.TXT.r_3216;TD4026E.TXT.r_3217# rgya che the tshom spong ba dang / / +gzung 'os de nyid gnyis ston pa // /
column5: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#487739#487739#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6762;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6763# 'di ni mtshan nyid lnga pa rang gi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid ces bya ba ston to // / +'di ltar gong du bstan pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos dran pa nye bar  gzhag pa la sogs pa de dag gi bdag nyid ni 'dzin par byed pa yin pas / /

column3: sangs rgyas sems dang ye shes la // /

column5: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#499143#499143#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7599# theg pa gnyis kyi rigs can dag mi skye zhes bstan la / /

column3: yod dang med par mi brjod  do // /

column3: zag med dbyings na sangs rgyas rnams // /
mkha' ltar lus ni med phyir dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#534052#534061#TD4026E.TXT.r_3219# chos bzhi po dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang  bdag nyid kyi shes rab sbyangs pa dang  skyes bu dam pa'i las byed pa dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa dang  rnam par byang ba yang dag par ston pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po  rnams ni ches kyi sbyin pa chen po rnam par 'byed do zhes gang gsungs pa'i don bzhi ston pa yin te / /

column3: sngon gyi lus rjes 'brang ba'i phyir // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#534060#534069#TD4026E.TXT.r_3219# chos bzhi po dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang  bdag nyid kyi shes rab sbyangs pa dang  skyes bu dam pa'i las byed pa dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa dang  rnam par byang ba yang dag par ston pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po  rnams ni ches kyi sbyin pa chen po rnam par 'byed do zhes gang gsungs pa'i don bzhi ston pa yin te / /

column3: gcig min mang po nyid ma yin // /

column5: 0.028#TD4068E.TXT.r#1036329#1036329#TD4068E.TXT.r_611# sdug bsngal ni byung ba las gang bral bar 'dod pa'o zhes bya ba smos te / /

column3: stobs sogs sangs rgyas chos rnams la // / +byang chub rin chen 'byung gnas 'dra // /

column3: 'gro ba'i dge  ba'i lo tog la // / +sprin chen dang yang 'dra bar 'dod // /

column3: bsod nams ye shes rab rdzogs phyir // /

column5: 0.029#TD4086E.TXT.r#2379486#2379486#TD4086E.TXT.r_4208# de dag de na zhabs su'ang 'gro ste bskol zhing 'tshed la steng du'ang 'gro ste bskol zhing 'tshed do // /

column3: zla ba nya ba lta bur 'dod // / +ye shes snang ba byed pa'i phyir // /

column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#534124#534132#TD4026E.TXT.r_3223;TD4026E.TXT.r_3224# gsum pas ni kha na ma tho ba med pa'i las can yin pa'i phyir gzung bar 'os pa'o // /

column3: nyi ma chen po 'dra bar 'dod // / +ji ltar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi // /
column4: 0.028#TD4026E.TXT.r#533916#533916#TD4026E.TXT.r_3203# bsgom pa dang  bshad pa ji ltar na don med par mi 'gyur ba de ni tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyis ston to // /

column3: 'od zer dpag tu med 'dres     // / +shing // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#534141#534150#TD4026E.TXT.r_3224;TD4026E.TXT.r_3225# bzhi pas ni bden pa gnyis kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid dang  rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid kyi de kho na nyid rnam pa gnyis ston par 'gyur ro // /

column3: rtag tu bya ba gcig la 'jug / / +'jig rten la yang snang ba byed // /

column5: 1.192#TD4026E.TXT.r#534471#534474#TD4026E.TXT.r_3265;TD4026E.TXT.r_3266# rigs pa dang mi 'gal ba'i phyir ro // / +bshad pa ni 'brel pa ste / /

column3: de bzhin zag med dbyings na yang // /

column5: 1.192#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3109942#3109943#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1972# de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa phu skar sa ri lung bstan nas dge slong dag bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dga' zhing bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par rjes su yi rang ngo // /
column6: 0.027#TD4035E.TXT.r#246686#246686#TD4035E.TXT.r_1275;TD4035E.TXT.r_1276# rnam par shes pa'i tha snyad ces bya'o // / +tha snyad kyi gzhi mang po dag gang zhe na / /
column7: 0.027#TD4086E.TXT.r#2353495#2353496#TD4086E.TXT.r_2293# kha dog dang stobs dang bde ba dang longs spyod dag kyang 'phel bar snang gi / /

column3: sangs rgyas dpag tu med 'dres shing // /

column3: mdzad pa gcig ni mdzad pa la // / +ye shes snang bar mdzad par 'dod // /

column3: dper na  nyi ma'i 'od zer gcig / / +byung na 'od zer kun 'byung ba // /

column3: de bzhin sangs rgyas rnams kyi yang // / +ye shes 'byung bar shes par bya // /

column3: ji ltar nyi ma'i 'od zer dag / / +'jug la bdag ger bya ba med // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#534226#534239#TD4026E.TXT.r_3233;TD4026E.TXT.r_3234;TD4026E.TXT.r_3235# gsal ba ni zad par ston pas slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: de bzhin sangs ye shes kyang // / +'jug la bdag gir  mdzad mi mnga' // /

column5: 0.026#TD4037E.TXT.r#2391274#2391274#TD4037E.TXT.r_625# bde ba dang bcas pa dang yid bde ba dang bcas par sems can rnams mi dga' bzhin du bzlog par bya zhing drang bar bya'o // /

column3: de bzhin shes bya thams cad la // / +sangs rgyas ye shes cig car snang // /

column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#544628#544637#TD4026E.TXT.r_4310;TD4026E.TXT.r_4311# pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa bsam pa la brten pa ni rnam pa drug  ste ; / +ngoms mi shes pa'i bsam pa dang  rgya chen po'i bsam pa dang  dga' ba'i bsam pa dang  phan pa'i bsam pa dang  ma gos pa'i bsam pa dang  dge ba'i bsam pa'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4061E.TXT.r#2794286#2794294#TD4061E.TXT.r_4013# mchod sbyin pa rnams 'khor ba las thar bar bya  ba rnams la ci'i phyir kha na ma tho ba med par mi 'gyur zhe na / /
column7: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#424397#424404#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2100# dang po'i sgrib pa ni 'dod pa'i yul  la dga' ba dang  longs spyod dang bdag nyid kyi bsod nams la yon tan khyad par du 'phags par lta ba ste / /
column8: 1.788#TD4026E.TXT.r#545700#545711#TD4026E.TXT.r_4386;TD4026E.TXT.r_4387;TD4026E.TXT.r_4388# de la sbyin ba'i rab tu dbye ba la tshigs su bcad pa gnyis te / /

column3: ji ltar nyi ma'i 'od zer rnams // / +sprin la sogs pas bsgribs par 'dod // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#534274#534285#TD4026E.TXT.r_3239;TD4026E.TXT.r_3240;TD4026E.TXT.r_3241# kun tu 'gro ba ni theg pa gsum car la 'gro ba'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.020#TD4086E.TXT.r#2329179#2329179#TD4086E.TXT.r_601# zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste / /

column3: de bzhin sangs rgyas  ye shes rnams // / +sems can gyi ni nyes pas bsgribs // /

column5: 0.0#TD4086E.TXT.r#2336698#2336700#TD4086E.TXT.r_1124;TD4086E.TXT.r_1125# lha rnams pham na ni lha ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te / / +pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas shing rta byang phyogs su lha'i grong khyer gang na ba der phyir ldog go // /
column6: 0.013#TD4086E.TXT.r#2338313#2338314#TD4086E.TXT.r_1239;TD4086E.TXT.r_1240# lha rnams bsod nams dbang gi mthu stobs  kyis // /
column7: 0.024#TD4026E.TXT.r#522770#522770#TD4026E.TXT.r_2178# de ltar 'phags pa chen po'i chos ni yangs gyur la // /

column3: ji ltar mdud pa'i dbang gis na // / +gos la tshon bkra mi bkra ba // /

column5: 1.192#TD4086E.TXT.r#2370118#2370119#TD4086E.TXT.r_3471;TD4086E.TXT.r_3472# mu khyud 'dzin gyi rol mtsho yi // / +bar mtshams na ni mu khyud 'dzin // /

column3: de bzhin 'phen pa'i dbang gis na // / +grol ba'i ye shes bkra mi bkra // /

column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#534323#534330#TD4026E.TXT.r_3245;TD4026E.TXT.r_3246;TD4026E.TXT.r_3247# mi zhan pa ni grong khyer pa ste / / +'khor la khyab pa'i phyir ro // /
column6: 0.015#TD4086E.TXT.r#2382771#2382772#TD4086E.TXT.r_4436# shar phyogs  ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang phyogs kyang de bzhin no // /
column7: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#498011#498011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7502# mu stegs can rnams dang sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams dang rigs dang  rus dang cho rigs 'byor pa dang  rgyud pa tha dad pa rnams dang  nyes pa spyad pa spyod pa rnams dang  tshul  khrims ral ba rnams dang  ngan song rnams dang  theg pa dman pa rnams dang  bsam pa dang sbyor ba dman pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams so zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas dngos po brgyad rnyed sla ba'i lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column8: 0.017#TD4099E.TXT.r#222939#222940#TD4099E.TXT.r_3057;TD4099E.TXT.r_3058# nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba 'thob // / +gzhan la sdug bsngal bskyed pa yis // /
column9: 0.018#TD4026E.TXT.r#522459#522460#TD4026E.TXT.r_2145;TD4026E.TXT.r_2146# ji ltar bran ni rtag tu 'jigs shing skrag pa'i lus kyis rnam par rgyu // / +ji ltar rgyal po yang ni bka' yis yul la dbang bsgyur gnas pa ltar // /
column10: 0.018#TD4086E.TXT.r#2373966#2373966#TD4086E.TXT.r_3797;TD4086E.TXT.r_3798# kun tu bcad cing kun tu phug ste / / +kun tu gtub cing kun tu gshegs nas gang gi tshe gcig gis gcig bsad de shi bar gyur  pa de'i phyogs gcig tu 'du'o // /
column11: 0.018#TD4026E.TXT.r#542985#542987#TD4026E.TXT.r_4148# bzod pas ni 'khor phun sum tshogs  pa ste ; /
column12: 0.018#TD4099E.TXT.r#229386#229387#TD4099E.TXT.r_3879# kha zas mi za    ba yis ma yin thang la nyal ba'am // /
column13: 0.025#TD4037E.TXT.r#2399142#2399144#TD4037E.TXT.r_1251;TD4037E.TXT.r_1252# rnam par rtog pa snga ma ni da ltar byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i dmigs pa'i dngos po 'byung ba'i rgyu yin no // / +da ltar byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i dmigs pa'i dngos po byung ba ni / /
column14: 0.026#TD4037E.TXT.r#2392834#2392834#TD4037E.TXT.r_750# de ltar gyur na byang chub sems dpa' des bdag nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams  dang ; /
column15: 0.026#TD4037E.TXT.r#2384117#2384117#TD4037E.TXT.r_17# byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad ni gzhi zhes bya'o // /
column16: 0.028#TD4086E.TXT.r#2333291#2333291#TD4086E.TXT.r_903# zla ba phyed kyi tshes bcu bzhi la ni rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gi bu rnams ci mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na mar 'dzin pa dang  phar 'dzin pa dang  dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang  bram zer 'dzin pa dang  rigs kyi     // /
column17: 0.029#TD4084E.TXT.r#2320094#2320094#TD4084E.TXT.r_600;TD4084E.TXT.r_601# pandi ta chen po ratna k'i rtis mdzad pa'i / / +chos rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa rdzogs so //// /
column18: 0.029#TD4037E.TXT.r#2392879#2392880#TD4037E.TXT.r_754# de  bas na rnam grangs des gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa brgyad po dag sems can rnams la phan pa dang  bde bar 'gyur ba de'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i tshe 'bras bu med cing don med pa de yang de dag la 'bras bu yod pa  dang don che bar 'gyur ro // /
column19: 0.029#TD4084E.TXT.r#2315938#2315938#TD4084E.TXT.r_31;TD4084E.TXT.r_32# ngag kyal ba ni rnam par spong // / +brnab sems gnod sems log lta spong // /

column3: dri med dbyings la sangs rgyas kyi // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#534331#534338#TD4026E.TXT.r_3246;TD4026E.TXT.r_3247;TD4026E.TXT.r_3248# 'khor la khyab pa'i phyir ro // / +snyan pa ni snyan zhing 'jebs pa'o // /

column3: mtshan nyid dang ni  gnas pa dang / / +'phrin las zab pa 'di bshad pa // /

column3: mkha' la tshon gyis ri mo 'dri // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#534352#534359#TD4026E.TXT.r_3249;TD4026E.TXT.r_3250# yi ge  legs par nges par bshad pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: de bzhin nyid ni thams cad la // / +khyad par med kyang dag gyur pa // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#534360#534371#TD4026E.TXT.r_3250;TD4026E.TXT.r_3251;TD4026E.TXT.r_3252# grags pa ni rnam par rig par byed pa ste / / +grags pa brjod pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: 'gro kun de yi snying po can // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#534380#534387#TD4026E.TXT.r_3253;TD4026E.TXT.r_3254# gdul bya dang mthun pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: nyan thos rnams kyi 'byor pas  ni // / +'jig rten pa yi zil gyis gnon // /

column3: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa pa yis // / +nyan thos kyi yang zil gyis gnon // /

column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#542134#542135#TD4026E.TXT.r_4069;TD4026E.TXT.r_4070# chos kyi sgo la rnam par gnas pa la // / +de bzhin gshegs rtag mngon sum 'doms mdzad cing / /
column6: 0.021#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3110559#3110559#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2009# ji ltar 'jig rten rgyu dang bcas rkyen dang bcas pa las rab tu 'gag par 'gyur zhe na / /
column7: 0.021#TD4026E.TXT.r#522903#522904#TD4026E.TXT.r_2189;TD4026E.TXT.r_2190# bsdus pa'i phyir te rgyu ni dugs 'dod do // / +de ni bag chag rtogs dang zhi ba dang  rab tu rtogs pas rnams par grol bar byed // /

column3: de yis byang chub sems dpa' yi // / +'byor pa'i char yang mi phod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#522914#522916#TD4026E.TXT.r_2190;TD4026E.TXT.r_2191# de ni bag chag rtogs dang zhi ba dang  rab tu rtogs pas rnams par grol bar byed // /

column6: 0.019#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3109931#3109931#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1972# de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa phu skar sa ri lung bstan nas dge slong dag bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dga' zhing bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par rjes su yi rang ngo // /

column3: de yis de bzhin gshegs pa yi // / +'byor pa'i char yang mi  phod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#522926#522932#TD4026E.TXT.r_2192;TD4026E.TXT.r_2193# mdo sde dang  'dul ba dang  chos mngon pa rnams so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#534430#534444#TD4026E.TXT.r_3259;TD4026E.TXT.r_3260;TD4026E.TXT.r_3261;TD4026E.TXT.r_3262# yi ge phun sum tshogs pa la tshigs su bcad pa gnyis te / / +bstan dang de bzhin bshad pa dang / /

column3: sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'byor pa ni // / +gang gi gang du ji ltar dang / /

column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#534458#534466#TD4026E.TXT.r_3263;TD4026E.TXT.r_3264;TD4026E.TXT.r_3265# nges par 'byung dang mthun pa'i phyir // / +bstan pa ni tshig dang yi ge rigs pa ste / /
column5: 0.021#TD4091E.TXT.r#1367521#1367521#TD4091E.TXT.r_11210# bdag gis chos mngon pa 'di ni phal cher kha che bye brag tu smra ba dag gi tshul du grub par bshad pa yin no // /
column6: 0.021#TD4069E.TXT.r#1201465#1201465#TD4069E.TXT.r_6484;TD4069E.TXT.r_6485# gal te zhes bya ba rgya cher 'byung  ba ni smras pa / / +gal te yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ma yin par kun du rtog na ni ji ltar lhan cig skyes pa'i chos su lta ba de ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du gcod par mi byed / /

column3: bsam yas dpag tu med par 'dod // / +dbang po lnga rnams gzhan gyur na // /

column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#544192#544194#TD4026E.TXT.r_4265# bzod pa dang ldan na brtson 'grus rtsom mo // /
