column7: 1.192#TD4026E.TXT.r#534163#534166#TD4026E.TXT.r_3226;TD4026E.TXT.r_3227# 'jam zhing rgyags bral mi skyo ba // / +gsal zhing sna tshogs rigs pa dang / /

column3: don kun 'jug dang thams cad kyi // / +yon tan brgya phrag bcu    gnyis 'byung // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#534486#534493#TD4026E.TXT.r_3267;TD4026E.TXT.r_3268;TD4026E.TXT.r_3269# bstan pa dang mi 'gal ba'i phyir ro // / +theg pa dang mthun pa ni mthun pa ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#534604#534611#TD4026E.TXT.r_3282;TD4026E.TXT.r_3283;TD4026E.TXT.r_3284# bde gshegs gsung ni mtha' yas te // / +yan lag  drug cu bsam mi khyab // /
column6: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#273635#273637#TD4035E.TXT.r_3768# yang na lha'i mig la brten nas da ltar gyi dus la sngon gyi mthar rtog pa / /
column7: 0.0#TD4086E.TXT.r#2370161#2370164#TD4086E.TXT.r_3477;TD4086E.TXT.r_3478# me tog dus kyi rjes 'brang bas // /
column8: 1.788#TD4037E.TXT.r#2397590#2397590#TD4037E.TXT.r_1126# 'di lta ste gzugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji skad  bstan pa'i dngos po rnams la gzugs zhes bya ba la sogs par 'dogs pa'i tshig gi bdag nyid kyi chos med de de lta bas na gzugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i dngos po de gzugs zhes bya ba la sogs par 'dogs pa'i tshig gi bdag nyid des stong ngo // /
column9: 1.788#TD4086E.TXT.r#2374408#2374410#TD4086E.TXT.r_3823;TD4086E.TXT.r_3824# sems can khyed rnams yangs so par gyur cig ces sgra yang grags pa gyur te / / +de nas sems can de dag yang 'tsho bar 'gyur ro // /
column10: 0.011#TD4037E.TXT.r#2396299#2396300#TD4037E.TXT.r_1023# byed mi 'dod pa ni ma yin no snyam du des shes par byed de de lta bu dang mthun pa de dag ni byang chub sems  dpa' spros pa med pa'i tshul la zhugs shing de kho na mchog shes pa la brten pa'i yang dag pa'i sbyor ba yin par rig par bya'o // /
column11: 0.018#TD4035E.TXT.r#268190#268193#TD4035E.TXT.r_3238;TD4035E.TXT.r_3239# ci'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid dang 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dang  rgyu la 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid dam / / +'on te tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid du 'dod / /
column12: 0.023#TD4026E.TXT.r#506494#506494#TD4026E.TXT.r_610# 'dis ni byang chub sems dpa'i rigs byang chub kyi shing rang dang gzhan la phan pa dang  bde ba byed pa'i 'bras bu can gyi rtsa ba bzang po nyid yin par bstan to // /
column13: 0.024#TD4035E.TXT.r#245717#245717#TD4035E.TXT.r_1204# gtam rnam pa gsum gang zhe na / /
column14: 0.024#TD4035E.TXT.r#269184#269184#TD4035E.TXT.r_3339;TD4035E.TXT.r_3340# chos 'di la kha cig kyang 'das pa yang yod / / +ma 'ongs pa yang  yod de / /
column15: 0.024#TD4035E.TXT.r#261653#261653#TD4035E.TXT.r_2618# de la kho na dang  bcas pa ni 'thab pa dang  mtshang 'bru ba dang  'gyed pa dang  rtsod pa'i gzhi'i gnas su gyur pa'i phyir ro // /
column16: 0.024#TD4086E.TXT.r#2336887#2336887#TD4086E.TXT.r_1135;TD4086E.TXT.r_1136# ji ste lha ma yin rnams 'ba' zhig rgyal te / / +lha rnams pham na ni lha ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te / /
column17: 0.027#TD4037E.TXT.r#2397673#2397673#TD4037E.TXT.r_1135;TD4037E.TXT.r_1136# lhag par yang mi byed la nyung ngur yang mi byed do // / +'dor bar yang mi byed la / /
column18: 0.028#TD4037E.TXT.r#2398542#2398542#TD4037E.TXT.r_1211# ngo bo nyid du rnam par rtog pa dang  bye brag tu rnam par rtog pa dang  ril por 'dzin pa'i rnam  par rtog pa dang  bdag go snyam pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang  bdag gi snyam pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang  sdug par rnam par rtog pa dang  mi sdug par rnam par rtog pa dang  de gnyi ga las bzlog pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o // /
column19: 0.028#TD4037E.TXT.r#2391912#2391912#TD4037E.TXT.r_675# bden pa'i tshig dang ldan zhing phra ma med pa dang  tshig rtsub po med pa dang  tshig kyal pa med pa la goms pa ni tshig btsun pa'i rgyu yin no // /
column20: 0.028#TD4037E.TXT.r#2393915#2393915#TD4037E.TXT.r_824# nyon mongs pa thams cad gtan spangs pa dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang   de la brten nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams thob pa gang yin pa de ni bdag dang gzhan gyi don gtan du ba yin no // /

column3: 'byor pa dam pa 'thob par 'gyur // / +yid ni gzhan du gyur pa na // /

column5: 0.029#TD4026E.TXT.r#523017#523017#TD4026E.TXT.r_2203# gang zhig don gdal the tshom za ba de la de nges par ya ba'i ched du bshad pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: 'byor dang mthun spyod mi rtog pa'i // / +ye shes shin tu dri med la // /

column5: 0.012#TD4086E.TXT.r#2380483#2380486#TD4086E.TXT.r_4288# gnas tshol zhing skyabs tshol 'byung ba'i thabs tshol te / /
column6: 0.016#TD4086E.TXT.r#2379016#2379016#TD4086E.TXT.r_4169# sems can dmyal ba chen po rab tu tsha bar sems can gang skyes pa dang 'thon par gyur pa'i bar du ste / /
column7: 0.016#TD4086E.TXT.r#2343464#2343465#TD4086E.TXT.r_1588# sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha  rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi 'dab ma lhags pa na de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'du sa brtol 'di 'dab ma lhags pa las na ring po mi thogs par sbal mig 'thon par 'gyur ro zhes nas kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i     // /
column8: 0.024#TD4035E.TXT.r#269489#269490#TD4035E.TXT.r_3378# mtshan nyid dus gsum du rnam par gzhag tu mi rung ngo // /

column3: 'byor pa dam pa 'thob par 'gyur // / +don bcas 'dzin pa gzhan gyur na // /

column3: ji ltar 'dod bzhin longs spyod  dag / / +bstan phyir zhing ni dag pa la // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#534540#534548#TD4026E.TXT.r_3275;TD4026E.TXT.r_3276# gdul bya dang mthun pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.014#TD4026E.TXT.r#523176#523181#TD4026E.TXT.r_2216;TD4026E.TXT.r_2217# chos mngon pas ni chos dang don 'brel ba'i gtam rnam par gtan la dbab pa la mkhas pa ste / / +rgyu dgu po 'dis snod gsum du 'dod do // /
column6: 0.024#TD4026E.TXT.r#544316#544316#TD4026E.TXT.r_4276;TD4026E.TXT.r_4277# nges pa'i tshig rnam par dbye ba'i tshigs su bcad pa / / +dbul ba 'dor bar byed  pha dang / /
column7: 0.029#TD4085E.TXT.r#2741999#2741999#TD4085E.TXT.r_449# 'phags pa thogs med dang klu sgrub snying po'i thugs kyi dgongs pa ma nor par rtogs shing bstan pa'i gsal byed mchog tu gyur pa'i phyir dang  btsun pa zla grags la sogs pa klu sgrub kyi dgongs pa las 'chal bar gyur na rang  slad kyis tshe smad la med par smra ba dor nas rgyud zab mo'i 'grel pa byed par 'gyur la / /
column8: 0.029#TD4091E.TXT.r#1338103#1338103#TD4091E.TXT.r_8481# re zhig phal cher  las 'dod chags dang bral ba dang  'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi nges par 'jug ba'i gang zag gi rnam par gzhag ba ni de lta bu yin no // /

column3: 'byor pa dam pa 'thob par 'gyur // / +rnam rtog gzhan du gyur na ni // /

column3: dus rnams rtag tu ye shes dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#534562#534569#TD4026E.TXT.r_3277;TD4026E.TXT.r_3278;TD4026E.TXT.r_3279# mya ngan las    'das pa'i ched kyi phyir ro // / +mthun pa ni 'grus skyong gi yan lag gi tshogs te / /
column5: 0.006#TD4026E.TXT.r#544255#544260#TD4026E.TXT.r_4271;TD4026E.TXT.r_4272# shes rab ni mchog yin pa'i bar du yin no // /
column6: 0.009#TD4026E.TXT.r#544226#544228#TD4026E.TXT.r_4268# snga ma dman la phyi ma mchog tu gnas pa'i phyir ni sbyin pa ni dman la / /
column7: 0.013#TD4037E.TXT.r#2395503#2395505#TD4037E.TXT.r_959# ha cang spro bar gyur cing myur du mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i  byang chub thob par bya ba'i thabs chen po yin no // /
column8: 0.022#TD4026E.TXT.r#544241#544241#TD4026E.TXT.r_4269;TD4026E.TXT.r_4270# tshul khrims ni mchog yin pa nas / / +de bzhin du bsam gtan ni dman la / /

column3: las rnams kun la thogs med la // /

column3: 'byor pa dam pa 'thob par 'gyur // / +rten ni gzhan du gyur pa na // /

column6: 0.011#TD4037E.TXT.r#2397590#2397590#TD4037E.TXT.r_1126# 'di lta ste gzugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji skad  bstan pa'i dngos po rnams la gzugs zhes bya ba la sogs par 'dogs pa'i tshig gi bdag nyid kyi chos med de de lta bas na gzugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i dngos po de gzugs zhes bya ba la sogs par 'dogs pa'i tshig gi bdag nyid des stong ngo // /
column7: 0.011#TD4086E.TXT.r#2374408#2374408#TD4086E.TXT.r_3823;TD4086E.TXT.r_3824# sems can khyed rnams yangs so par gyur cig ces sgra yang grags pa gyur te / / +de nas sems can de dag yang 'tsho bar 'gyur ro // /
column8: 0.028#TD4037E.TXT.r#2391912#2391912#TD4037E.TXT.r_675# bden pa'i tshig dang ldan zhing phra ma med pa dang  tshig rtsub po med pa dang  tshig kyal pa med pa la goms pa ni tshig btsun pa'i rgyu yin no // /
column9: 0.028#TD4037E.TXT.r#2393915#2393915#TD4037E.TXT.r_824# nyon mongs pa thams cad gtan spangs pa dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang   de la brten nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams thob pa gang yin pa de ni bdag dang gzhan gyi don gtan du ba yin no // /
column10: 0.028#TD4037E.TXT.r#2398542#2398542#TD4037E.TXT.r_1211# ngo bo nyid du rnam par rtog pa dang  bye brag tu rnam par rtog pa dang  ril por 'dzin pa'i rnam  par rtog pa dang  bdag go snyam pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang  bdag gi snyam pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang  sdug par rnam par rtog pa dang  mi sdug par rnam par rtog pa dang  de gnyi ga las bzlog pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o // /

column3: 'khrig pa gzhan du gyur na ni // / +sangs rgyas bde bar gnas pa dang / /

column5: 0.012#TD4037E.TXT.r#2388539#2388541#TD4037E.TXT.r_397;TD4037E.TXT.r_398# rgyu bzhi po 'di dag gis 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yun ring ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa drag po bar chad med pas kyang mi 'jigs shing mi skrag na chung ngus lta ci smos te / /

column6: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#2391946#2391947#TD4037E.TXT.r_677# dkon mchog gsum  la mchod pa byed pa dang  bla ma la mchod pa byed pa ni dbang che bar grags pa nyid kyi rgyu yin no // /

column3: 'di na 'jig rten phyogs phyogs rgyal ba'i legs bshad pa'i // /

column3: de ltar ma smin smin pa rtag 'gro'ang ma lus min // /

column6: 0.012#TD4009E.TXT.r#604962#604964#TD4009E.TXT.r_1580;TD4009E.TXT.r_1581# de yang nges pa dang  yongs su tshol ba'o // / +dngos po de nyid la rtag par 'dzin par  sgro 'dogs pa ni / /

column8: 0.020#TD4095E.TXT.r#149451#149453#TD4095E.TXT.r_3519# mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i sems ni de kun nas slong bar byed pa dpyod pa dang rtog pa dag gi gzhir gyur pa'i phyir rnam par rig byed rab tu 'jug par byed pa yin gyi sems kha phyir bltas pa'i phyir rjes su 'jug par byed pa ni ma yin no // /
column9: 0.022#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3110304#3110305#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1991# 'di ltar dge slong sems la sems kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so // /
column10: 0.022#TD4026E.TXT.r#539578#539579#TD4026E.TXT.r_3786;TD4026E.TXT.r_3787# yi ge rnam pa gnyis kyis spyod par byed de / / +yi ge tshogs pa rnams don dang bcas pa nyid dang  sil bu rnams don med pa nyid kyis so // /

column18: 0.029#TD4086E.TXT.r#2321705#2321705#TD4086E.TXT.r_134# gnya' shing 'dzin gyi rol mtsho stong dang  gshol mda' 'dzin gyi stong dang  seng ldeng can gyi stong dang  blta na sdug gi stong dang  rta rna ri'i stong dang  mu khyud 'dzin gyi stong dang  rnam par 'dud kyi rol mtsho stong  rnams so // /
column19: 0.029#TD4026E.TXT.r#509422#509422#TD4026E.TXT.r_913# yang na bdag pas gzhan ches shin tu sdug bsngal ba rnyed nas rgyu de nyid kyis  bdag pas gzhan gyi don la khyad par 'phags par 'du shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i la rang gi don ni gang zhig yin la gzhan gyi don gang zhig yin te / /

column3: rtag brtan skyabs med rnams kyi skyabs gang yin pa thob pa de // /

column3: de ni gnas de las kyang rnam par gyo mi mnga' la thams cad mdzad //// /

column3: sangs rgyas rnams ni 'di snyam lus can 'di ni bdag gis smin byas she'am // /

column3: 'di ni rab tu smin bya gzhan yang da ltar smin par byed snyam du // /

column9: 0.021#TD4099E.TXT.r#227748#227749#TD4099E.TXT.r_3693# tshul khrims brtul  zhugs tsam dag gam // /
column10: 0.022#TD4037E.TXT.r#2390583#2390583#TD4037E.TXT.r_568# de la mya ngan las 'das pa dang  mya ngan las 'das pa yang dag par thob par byed pa dag dang  mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyogs 'jig rten pa dang  'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos de dag ni mdor bsdu na byang  chub sems dpa'i bdag dang gzhan gyi don phan pa'i rgyu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba yin te / /
column11: 0.023#TD4037E.TXT.r#2385429#2385429#TD4037E.TXT.r_128;TD4037E.TXT.r_129# de la yang 'dzem bzhin du spyod kyi dga' bzhin bas ma yin no // / +sems can rnams la lag pa dang  bong ba dang  dbyig pa dang  mtshon cha la sogs pas rnam par mi 'tshe ba'i rang bzhin can no // /
column12: 0.023#TD4037E.TXT.r#2386565#2386565#TD4037E.TXT.r_222# de ltar 'di lta bu dang mthun pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rigs kyi rtags yin par rig par bya ste / /

column14: 0.023#TD4099E.TXT.r#228204#228204#TD4099E.TXT.r_3753;TD4099E.TXT.r_3754# srid pa'i sred pa bcad gyur pa // / +de ni bdud kyi 'ching las grol // /

column16: 0.023#TD4035E.TXT.r#235702#235702#TD4035E.TXT.r_297# gnyid kyis brtas nas de'i kun nas dkris pa mi bzod pa dang  bya ba yod pa de la sems gtad nas / /

column19: 0.025#TD4037E.TXT.r#2403967#2403967#TD4037E.TXT.r_1598# pha rol gyi sems mkhyen pa gcig kho nas sems can mang po gang dag gi sems gang  yin pa dang  ji lta bu dang  ci 'dra pa dang  ji snyed nye bar gnas pa de yang cig car yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen to // /
column20: 0.025#TD4086E.TXT.r#2357771#2357771#TD4086E.TXT.r_2564# yun ring mo zhig 'das nas nam mkha' la rlung 'jam po ldang ba de'i dus kyang yod la de'i skabs kyang yod de / /
column21: 0.025#TD4037E.TXT.r#2387050#2387050#TD4037E.TXT.r_263;TD4037E.TXT.r_264# shas cher rgyun du brtson pa dang mi ldan pa 'di ni rgyu  gsum pa'o // / +gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang yang phrad la byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa dag la yang phyin ci ma log par slob cing / /
column22: 0.025#TD4026E.TXT.r#527912#527912#TD4026E.TXT.r_2661;TD4026E.TXT.r_2662# mtshan nyid ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa gsum ste / / +kun brtags pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid do // /
column23: 0.025#TD4099E.TXT.r#220616#220616#TD4099E.TXT.r_2760# ring byas rgyang ring byas pas gdung bar 'gyur // /
column24: 0.025#TD4037E.TXT.r#2391277#2391277#TD4037E.TXT.r_625# bde ba dang bcas pa dang yid bde ba dang bcas par sems can rnams mi dga' bzhin du bzlog par bya zhing drang bar bya'o // /
column25: 0.025#TD4086E.TXT.r#2356882#2356882#TD4086E.TXT.r_2482# kun du rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur cing bsregs pa'i me lce rlung gis gyen du khyer nas tshangs pa'i gzhal  med khang stong pa rnams kyi bar du sreg cing 'gro ste / /
column26: 0.025#TD4037E.TXT.r#2481429#2481429#TD4037E.TXT.r_7373# mdo'i sa mi gyo ba las ji skad bstan pa bzhin te / /
column27: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#474729#474729#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5764;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5765# des brtags pa'i sems can yang med par skur ba btab pa'i phyir ro // / +sems yang dag par yod par 'dzin pa ni chos su sgro 'dogs pa'i mtha'o // /
column28: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#478552#478552#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6071# mi rtag par rags pa la sogs pa'i dbang gis ngo bo nyid rnam pa 'di gsum rjes su dpag tu yod par gyur to zhes bstan par 'gyur ro // /
column29: 0.025#TD4041E.TXT.r#2314669#2314669#TD4041E.TXT.r_1227# phyi ma'i mtha' ni da ltar byung ba rnams la zad pa'i chos nyid du mi shes pa gang yin pa'o // /
column30: 0.025#TD4099E.TXT.r#221079#221079#TD4099E.TXT.r_2816;TD4099E.TXT.r_2817# ngur smrig gyon pa'i 'os yin no // / +gyo sgyu 'jungs dang ldan pa'i mi // /

column3: dge ba'i chos rnams  kyis ni skye bo rab tu smin par 'gyur ba nyid // /

column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#534944#534959#TD4026E.TXT.r_3315;TD4026E.TXT.r_3316# dga' bar byed pa ni rang gi don rjes su  thob pa rnams dga' bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: ji ltar nyi ma 'bad med phyogs phyogs kun du 'od zer dag / /

column3: rab 'byams gsal ba mang pos lo tog rnam smin byed pa ltar // /

column5: 0.025#TD4027E.TXT.r#1003109#1003110#TD4027E.TXT.r_916;TD4027E.TXT.r_917# de'i phyir yang dag par spang ba'i 'og tu rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so // / +las su rung ba de yang nyes pa lnga spang ba'i phyir spong ba'i 'du byed brgyad bsgom pa'i rgyu las byung bar rig par bya'o // /

column3: de bzhin chos ldan nyi ma'ang rab zhi byed pa chos kyi 'od // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#469130#469132#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5310;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5311# dge slong so sor thar  pa'i sdom pa la gnas pa pham pa byung ba bzhin du / / +skal ba med pa kho nar 'gyur ba ni ma yin no // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#476012#476013#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5855;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5856# lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di las zhes bya ba nas lha dang mi dang bcas pa'i bar las grol ba nas rnam par thar par rab tu grol ba zhes bya ba'i bar du'o // / +der rab tu shes pa  ni 'di lta ste / /

column7: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#233841#233843#TD4035E.TXT.r_135# rtsa ba'i dri dang  snying po'i dri dang   lo ma'i dri dang  me tog gi dri dang  'bras bu'i dri la sogs pa dri mang po dag go // /
column8: 0.0#TD4086E.TXT.r#2356926#2356928#TD4086E.TXT.r_2484# 'jig rten 'di 'jig pa'i rgyus la mi mkhas shing 'chags pa'i rgyus la mi mkhas pa de dag gis me lce de mthong nas me lce 'di tshangs pa'i gzhal  med khang stong pa'i bar du bsregs nas 'di nyid du mi 'ong grang zhes mi dga' zhing skyo bar 'gyur ro // /
column9: 0.015#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#478206#478206#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6042;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6043# med pa la yang med par / / +bla na yod pa la yang bla na yod par / /

column11: 0.020#TD4099E.TXT.r#226069#226070#TD4099E.TXT.r_3475# bsod nams phal chen 'phags pas rab tu bsgrub par  'gyur // /
column12: 0.023#TD4026E.TXT.r#529728#529728#TD4026E.TXT.r_2836# chos brgyad la skye ba med par bzod pa ni mi skye ba'i chos bzod pa'o // /
column13: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#474177#474178#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5718# 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po bshad pa dang  de bzhin nyid dang  de kho na nyid dang  yang dag pa'i mtha' dang  chos nyid ces ston pa'i bstan pa rnams so // /
column14: 0.025#TD4099E.TXT.r#226775#226775#TD4099E.TXT.r_3567;TD4099E.TXT.r_3568# skye bo ma bsdams tshig gis gnod byed pa // / +mi bzang rjod pa'i tshig de thos gyur kyang / /
column15: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#478772#478772#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6082;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6083# 'di ltar sems can rnams da ltar bde ba dang  sdug bsngal gang ci myong ba dag ni las dge ba dang  mi dge ba la gnas pa nyid du  mthong bas las yongs su dag pa dang  yongs su ma dag pa dag gis ni gdon mi za bar 'bras bu rab tu 'dren cing chud mi za bar rab tu shes pas bdag bde ba dang  sdug bsngal myong ba ci yang med pa kho na rab tu shes pa'o // / +rgyu dang rkyen des / /
column16: 0.028#TD4026E.TXT.r#536695#536697#TD4026E.TXT.r_3494# gang g'a'i  klung gi bye ma 'di snyed dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen bkur byas na gzod theg pa chen po'i rtogs pa skye'o zhes bya ba lta bu'o // /
column17: 0.028#TD4037E.TXT.r#2405392#2405392#TD4037E.TXT.r_1696;TD4037E.TXT.r_1697# rtag tu 'ong zhing de'i drung du ci dga' bar 'khod pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pa la ni  tha na dud 'gro rnams kyang mchod pa byed de / / +'di lta ste / /

column3: rab 'byams dag gis phyogs  phyogs kun du sems can rnam smin mdzad // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#534914#534929#TD4026E.TXT.r_3312;TD4026E.TXT.r_3313;TD4026E.TXT.r_3314# thos pa las byung ba'i  shes pa phun sum tshogs pa'i rten yin pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: dpag med grangs med 'byung yang de la zad pa med // /

column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#534939#534950#TD4026E.TXT.r_3314;TD4026E.TXT.r_3315# rnam par gsal ba ni slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med par chos ston pa'i phyir ro // / +dga' bar byed pa ni rang gi don rjes su  thob pa rnams dga' bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: ji ltar rgya mtsho chen po 'di ni chu yis ngoms par mi 'gyur zhing // /

column3: de bzhin sangs rgyas khams kyang dag pa 'jug pa rtag rgyun mi 'chad pas // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#534994#535002#TD4026E.TXT.r_3319;TD4026E.TXT.r_3320;TD4026E.TXT.r_3321# rnam par rig par byed pa ni  bsam du rung ba'i chos yang dag par ston pa'i phyir ro // / +rigs pa ni tshad ma dang mi 'gal ba'i phyir ro // /

column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#535028#535035#TD4026E.TXT.r_3323;TD4026E.TXT.r_3324# seng ge'i sgra'i shugs ni mu stegs can gyi tshogs  thams cad skrag par byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#2405149#2405152#TD4037E.TXT.r_1692# rang bzhin gyis tshe rabs dgongs pa dang  sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir so sor brtags nas sdug bsngal yun ring ba rnam pa sna tshogs mi bzad pa rgyun mi 'chad pas mi mjed pa dang  sems can rnams kyi don kho na'i phyir sems  can gyi don sgrub pa'i sdug bsngal bas dga' ba dang  dga' ldan du skyes nas tshe'i tshad ji srid par dga' ldan na gnas pa dang  dga' ldan du skyes pa'i lha'i bu gzhan rnams gnas gsum po lha'i tshe dang  lha'i mdog dang  lha'i grags pas zil gyis gnon pa dang  yum gyi  lhums su gshegs pa na snang ba chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par mdzad pa dang  yang dag par mkhyen bzhin du yum gyi lhums su gshegs pa dang  gnas pa dang  bltam kha dang  bstams pa dang  bltams ma thag tu yang sus kyang ma brten par sa la gom pa bdun 'dor zhing tshig kyang  gsung ba dang  bltams pa na lha dang  klu dang  gnod sbyin dang  lha ma yin dang  nam mkha' lding dang  mi'am ci dang  lto 'phye chen po dang che ba dag gis lha'i me tog phreng dang  rol mo'i sgra dang  'dug pa dang  na bza' 'bul ba dang  gdugs dang  rgyal mtshan dang  ba dan la sogs     // /
column6: 0.0#TD4086E.TXT.r#2355934#2355934#TD4086E.TXT.r_2432# sgra de tshegs chung ngus tshangs pa'i 'jig rten thams cad du khyab par 'gro la / /
column7: 0.021#TD4037E.TXT.r#2387158#2387158#TD4037E.TXT.r_272# 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i dang po'i sems bskyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dge ba'i smon lam thams cad kyi nang na yang  dag pa'i smon lam gyi dang po yin te / /

column3: dbang zad mi shes mtshan nyid do // /

column6: 0.024#TD4047E.TXT.r#2138563#2138565#TD4047E.TXT.r_8192# bstan pa la zhes 'gras pa rnams kyi dad  pas byin pa'i longs spyod kha na ma tho ba dang bcas par 'gyur bas na / /

column6: 0.027#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1921651#1921652#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_1140# phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa gcig gis chod pa'i phyir 'di la bar chad gcig yod pas na bar chad gcig pa yin no // /

column7: 1.192#TD4061E.TXT.r#2763513#2763517#TD4061E.TXT.r_1752;TD4061E.TXT.r_1753# spro ba mi bskyed pa dang    mi smad pa ni gang su dag 'di 'dra ba thams cad ni yang dag pa la zhugs pa dag go zhe'am / / +log pa la zhugs pa dag go zhes bya ba lta bu ste / /

column10: 0.015#TD4026E.TXT.r#506093#506093#TD4026E.TXT.r_577# byang chub den po'i rgyu mtshan yin pa'i phyir dang  ye shes chen po'i rgyu mtshan yin pa'i phyir dang  'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyu mtshan yin pa'i phyir te / /

column14: 0.020#TD4041E.TXT.r#2311913#2311915#TD4041E.TXT.r_994;TD4041E.TXT.r_995# rang gi yongs su gzung bar ma gyur pa gzhan gyi rgyud la yod pa tha ma dang 'bring dang khyad par can la ni nga rgyal gyi rnam pa la brten pas rlom sems su byed do // /
column15: 0.020#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3111332#3111333#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2072# de dag mthong nas dge slong mngon par dga' ba dang  brjod pa dang  zhen pa dang  lhag par zhen cing gnas pa dang  yid kyi rnam    par shes par bya ba'i chos mi 'dod pa dang  mi dga' ba dang  mi sdug pa dang  yid du mi 'ong ba dang  'dod par bya ba ma yin pa dang  rab tu dga' bar bya ba ma yin pa dang  sdug bsngal ba dang  nad dang  rjes su mi mthun pa yod de / /
column16: 0.020#TD4026E.TXT.r#540898#540898#TD4026E.TXT.r_3942# rnam par mi rtog pa ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro // /

column18: 0.022#TD4095E.TXT.r#175416#175416#TD4095E.TXT.r_6083# lus kyi ngo bo ni 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa nyid do // /
column19: 0.022#TD4069E.TXT.r#1156172#1156172#TD4069E.TXT.r_3036;TD4069E.TXT.r_3037# ji skad bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di las kyang mdor na ye shes phun sum tshogs pa dang  spangs  pa phun sum tshogs pa bstan to // / +las dang sred dang zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dang yang sbyar bar bya'o // /
column20: 0.022#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3111294#3111294#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2070# bdud kyi 'ching ba las ma grol zhing bdud kyi dbang du gyur pa zhes brjod do // /

column22: 0.025#TD4035E.TXT.r#260547#260547#TD4035E.TXT.r_2524;TD4035E.TXT.r_2525# phyogs bzhin  sgo bzhi bzang zhing sdug la mdzes par byas pa dag yod de / / +gnod sbyin mang po gzugs bzang ba rnam pa sna tshogs bkod pa dag yod de / /

column5: 1.192#TD4026E.TXT.r#547135#547138#TD4026E.TXT.r_4556;TD4026E.TXT.r_4557# yang dag  pa zhes bya ba ni log pa ma yin pa'o // / +ting nge 'dzin la brten pa dang / /
column6: 1.192#TD4026E.TXT.r#548492#548492#TD4026E.TXT.r_4683# slong ba po'i skye bo la sbyin pa po mthong ba dang  de las ci 'dod pa thob pas yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs pas dga' ba gang yin pa dang  ma mthong ba dang  yongs su ma rdzogs pas  mi dga' ba dang  de mthong ba dang  yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par smon pa skye ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' la dus thams cad du slong ba po mthong ba dang  de'i yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs pa dang  ma mthong ba dang  yongs su ma rdzogs pas lhag par skye  ste ; /
column7: 1.192#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3098346#3098349#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1097;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1098# bram ze lta ba la chags pa dang  zhen pa    dang ; / +'brel pa dang  mngon par 'dod pa dang  yang dag par chags pa'i rgyus rab tu byung ba dang rab tu byung ba rnams lhan cig rtsod par gyur to // /

column9: 0.014#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3111333#3111333#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2072# de dag mthong nas dge slong mngon par dga' ba dang  brjod pa dang  zhen pa dang  lhag par zhen cing gnas pa dang  yid kyi rnam    par shes par bya ba'i chos mi 'dod pa dang  mi dga' ba dang  mi sdug pa dang  yid du mi 'ong ba dang  'dod par bya ba ma yin pa dang  rab tu dga' bar bya ba ma yin pa dang  sdug bsngal ba dang  nad dang  rjes su mi mthun pa yod de / /

column11: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#460252#460252#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4677# bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir nam gyi gung thun cha las yongs su mya ngan las 'das she  na ; /

column5: 0.020#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3098371#3098372#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1099# k'a ty'a ya na lta ba la chags pa dang  zhen pa dang  'brel ba dang  mngon par 'dod pa dang  yang dag  par chags pa'i rgyus rab tu byung ba rnams rtsod par gyur na / /

column6: 0.011#TD4037E.TXT.r#2454267#2454270#TD4037E.TXT.r_5333# shes rab kyis so sor rtog pa'i stobs drag po dang ldan pa yin te / /
column7: 0.022#TD4037E.TXT.r#2439526#2439526#TD4037E.TXT.r_4332# skra dang kha spu bregs pa la sogs pas gzugs mi sdug pa nyams su blangs pa dang  gos dras pa dang  kha dog ngan pa 'chang ba'i phyir kha dog ngan pa nyams su blangs pa dang  'jig rten pa'i spyod pa  thams cad la gdams nas gnas pa'i phyir tshul gzhan bya ba dang  zhing las la sogs pa'i las kyi mtha' rnam par spangs te / /
column8: 0.024#TD4013E.TXT.r#1106391#1106392#TD4013E.TXT.r_863# de'i phyir de dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams rtag par sad pas dus rnam par gzhag pa nyid med do // /

column5: 5.960#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1688732#1688737#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4775;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4776# mtshams med pa lnga dang  mi dge ba bcu la sogs pa ni nyes par spyod pa zhes bya ste / / +sangs rgyas par gyur na mtshams med pa  lnga dang mi dge ba bcu la sogs pa mi mdzad pa las kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa las skyob pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column6: 0.008#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#2992450#2992451#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_8574# rjes 'jug byed kyang rnam gsum    'gyur ; / /
column7: 0.016#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1942571#1942571#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2897# 'dod pa'i khams las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa dang  sa bdun las 'dod chags dang bral ba dang  mngon par shes pa dang spel mar bsgom pa dag gis rnam par grol ba'i  lam rnams dang  mi gyo ba rtogs par byed pa'i rnam par grol ba'i lam brgyad dang  'dod chags dang bral ba'i sbyor ba dang  khyad par can gyi lam thams cad de / /
column8: 0.020#TD4026E.TXT.r#541258#541258#TD4026E.TXT.r_3980;TD4026E.TXT.r_3981# rang bzhin stong pa nyid shes pas // / +stong pa shes pa zhes brjod do // /

column11: 0.022#TD4086E.TXT.r#2372906#2372906#TD4086E.TXT.r_3701# des  lus kyi nyes par spyod pa spyad cing ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pa spyad nas de'i rgyu dang de'i rkyen gyis lus dang bral te shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur te 'di ni gnod par 'gyur ba'i chos rnams zhes bya'o // /
column12: 0.023#TD4037E.TXT.r#2389797#2389797#TD4037E.TXT.r_509# 'ba' zhig dang gzhan dang 'brel pa dang  phan pa'i rgyu dang  bde ba'i rgyu dang  rgyur bsdus pa dang  'bras bur bsdus pa dang  tshe 'di pa dang  tshe rabs gzhan pa dang  gtan du ba dang  gtan du ba ma yin pa'o // /
column13: 0.023#TD4009E.TXT.r#621329#621329#TD4009E.TXT.r_2772;TD4009E.TXT.r_2773# ji ltar bdag dgon pa par gzhan gyis shes par 'gyur snyam du so sor brtags nas thos pa 'dzin zhes bya ba la / / +dgon pa na gnas pa ni bsgom pa'i rgyu yin pas dgon pa ni de gnyi ga bsgom pa'i yan  lag 'dra ba'o // /
column14: 0.024#TD4041E.TXT.r#2312123#2312123#TD4041E.TXT.r_1009# myong zin pa'i dngos po la 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni yid du 'thad pa'o // /
column15: 0.024#TD4051E.TXT.r#2263176#2263176#TD4051E.TXT.r_2243# ye shes byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis yang dag par mnos pa zhes bya ba 'di'i bshad pa ni / /
column16: 0.024#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1944529#1944530#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_3065;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_3066# sa las ni bsam gtan bzhi dang  bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa yin pa'i phyir ro // / +rgyud las ni nyan thos la sogs pa dang   sangs rgyas kyi rgyud las skye ba yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column17: 0.025#TD4026E.TXT.r#535317#535318#TD4026E.TXT.r_3348;TD4026E.TXT.r_3349# dbang po thams cad tshim par byed  pa ni gcig las don du ma'i rnam par rig pa nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro // / +ma smad pa ni dam bcas pa ji lta ba bzhin pa'i phyir ro // /
column18: 0.026#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1511634#1511634#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_10673;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_10674# rga ba'i 'jug pa ni gnas par gyur pa'i tshe bdag nyid ma gtogs pa'i nus pa 'joms par byed ba ste / / +de lta ma yin na de dag bya ba  byed pa'i nus pa ma bcom pa'i phyir 'gag pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro // /
column19: 0.026#TD4048E.TXT.r#3060678#3060680#TD4048E.TXT.r_59;TD4048E.TXT.r_60# de'i 'og tu shes bya'i mtshan nyid rtogs nas lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa la brten te / / +sngon sbyor ba can gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag rtogs par bsgrub  par bya'o // /
column20: 0.026#TD4047E.TXT.r#2094529#2094529#TD4047E.TXT.r_4697# 'jig rten la grags pa'i yongs su smin pa'i dngos po  rnams kyi chos mthun pa'i dpe nye bar bsgrubs nas / /

column22: 0.027#TD4026E.TXT.r#547187#547187#TD4026E.TXT.r_4562# 'jig rten pa dang  'jig rten  las 'das pa dman pa dang  'jig rten las 'das pa chen po'i rab tu rnam par 'byed pa des ni kun nas nyon mongs pa las shin tu rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro // /
column23: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#1246232#1246232#TD4083E.TXT.r_1165# byang chub sems dpa' tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma'i don la tshul bzhin ma yin par zhugs pa'i     // /

column25: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#424200#424200#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2082;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2083# de la 'dod pa la lnga ste / / +yul lnga po dag go // /
column26: 0.028#TD4026E.TXT.r#547923#547923#TD4026E.TXT.r_4634;TD4026E.TXT.r_4635# tshul khrims de nyid kyis kyang skye bo thams cad byang chub gsum la bkod // / +tshul khrims ye shes kyis yongs zin pas 'jig     // /
column27: 0.029#TD4037E.TXT.r#2455057#2455057#TD4037E.TXT.r_5405;TD4037E.TXT.r_5406# de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' des sems can gyi 'jig rten gyi 'jug pa dang  snod kyi 'jig rten gyi 'jug pa dang  'jig rten rtag pa'i don brgyad dang  'jig rten gyi don dam pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te / / +de lta bas  na 'jig rten shes pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: mya ngan 'das pa rtag ston pas // / +sangs rgyas sprul  pa'i sku 'di ni // /

column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#535457#535464#TD4026E.TXT.r_3362;TD4026E.TXT.r_3363# rab tu 'jog pa dang  rnam par 'byed pa dang  rnam par 'brel pa ni go rims bzhin du stan pa dang   rnam par 'byed pa dang  the tshom gcod pa rnams kyis so // /
column6: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#238222#238223#TD4035E.TXT.r_536# yang na sems can des de ma yin pa dbang  che bar grags pa dang  dbang che bar grags pa ma yin pa pha mar 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa 'am / /
column7: 2.980#TD4041E.TXT.r#2314614#2314616#TD4041E.TXT.r_1224# rgyab kyis bstan pa ni rtsal skyes pa gnas pa dang 'gal bar byed pa'o // /
column8: 2.980#TD4041E.TXT.r#2314669#2314671#TD4041E.TXT.r_1227;TD4041E.TXT.r_1228# phyi ma'i mtha' ni da ltar byung ba rnams la zad pa'i chos nyid du mi shes pa gang yin pa'o // /
column9: 2.980#TD4084E.TXT.r#2316431#2316432#TD4084E.TXT.r_99;TD4084E.TXT.r_100# 'di rnams mtho ris chos  dag gi // / +'bras bu dag kyang mdor bsdus pa'o //// /
column10: 0.006#TD4037E.TXT.r#2387661#2387663#TD4037E.TXT.r_315;TD4037E.TXT.r_316# de la rkyen bzhi gang zhe na / / +'di la rigs kyi bu'am / /
column11: 0.007#TD4026E.TXT.r#506127#506128#TD4026E.TXT.r_579# sems can mang po yongs su smin par byed pa'i rgyu mtshan yin pa'i phyir te / /
column12: 0.016#TD4035E.TXT.r#238297#238297#TD4035E.TXT.r_542;TD4035E.TXT.r_543# pha ma las byung ba'i khu ba dang  khrag de yang / / +de'i tshe phyin ci log tu mthong  bar 'jug par 'gyur ro // /
column13: 0.016#TD4035E.TXT.r#244505#244505#TD4035E.TXT.r_1108;TD4035E.TXT.r_1109# de yang gnya' shing 'dzin dang mnyam mo de dag gang gi tshe ri rab las thag ring du rgyu ba de'i tshe ni dgun du mngon no // / +gang gi tshe nye bar rgyu ba de'i tshe ni tsha ba'i dus su mngon no // /

column15: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#478679#478680#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6078;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6079# 'di ltar da    ltar gyi dus su sdug bsngal sna tshogs yod pa gang yin pa de ni snga ma'i las sna tshogs la brten nas / / +mngon sum du dmigs pa'i phyir des gdon mi za bar ma 'ongs pa na yang sdug bsngal ba'i 'bras bu yod par rjes su dpag pa'o // /
column16: 0.024#TD4035E.TXT.r#238344#238345#TD4035E.TXT.r_547# sgyu ma byas pa mthong ba bzhin no // /
column17: 0.024#TD4037E.TXT.r#2385674#2385675#TD4037E.TXT.r_147# 'di lta ste zhing las dang  tshong bya ba dang  ba lang 'tsho ba dang  rgyal po'i zha 'bring bya ba dang  yi ge bri ba dang  rtsis  bya ba dang  shod dgod pa dang  grangs bzung ba dang  lag rtsis bya ba dang  rje bo dang bsdums pa dang  khyim mi dang bsdums pa dang  mdza' bshes dang mi mdza' ba bsdums pa dang  rgyal po dang bsdums pa dang  longs spyod rnams sgrub pa dang  bsrung ba dang  bsdu ba dang  phyir  'gyed pa dang  gtong ba dang  bag ma gtong ba dang  bag ma len pa dang  lhag par za ba dang  'dus shing za ba rnams dang  de lta bu dang mthun pa dag la grogs byed du 'gro bar byed kyi / /
column18: 0.024#TD4037E.TXT.r#2398087#2398088#TD4037E.TXT.r_1176# dmigs pa de spong zhing btang snyoms can du gnas te / /
column19: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#473917#473918#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5695# de la bshad pa'i tshul zhes bya ba ni / /
column20: 0.027#TD4035E.TXT.r#238007#238008#TD4035E.TXT.r_507# de la skye gnas kyi nyes ba gang zhe na / /
column21: 0.027#TD4035E.TXT.r#237858#237859#TD4035E.TXT.r_495;TD4035E.TXT.r_496# 'gro ba lta ga la 'gyur / / +de'i phyir mi 'gro na yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro // /
column22: 0.027#TD4099E.TXT.r#220984#220985#TD4099E.TXT.r_2804;TD4099E.TXT.r_2805# me nang lhung ba'i phye ma leb dang 'dra // /
column23: 0.027#TD4037E.TXT.r#2405368#2405369#TD4037E.TXT.r_1695# 'jig rten du dam pa'i chos bshad par  bskul ba dang  'brug sgra chen po yang mi gsan cing mi bzhengs pas snyoms par 'jug pa zhi ba dang  byang chub sems dpa' la ri dvags dang  bya dang  tha na ri dvags phra mo rnams kyang mchog tu yid rton te / /
column24: 0.027#TD4086E.TXT.r#2357710#2357711#TD4086E.TXT.r_2559# dge slong dag gang yun ring mo zhig 'das nas zhes bya ba nas de'i dus kyang yod la de'i skabs kyang yod do zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs te / /
column25: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#473463#473463#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5657# de la thob pa lnga ni mngon du byas pa thob pa dang  shes pa mngon du byas pa thob pa dang  dad pa mngon du byas pa thob pa dang  'bras bu  mngon du byas pa thob pa dang  yon tan mngon du byas pa thob pa'o // /
column26: 0.028#TD4068E.TXT.r#1036350#1036350#TD4068E.TXT.r_612# byung ba las zhes bya ba 'di dngos po gang dang phrad par gyur ba las de dang phyis bral bar 'dod cing mi phrad par 'dod pa ni sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba zhes bya'o // /
column27: 0.028#TD4035E.TXT.r#270050#270050#TD4035E.TXT.r_3436;TD4035E.TXT.r_3437# yang dag par sgrub na / / +yod pa la yang yod par shes / /

column3: rnam par grol ba'i thabs chen no // / +sku gsum dag gis sangs rgyas kyi // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#535275#535288#TD4026E.TXT.r_3344;TD4026E.TXT.r_3345;TD4026E.TXT.r_3346;TD4026E.TXT.r_3347# rgyun chags pa ni rgyun ma chad pa'i phyir ro // / +'brel pa ni rnam pa sna tshogs su nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#477605#477605#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5988# 'di yang mtshan nyid rnam pa lngas bstan pa nyid las rnam pa lngar rnam par dbye ste / /
column6: 0.027#TD4037E.TXT.r#2404801#2404801#TD4037E.TXT.r_1665;TD4037E.TXT.r_1666# de ltar gzhan la yang phan 'dogs so // / +phyi ma la yang rgyu'i stobs dang ldan zhing skyes bu'i rtsal la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur te / /

column3: sku bsdus par ni shes bya ste // / +sku gsum dag gis rang bzhin gyi // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#535289#535303#TD4026E.TXT.r_3346;TD4026E.TXT.r_3347;TD4026E.TXT.r_3348# sgra thams cad rdzogs par byed pa ni / / +gsung gcig las sgra'i rnam par rig pa rnam pa du ma nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#477605#477605#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5988# 'di yang mtshan nyid rnam pa lngas bstan pa nyid las rnam pa lngar rnam par dbye ste / /

column3: don 'di rten dang bcas par bstan // / +de dag rten dang dgongs pa dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#535304#535316#TD4026E.TXT.r_3348;TD4026E.TXT.r_3349# dbang po thams cad tshim par byed  pa ni gcig las don du ma'i rnam par rig pa nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: 'phrin las kyis ni  mnyam pa nyid // / +rang bzhin dang ni rgyun mi 'chad // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#535317#535336#TD4026E.TXT.r_3348;TD4026E.TXT.r_3349;TD4026E.TXT.r_3350;TD4026E.TXT.r_3351# dbang po thams cad tshim par byed  pa ni gcig las don du ma'i rnam par rig pa nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro // / +ma smad pa ni dam bcas pa ji lta ba bzhin pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1688734#1688734#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4775;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4776# mtshams med pa lnga dang  mi dge ba bcu la sogs pa ni nyes par spyod pa zhes bya ste / / +sangs rgyas par gyur na mtshams med pa  lnga dang mi dge ba bcu la sogs pa mi mdzad pa las kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa las skyob pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: rgyun gyis de dag rtag pa nyid // / +me long ye shes mi gyo ba // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#535330#535346#TD4026E.TXT.r_3349;TD4026E.TXT.r_3350;TD4026E.TXT.r_3351# ma smad pa ni dam bcas pa ji lta ba bzhin pa'i phyir ro // / +mi 'gyur ba ni dus la bab par rab tu sbyor ba'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#535427#535433#TD4026E.TXT.r_3360;TD4026E.TXT.r_3359;TD4026E.TXT.r_3361# brjod pa ni ngag gis so // /

column3: ye shes gsum ni de la brten // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#535345#535354#TD4026E.TXT.r_3351;TD4026E.TXT.r_3352# ma rtabs rtab pa ni rtab rtab por mi gsung ba'i phyir ro // /

column3: mnyam pa nyid dang so sor rtog / / +bya ba sgrub pa kho na'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#535353#535364#TD4026E.TXT.r_3351;TD4026E.TXT.r_3352;TD4026E.TXT.r_3353# ma rtabs rtab pa ni rtab rtab por mi gsung ba'i phyir ro // / +'khor kun tu grag pa ni 'khor  nye ba dang ring bas mtshungs par thos pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: me long ye shes nga yi med // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#535363#535372#TD4026E.TXT.r_3352;TD4026E.TXT.r_3353;TD4026E.TXT.r_3354# 'khor kun tu grag pa ni 'khor  nye ba dang ring bas mtshungs par thos pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: yongs su  ma chad rtag tu ldan // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#535373#535380#TD4026E.TXT.r_3353;TD4026E.TXT.r_3354# rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa ni / / +'jig rten pa'i don thams cad dpe'i chos su bsgyur ba'i phyir ro // /

column3: shes bya kun la ma rmongs la // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#535381#535395#TD4026E.TXT.r_3354;TD4026E.TXT.r_3355;TD4026E.TXT.r_3356# 'jig rten pa'i don thams cad dpe'i chos su bsgyur ba'i phyir ro // /

column3: rtag tu de la mngon phyogs min // / +ye shes kun gyi rgyu mtshan phyir // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#510680#510685#TD4026E.TXT.r_1025;TD4026E.TXT.r_1026# de phyir thar pa nor tsam zad pa yin // / +re zhig bdag tu lta ba nyid ni bdag gi mtshan nyid ma yin no // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#535395#535404#TD4026E.TXT.r_3356;TD4026E.TXT.r_3357# ngag tshig shin tu rigs pa dang / /

column3: ye shes 'byung gnas chen po 'dra // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#424006#424009#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2065;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2066# dang po'i bye brag gis mi mthun pa'i sgrib pa ste / / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis  mdzad pa las ji skad du / /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#535405#535412#TD4026E.TXT.r_3357;TD4026E.TXT.r_3358# bstan dang rnam  'byed the tshom gcod // / +lan mang byed dang ldan pa ni // /
column6: 0.0#TD4061E.TXT.r#2794257#2794259#TD4061E.TXT.r_4011# de lta yin na ni gang dag phan par 'dod pas de rnams mtho ris thob par bya ba'i phyir dang  'khor ba las thar bar bya ba'i phyir / /

column3: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid // / +ye shes gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i phyir // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#535413#535425#TD4026E.TXT.r_3358;TD4026E.TXT.r_3359;TD4026E.TXT.r_3360# lan mang byed dang ldan pa ni // / +mgo smos rnam spros go rnams la // /
column5: 0.026#TD4026E.TXT.r#535881#535882#TD4026E.TXT.r_3404# gzur  sla bas de'i phyir tshig 'bru bzang po yin te / /

column3: mnyam  nyid ye shes sems can la // /
bsgom pa dag pa la 'dod do // / +mi gnas zhi bar zhugs pa ni // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#535434#535448#TD4026E.TXT.r_3361;TD4026E.TXT.r_3362# 'dogs pa ni tshig shin tu rigs pa dag gis so // /
column5: 0.025#TD4013E.TXT.r#1106520#1106523#TD4013E.TXT.r_870# de la gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi me long gcig shar ba la sems can thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi gzugs brnyan cig car du dmigs pas sems can du ma'i dri ba'i don gyi yul phan tshun mi mthun pa tha dad pa dag rtag tu dris kyang brjod pa med cing 'bad mi dgos  bar 'dri ba thams cad lung ston pa dmigs pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'byung ba yin te / /
column6: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1688797#1688798#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4780# ma skyes par rga ba dang  'chi ba mi srid pas skye ba yang don gyi shugs kyis bstan par rig par bya'o // /
column7: 0.028#TD4037E.TXT.r#2403308#2403308#TD4037E.TXT.r_1552# legs par brjod pa dang  don dang ldan pa gzhan gang ci yang rung ba de dag ni sgra 'phags pa rnams zhes bya'o // /

column3: mnyam nyid ye shes yin par 'dod // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#535447#535457#TD4026E.TXT.r_3362# rab tu 'jog pa dang  rnam par 'byed pa dang  rnam par 'brel pa ni go rims bzhin du stan pa dang   rnam par 'byed pa dang  the tshom gcod pa rnams kyis so // /
column5: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1688797#1688797#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4780# ma skyes par rga ba dang  'chi ba mi srid pas skye ba yang don gyi shugs kyis bstan par rig par bya'o // /
column6: 0.025#TD4035E.TXT.r#238296#238297#TD4035E.TXT.r_542;TD4035E.TXT.r_543# pha ma las byung ba'i khu ba dang  khrag de yang / / +de'i tshe phyin ci log tu mthong  bar 'jug par 'gyur ro // /
column7: 0.027#TD4084E.TXT.r#2316430#2316431#TD4084E.TXT.r_99;TD4084E.TXT.r_100# 'di rnams mtho ris chos  dag gi // /
column8: 0.027#TD4035E.TXT.r#244504#244505#TD4035E.TXT.r_1108;TD4035E.TXT.r_1109# de yang gnya' shing 'dzin dang mnyam mo de dag gang gi tshe ri rab las thag ring du rgyu ba de'i tshe ni dgun du mngon no // / +gang gi tshe nye bar rgyu ba de'i tshe ni tsha ba'i dus su mngon no // /
column9: 0.027#TD4041E.TXT.r#2314614#2314614#TD4041E.TXT.r_1224# rgyab kyis bstan pa ni rtsal skyes pa gnas pa dang 'gal bar byed pa'o // /
column10: 0.027#TD4041E.TXT.r#2314669#2314669#TD4041E.TXT.r_1227# phyi ma'i mtha' ni da ltar byung ba rnams la zad pa'i chos nyid du mi shes pa gang yin pa'o // /
column11: 0.027#TD4099E.TXT.r#221079#221079#TD4099E.TXT.r_2816;TD4099E.TXT.r_2817# ngur smrig gyon pa'i 'os yin no // / +gyo sgyu 'jungs dang ldan pa'i mi // /

column3: dus rnams kun du byams pa dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#474727#474728#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5764;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5765# des brtags pa'i sems can yang med par skur ba btab pa'i phyir ro // / +sems yang dag par yod par 'dzin pa ni chos su sgro 'dogs pa'i mtha'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#475085#475086#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5790# 'jig rten rtag go zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du chos nyid las brtsams nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#477882#477883#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6011# de la 'du byed thams cad mi rtag ces bya ba ni 'dus byas rnams spyir bsdus pa'o // /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#478758#478760#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6082# 'di ltar sems can rnams da ltar bde ba dang  sdug bsngal gang ci myong ba dag ni las dge ba dang  mi dge ba la gnas pa nyid du  mthong bas las yongs su dag pa dang  yongs su ma dag pa dag gis ni gdon mi za bar 'bras bu rab tu 'dren cing chud mi za bar rab tu shes pas bdag bde ba dang  sdug bsngal myong ba ci yang med pa kho na rab tu shes pa'o // /
column8: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#529705#529706#TD4026E.TXT.r_2833;TD4026E.TXT.r_2834# rang gi mtshan nyid rang dang gzhan du 'gyur // / +kun nas nyon mongs pa dang khyab  bar la ; / /
column9: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#533783#533783#TD4026E.TXT.r_3194# nyon mongs pa dang  shes bya'i sgrib pa bag chags dang bcas pa rnam par dag pas rnam par dag pa rgya che ba dang  sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba dang  gtan du ba'i phyir zad mi shes pa yang yin no // /
column10: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#235701#235701#TD4035E.TXT.r_297# gnyid kyis brtas nas de'i kun nas dkris pa mi bzod pa dang  bya ba yod pa de la sems gtad nas / /

column12: 2.980#TD4035E.TXT.r#244504#244505#TD4035E.TXT.r_1108;TD4035E.TXT.r_1109# de yang gnya' shing 'dzin dang mnyam mo de dag gang gi tshe ri rab las thag ring du rgyu ba de'i tshe ni dgun du mngon no // / +gang gi tshe nye bar rgyu ba de'i tshe ni tsha ba'i dus su mngon no // /

column14: 0.015#TD4035E.TXT.r#238344#238344#TD4035E.TXT.r_547# sgyu ma byas pa mthong ba bzhin no // /
column15: 0.015#TD4037E.TXT.r#2385675#2385675#TD4037E.TXT.r_147# 'di lta ste zhing las dang  tshong bya ba dang  ba lang 'tsho ba dang  rgyal po'i zha 'bring bya ba dang  yi ge bri ba dang  rtsis  bya ba dang  shod dgod pa dang  grangs bzung ba dang  lag rtsis bya ba dang  rje bo dang bsdums pa dang  khyim mi dang bsdums pa dang  mdza' bshes dang mi mdza' ba bsdums pa dang  rgyal po dang bsdums pa dang  longs spyod rnams sgrub pa dang  bsrung ba dang  bsdu ba dang  phyir  'gyed pa dang  gtong ba dang  bag ma gtong ba dang  bag ma len pa dang  lhag par za ba dang  'dus shing za ba rnams dang  de lta bu dang mthun pa dag la grogs byed du 'gro bar byed kyi / /
column16: 0.015#TD4037E.TXT.r#2398087#2398087#TD4037E.TXT.r_1176# dmigs pa de spong zhing btang snyoms can du gnas te / /
column17: 0.016#TD4035E.TXT.r#238223#238223#TD4035E.TXT.r_536# yang na sems can des de ma yin pa dbang  che bar grags pa dang  dbang che bar grags pa ma yin pa pha mar 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa 'am / /
column18: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#477548#477550#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5983# mtshan nyid lnga yang dag par bshad pa dang  rgol ba dag gi rjes su bzlas te bshad pa'o // /
column19: 0.019#TD4037E.TXT.r#2390583#2390583#TD4037E.TXT.r_568# de la mya ngan las 'das pa dang  mya ngan las 'das pa yang dag par thob par byed pa dag dang  mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyogs 'jig rten pa dang  'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos de dag ni mdor bsdu na byang  chub sems dpa'i bdag dang gzhan gyi don phan pa'i rgyu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba yin te / /
column20: 0.019#TD4037E.TXT.r#2390234#2390234#TD4037E.TXT.r_534;TD4037E.TXT.r_535# sems can tshad med pa dag la don tshad med pa mdzad pa de yang gzhan gyi don 'ba' zhig yin par rig par bya'o // / +de la gzhan gyi don 'ba' zhig yin pa ji skad bstan pa snga ma gnyis ni byang chub sems dpas yongs su shes par byas nas spang    par bya ba yin no // /
column21: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#474855#474855#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5774;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5775# 'dod pa lnga'i bde ba la  spyod pa gang yin pa de ni bde ba'i mtha'o // / +bdag nyid ltogs bzhin du dka' ba spyod pa gang yin pa de ni sdug bsngal la spyod pa'i mtha' ste / /
column22: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#475263#475264#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5803;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5804# rgyu dang rkyen gang gi phyir dngos po dgu po de dag la bsam par mi bya zhe na / / +smras pa / /
column23: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#475956#475956#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5851# rnam pa des gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po de yongs su shes pa'i phyir ro // /
column24: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#476539#476539#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5899# ming gi tshogs dang tshig gi tshogs dang  yi ge'i tshogs gang dag gis phung po rnams gdags par 'gyur ba'i phung po'i gdags pa de ni ming gi tshogs dang  tshig gi tshogs dang  yi ge'i tshogs de dag la ltos pa yin te / /
column25: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#477177#477177#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5950# 'thad pa sgrub pa'i rigs pa ni dam pa rnams kyi snying po 'phrog par byed pa'i tshad ma gsum po de dag gis 'di lta ste / /

column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#535465#535477#TD4026E.TXT.r_3362;TD4026E.TXT.r_3363;TD4026E.TXT.r_3364# rab tu 'jog pa dang  rnam par 'byed pa dang  rnam par 'brel pa ni go rims bzhin du stan pa dang   rnam par 'byed pa dang  the tshom gcod pa rnams kyis so // / +gsal bar byed pa ni bshad pa la nges pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i phyir lan mang du byed pa dang ldan par ston pa yin no // /

column3: sangs rgyas  sku ni nges par ston // / +so sor rtog pa'i ye shes ni // /

column5: 0.017#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#478693#478695#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6079;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6080# mngon sum du dmigs pa'i phyir des gdon mi za bar ma 'ongs pa na yang sdug bsngal ba'i 'bras bu yod par rjes su dpag pa'o // / +sems can bde ba dang  sdug bsngal gyi las yongs su dag pa dang   yongs su ma dag pa la gnas pa na mngon sum du dmigs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gsum pa bdag med pa rags pa la brten nas / /
column6: 0.017#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#469131#469131#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5311# skal ba med pa kho nar 'gyur ba ni ma yin no // /
column7: 0.017#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#476013#476013#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5855;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5856# lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di las zhes bya ba nas lha dang mi dang bcas pa'i bar las grol ba nas rnam par thar par rab tu grol ba zhes bya ba'i bar du'o // / +der rab tu shes pa  ni 'di lta ste / /
column8: 0.017#TD4026E.TXT.r#534911#534912#TD4026E.TXT.r_3312# thos pa las byung ba'i  shes pa phun sum tshogs pa'i rten yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column9: 0.017#TD4035E.TXT.r#233842#233843#TD4035E.TXT.r_135# rtsa ba'i dri dang  snying po'i dri dang   lo ma'i dri dang  me tog gi dri dang  'bras bu'i dri la sogs pa dri mang po dag go // /
column10: 0.017#TD4086E.TXT.r#2356927#2356927#TD4086E.TXT.r_2484# 'jig rten 'di 'jig pa'i rgyus la mi mkhas shing 'chags pa'i rgyus la mi mkhas pa de dag gis me lce de mthong nas me lce 'di tshangs pa'i gzhal  med khang stong pa'i bar du bsregs nas 'di nyid du mi 'ong grang zhes mi dga' zhing skyo bar 'gyur ro // /
column11: 0.017#TD4037E.TXT.r#2405391#2405391#TD4037E.TXT.r_1696# rtag tu 'ong zhing de'i drung du ci dga' bar 'khod pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pa la ni  tha na dud 'gro rnams kyang mchod pa byed de / /
column12: 0.017#TD4086E.TXT.r#2357560#2357560#TD4086E.TXT.r_2544;TD4086E.TXT.r_2545# dge slong dag 'du byed thams cad kyis ni ye chog go // / +skyo bar byas na legs so // /
column13: 0.026#TD4037E.TXT.r#2406211#2406211#TD4037E.TXT.r_1752# shes bya'i sgrib pa spang ba  mngon sum du bya ba'i skal pa dang ldan zhing mthu yod par 'gyur ro // /

column3: shes bya kun la rtag mi thogs // /

column3: sems can kun gyi don sgrub pa'o // / +sangs rgyas sprul pa de rtag tu // /

column6: 0.025#TD4035E.TXT.r#234549#234551#TD4035E.TXT.r_193# rang gi rtog pa'i dbang gis ni ma yin no // /
column7: 0.028#TD4037E.TXT.r#2389932#2389932#TD4037E.TXT.r_516# 'jig rten gyi zang zing 'thob pa'i rgyur de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mchod pa byed  pa dang rnyed pa 'dod pa rnyed pa'i rgyu dang  rnyed pa 'grub pa'i yang dag pa ma yin pa'i yon tan sna tshogs don med pa gzhan dag gi spro ba skyed pa dag ston pa dang  bdag la bsnyen bkur bya ba bdag gir bya bar 'dod pas bsnyen bkur bya ba bdag gir bya ba'i don du chos ma yin pas tshogs sdud  par byed kyi / /
column8: 0.028#TD4099E.TXT.r#228326#228326#TD4099E.TXT.r_3769;TD4099E.TXT.r_3770# grong gi tsher ma dkrugs pa dang / / +nga rgyal zad pa rjes thob pa // /

column3: rigs tha dad phyir don yod  phyir // /

column3: rdzogs phyir thog ma med pa'i phyir // / +sangs rgyas gcig min dri med gnas // /

column5: 0.010#TD4026E.TXT.r#537141#537143#TD4026E.TXT.r_3537# spangs pa gsum ni kun brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid med pa la stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang  gzhan gyi dbang dang  yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid dag yod pa la smon pa med pa dang  mtshan ma med pa dag go // /
column6: 0.026#TD4037E.TXT.r#2426160#2426160#TD4037E.TXT.r_3263;TD4037E.TXT.r_3264# byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta ste / / +gzhan la snying brtse ba kho na nye bar bzung nas  so sor brtags te / /

column3: tha dad med phyir mang po'ang min // /

column5: 0.027#TD4035E.TXT.r#236533#236533#TD4035E.TXT.r_370# yang gal te gang zag dge ba dang mi dge ba byed byed pa 'chi ba ni sngon goms pa'i dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos rnams bdag nyid kyis dran nam / /
column6: 0.028#TD4086E.TXT.r#2381384#2381384#TD4086E.TXT.r_4352# de dag de'i nang du 'ang 'gro ste bskol zhing 'tshed do // /
column7: 0.028#TD4035E.TXT.r#237211#237211#TD4035E.TXT.r_432# de nas lus thams cad nas grang mor 'gyur  te de lus la chags pa skyes pa dang  sngon spros pa la mngon par dga' ba'i rgyus yongs su bsgos pa dang dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyi rgyus yongs su bsgos pas / /

column3: bsgom pa dam par 'dod pa ste // / +thob par lta ba med rnams kyi // /

column3: thob pa yang ni dam par 'dod // / +bla ma ring dang mtshan ma dang / /

column3: bdag gi brtson 'grus lhag lta ba'i // / +byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal can // /

column5: 0.023#TD4009E.TXT.r#585258#585260#TD4009E.TXT.r_27# bcom ldan  'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams las brtsams nas theg pa chen po rnam pa bcu drug po 'di dag gis chos bstan te / /
column6: 0.023#TD4014E.TXT.r#793869#793869#TD4014E.TXT.r_139# mngon par byang chub pa'i stobs kyis dngos po'i ngo bo nyid ma lus par yongs su mkhyen pa'i phyir chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa ma yin no // /

column3: byang chub las ni ring zhes  bya // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#535738#535746#TD4026E.TXT.r_3392;TD4026E.TXT.r_3393# don rnam gnyis ldan gzung sla dang / /

column3: ji skad bshad pa de dag kun // / +rtog pa tsam du lta ba yi // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#535745#535758#TD4026E.TXT.r_3392;TD4026E.TXT.r_3393;TD4026E.TXT.r_3394# don rnam gnyis ldan gzung sla dang / / +yon tan bzhi ldan  tshangs spyod ston // /

column3: klung dag sa yi 'og tu ma song ba // /

column5: 0.022#TD4035E.TXT.r#237745#237746#TD4035E.TXT.r_483# de de nas shi 'phos pa na sngar 'chi ba'i srid  pa'i tshe 'khrul pa'i gzugs mthong bar de bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur ro // /
column6: 0.023#TD4086E.TXT.r#2358244#2358247#TD4086E.TXT.r_2592# dpag tshad brgyad khri ni chu'i 'og gser gyi sa gzhi chen po la brten to // /
column7: 0.024#TD4035E.TXT.r#233777#233778#TD4035E.TXT.r_126# gang 'byung ba chen po bzhi po dag rgyur byas pa / /
column8: 0.025#TD4035E.TXT.r#247387#247387#TD4035E.TXT.r_1309# 'byung ba chen po'i phan pa dang  gnod pa dag gis grub pa dang  bde ba gcig pa'i phyir ro // /
column9: 0.025#TD4099E.TXT.r#222611#222611#TD4099E.TXT.r_3016# blo la phan ni ma byung bar // /
column10: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#484040#484041#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6504;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6505# bum pa la sogs pa ni med pas de'i phyir gtan tshigs 'di ni bde ba dang  nam mkha' chos mtshungs pa mad pa'i phyir ma nges  pa zhes bya'o // / +de la phan tshun 'gal bar nges pa ni dper na sgra ni mi rtag pa'o zhes dam bca' ba lta bu ste / /
column11: 0.025#TD4026E.TXT.r#536928#536928#TD4026E.TXT.r_3516;TD4026E.TXT.r_3517# ston pa'i phan yon gyi tshigs su bcad pa / / +de ltar blo bzang skyo ba med ldan brtse ba can // /
column12: 0.025#TD4026E.TXT.r#537341#537341#TD4026E.TXT.r_3559# theg pa ches khyad par du 'phags pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro // /
column13: 0.025#TD4086E.TXT.r#2382539#2382539#TD4086E.TXT.r_4422# mi rigs pa'i 'tsho ba'i mi rnams kyis zhes bya ba la mi rigs pas 'tsho ba zhes bya ba ni shan pa dang  bya gag 'tshong ba dang  phag 'tshong ba dang  bya ba dang  ri bong rgyas  shor ba dang  nya pa dang  ri dags kyi rngon pa dang  chom rkun dang  gshed ma dang  ba lang gsod pa dang  sbrul tshogs can dang  btson srung dang  phra ma can dang  gnod byed dang  de la sogs pa gzhan yang gang zag gang yin pa de dag ces bya ba'i bar du rgyas par bya'o // /
column14: 0.029#TD4037E.TXT.r#2390231#2390231#TD4037E.TXT.r_534;TD4037E.TXT.r_535# sems can tshad med pa dag la don tshad med pa mdzad pa de yang gzhan gyi don 'ba' zhig yin par rig par bya'o // / +de la gzhan gyi don 'ba' zhig yin pa ji skad bstan pa snga ma gnyis ni byang chub sems dpas yongs su shes par byas nas spang    par bya ba yin no // /

column3: chu yang chung zhing bya ba tha dad byed // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#535792#535802#TD4026E.TXT.r_3398# yon tan bzhi ldan gyi tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par rab tu ston pa'i  chos ni go rims bzhin du thos pa dang  bsams pa dang  bsgoms pa dag gis dad pa dang dga' ba dang  blo'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir thog ma dang  bar dang tha mar dge ba yin no // /

column3: chu gnas srog chags phra mo'i nyer spyad 'gyur // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#535801#535810#TD4026E.TXT.r_3398# yon tan bzhi ldan gyi tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par rab tu ston pa'i  chos ni go rims bzhin du thos pa dang  bsams pa dang  bsgoms pa dag gis dad pa dang dga' ba dang  blo'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir thog ma dang  bar dang tha mar dge ba yin no // /
column5: 1.788#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3110943#3110943#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2038;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2039# yid mi bde bar mi 'gyur / / +dran pa dang shes bzhin dang ldan pas btang snyoms su gnas so // /
column6: 0.020#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3110032#3110035#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1977# ci lta re zhig rnam grangs rnam par bshad pa'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa gnyis  pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang po'i mdo las / /
column7: 0.022#TD4013E.TXT.r#1105251#1105251#TD4013E.TXT.r_772;TD4013E.TXT.r_773# yang na sngar thos pa dang bsams ba tsam gyis sems la gtad de rgyas par byas nas phyis sgom pa'i ye shes kyi yongs su mthar thug par byed pa ni rnam par sbyangs pa'o // / +de ltar dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang  byang chub kyi spyod pa ston pa dang  bzang  po spyod pa spyod pa na ci zhig bya snyam pa la / /
column8: 0.022#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3109999#3109999#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1974;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1975# yang nyan thos kyi rnam par bshad pa las sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa bcu gsum pa'i mdo las tshe dang ldan pa bde byed kyi ji skad bstan  pa bzhin te / / +gzhan yang mdo de dang de las 'don pa lta bu'o // /

column12: 3.576#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1708409#1708415#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6326;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6327# de yang chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs shing thugs su chud pa'i rang bzhin yin pas so sor rtog pa'i ye shes zhes bya'o // /
column13: 3.576#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1713076#1713077#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6671;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6672# sa dang por chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i mos pa spyod pa'i sar bskal pa grangs med pa gcig tu bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa dang ldan pa la ni tshogs bsags pa'i mos pa zhes  bya'o // / +chos kyi dbyings rtogs par 'gyur ba'i rgyu bskal pa grangs med pa gcig tu bsod nams dang  ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa dang ldan pa'i mos pa med pa ni tshogs med pa'i mos pa zhes bya'o // /
column14: 3.576#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1717621#1717622#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6987# 'dod  pa la chags pa ni gang bcom ldan 'das kyis spyod du mi gnang bar bslab pa tshigs su bcad pa las 'das nas yo byad sna tshogs la sogs pa'i tshul gyis bdag chags pa dang rgyags par bya ba'i don du kun du longs spyod par byed pa ste / /

column16: 3.576#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1748970#1748980#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9330# rgyu dmigs nas dga' ba yid la byed pa dang  gnas la de'i rjes su dran pa yid la byed pa dang  'bras bu'i thun mong 'dod pa yid la byed pa dang  ji ltar byang chub tu mos pa yid  la byed pa ste / /
column17: 3.576#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1749981#1749986#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9393;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9394;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9395# sgrub pa dag ni rnam bzhi'o // / +zhes bya ba la / /
column18: 3.576#TD4037E.TXT.r#2456761#2456761#TD4037E.TXT.r_5549;TD4037E.TXT.r_5550# nges byas pa'i spong ba la yang 'gog par mi rtog go // / +de 'thob pa'i rgyu la yang lam du mi rtog la / /
column19: 3.576#TD4037E.TXT.r#2458839#2458840#TD4037E.TXT.r_5692# de bzhin du zhing gi dngos po dang  khyim gyi dngos po dang  zong dgram pa'i khang pa'i dngos po dang  rgyal srid kyi dngos po dang  yul gyi dngos po dang  nor gyi dngos po dang  'bru'i dngos po 'dod pa rnams dang   de bzhin du bzo dang  las kyi gnas kyi rig pa 'dod pa rnams dang  de bzhin du des grogs bya bar 'dod pa rnams dang  bag ma len pa dang  bag ma gtong bar 'dod pa rnams dang  lhag par za ba rnams dang  'du zhing za bar 'dod pa rnams dang  bya ba'i grogs 'dod pa'i sems  can rnams la gal te khyed rnams par 'dzin par byed na ni / /

column22: 3.576#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1533366#1533368#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_12476# bsams pa las byung ba ni de bsams pa nyid las skyes pa dag go // /
column23: 3.576#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1534729#1534736#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_12587# yang mtshungs par ldan pa dang  lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu la tha dad du bya ba ci yod ces  khong na yod pa'i dri ba gtan la dbab par bya ba'i phyir / /

column26: 0.021#TD4095E.TXT.r#159181#159181#TD4095E.TXT.r_4448# la dmyal bar skye ba la sogs pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa gsum gsungs so // /
column27: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1748521#1748521#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9300# 'di ltar legs par smras pa dang  nyes par smras pa rnams  kyi don phyin ci ma log par shes par bya ba dang  rgyu rig pa'i gtsug lag shes pas rnam pa'i mu stegs pa dag tshar bcad pa dang bstan pa 'di la ma dad pa rnams dad pa bskyed pa dang  dad pa bskyed pa rnams dad pa phyir zhing 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed do // /
column28: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1750652#1750652#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9440# bsam gtan gyi mthus lo nyes dang nad la sogs pa zhi bar byed pas gzhan la phan btags so // /
column29: 0.022#TD4027E.TXT.r#1005291#1005291#TD4027E.TXT.r_1152;TD4027E.TXT.r_1153# bstan pa  yin par 'dod pa'o // / +theg pa chen po bla na med pa nyid rnam pa gsum ste / /

column6: 0.010#TD4050E.TXT.r#2013938#2013939#TD4050E.TXT.r_1521# de la re zhig sgyu ma'i dpe ni nang gi bdag nyid can gyi skye mched drug po mig la sogs pa rnams kyi gnyen po ste gang gi phyir sgyu ma'i glang po bzhin du  de dag yod pa ma yin na yang nye bar dmigs pa nyid du blta bar bya'o zhes ston to // /
column7: 0.016#TD4086E.TXT.r#2332060#2332060#TD4086E.TXT.r_847# lha dang lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing gang yang rung ba  dang 'dra bar bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas glang po che thams cad kyi nang na dbang che bar grags pa gang yin pa de nyid kyi mgo bo 'am / /
column8: 0.016#TD4061E.TXT.r#2791332#2791332#TD4061E.TXT.r_3787# yang dag min yang dag min pa min ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i thar  pa dang mthun pa ste / /

column11: 0.017#TD4095E.TXT.r#159179#159179#TD4095E.TXT.r_4448# la dmyal bar skye ba la sogs pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa gsum gsungs so // /
column12: 0.017#TD4035E.TXT.r#390074#390074#TD4035E.TXT.r_14674# de de la brten nas des 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs pa thob pa des / /
column13: 0.017#TD4091E.TXT.r#1317351#1317351#TD4091E.TXT.r_6573;TD4091E.TXT.r_6574# zhes bshad pa las de dag kyang phra rgyas kyi dbang gis bsags par 'gyur gyi phra rgyas med bar ni srid pa mngon par mi 'grub pa'i phyir / / +srid pa'i  rtsa ba phra rgyas yin par rig par bya'o // /
column14: 0.017#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#2971858#2971859#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_6912;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_6913# gyo ldan dang  lam mchog 'gro ni nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi'o // / +rnga yab dang rnga yab gzhan ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi ste / /
column15: 0.018#TD4067E.TXT.r#1981344#1981345#TD4067E.TXT.r_591;TD4067E.TXT.r_592# nges pa'i dngos po la de bzhin du 'dzin pa'o // / +nges pa'i dngos po zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga'i tshogs te / /

column17: 0.019#TD4051E.TXT.r#2294205#2294205#TD4051E.TXT.r_4869# rnam pa kun du lha mi rnams kyis mthong ba yang ma  lags zhes bya ba ni sku gsum gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi tshul bstan pa ste / /
column18: 0.020#TD4035E.TXT.r#256200#256200#TD4035E.TXT.r_2158# yang 'dus par gyur nas / /
column19: 0.022#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1477307#1477307#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_7813# byed pa po gzhan dang    ldan pa med pa'i phyir ro // /
column20: 0.023#TD4026E.TXT.r#502309#502309#TD4026E.TXT.r_227# sna tshogs ston zhing mang po'i sgo nas rtag tu ston dang ldan // /
column21: 0.025#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1912146#1912146#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_336# bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab ni ming la dmigs pa yin la / /
column22: 0.026#TD4026E.TXT.r#533052#533052#TD4026E.TXT.r_3138;TD4026E.TXT.r_3139# mtshan rnams ni mdzes par byed pa'i phyir rin po che lta bu ste / / +de bas na de'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir chos la rin po che ra 'du shes so // /
column23: 0.026#TD4047E.TXT.r#2040994#2040997#TD4047E.TXT.r_223;TD4047E.TXT.r_224# nyan thos kyi gtso bo rnams kyang rung / / +rang sangs rgyas kyi bse ru lta bu yang rung / /
column24: 0.028#TD4048E.TXT.r#3081335#3081335#TD4048E.TXT.r_1811# 'pho ba dang  bltams pa dang  'dod pa la spyod pa dang  mngon par 'byung ba dang  mu stegs can gyi gang du gshegs pa dang  dka' pa spyod pa dang  mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang  chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba  dang  yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po kun tu ston pa'i phyir ro // /
column25: 0.028#TD4095E.TXT.r#161604#161604#TD4095E.TXT.r_4711# kha na ma tho rab cher 'dod // /
column26: 0.029#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1498982#1498982#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_9623# thob pa chad pas ma thob pa skye'o zhes bshad pa  de'i phyir thob pa'i ma thob pa yang yod do // /

column3: ji ltar bran ni rtag     // / +tu 'jigs shing skrag pa'i lus kyis rnam par rgyu // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#536280#536289#TD4026E.TXT.r_3449;TD4026E.TXT.r_3450;TD4026E.TXT.r_3451# yun ring por dka' ba spyod pa'i ngal bas shin  tu nyon mongs pa yin no // / +dgongs pa rnam par dbye ba'i tshigs su bcad pa / /
column5: 0.0#TD4027E.TXT.r#1005233#1005241#TD4027E.TXT.r_1145;TD4027E.TXT.r_1146;TD4027E.TXT.r_1147# bshad pa ni rjes su mthun pa'i 'bras bu la sogs pa drug ste / /
column6: 0.0#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#2971872#2971880#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_6914;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_6915;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_6916# thams cad na yang mi rnams gnas so // /
column7: 0.017#TD4069E.TXT.r#1159052#1159054#TD4069E.TXT.r_3255;TD4069E.TXT.r_3256# gdul ba ma yin pa de rnams ni des gdul ba ma yin pa rnams te / /
column8: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#847628#847629#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_2373;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_2374# byang chub sems dpa' yang dag 'phags la bshad pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro // / +gzhan yang tshig nges par 'grel pa'i mdo las ni gleng gzhi dang yang dag pa'i gzhung nyid dang  bstan pa gnas pa'i phyogs rdzogs par 'byung la / /
column9: 0.021#TD4050E.TXT.r#2004616#2004616#TD4050E.TXT.r_840# 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems ni ma 'dres pa ste zhes bya ba dang  de ni sngar ma skyes pas de'i gang de'i bag chags ni med pa nyid do zhes bya ba la / /
column10: 0.022#TD4091E.TXT.r#1250243#1250243#TD4091E.TXT.r_235;TD4091E.TXT.r_236# 'byung ba chen po dag bshad zin to // / +gang dag  gzugs kyi phung po'i rang bzhin smras pa de dag nyid // /
column11: 0.022#TD4091E.TXT.r#1261957#1261957#TD4091E.TXT.r_1351# gang lus kyi dbang po dang ldan pa de yang gsum po de dag dang lus kyi dbang po ste dbang po bzhi dang ngo // /
column12: 0.022#TD4045E.TXT.r#720285#720285#TD4045E.TXT.r_122# mthun pa ni 'grus skyong gi tshogs kyis bshad de / /
column13: 0.022#TD4050E.TXT.r#1996172#1996172#TD4050E.TXT.r_160# tshul khrims kyi dbang du byas pa'i bslab pa ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims te / /
column14: 0.022#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1952577#1952578#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_3782;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_3783# 'di la ni shin tu sbyangs pa bde ba yin la / / +de la ni tshor ba bde ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di ga las shes she na / /
column15: 0.023#TD4047E.TXT.r#2045359#2045359#TD4047E.TXT.r_588;TD4047E.TXT.r_589# zho sha dang ldan no snyam du spro ba bskyed pa dang zhes bya ba bstan pa yin no // / +ngoms pa med pa'i brtson 'grus ni chung ngu tsam mam / /
column16: 0.023#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2603473#2603473#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_4447# de bzhin du gzhan la yang sbyar bar bya'o // /
column17: 0.023#TD4047E.TXT.r#2224024#2224025#TD4047E.TXT.r_14943# bsam gtan gyi stobs kyis 'bad pa med par don rab tu bsgrub pa nyid dang  de bzhin du 'jig rten las 'das pa'i don sgrub par    byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro // /

column20: 0.024#TD4035E.TXT.r#364967#364967#TD4035E.TXT.r_12467;TD4035E.TXT.r_12468# bag la nyal gyi sgo nas spangs pa'i tshogs gsum po nyon mongs pa can 'dod pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa de dag las sems shin tu rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro // / +de de'i tshe sred  pa gang gzugs rnams nas reg bya rnams kyi bar du 'phros pas 'phrad pa'i sred pa dang  yang dang yang du 'dod pa'i sred pa dang  bral bar mi 'dod pa'i sred pa dang  phrad par mi 'dod pa'i sred pa dang  'bri bar 'dod pa'i sred pa dang  bral bar 'dod pa'i sred pa dang   'dod pa'i khams su yang skye bar 'dod pa'i sred pa ste / /
column21: 0.025#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1957986#1957986#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_4264# kye ma sems can rnams ni sdug bsngal lo snyam du yid la byed cing snying rje la snyoms par  'jug go // /
column22: 0.026#TD4091E.TXT.r#1251197#1251197#TD4091E.TXT.r_319# de lta ma yin na mig dang  rna ba'i rten gcig pa dang  sna'i bu ga gcig tu gyur na shin tu mi mdzes pa'i phyir ro // /
column23: 0.027#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1470987#1470988#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_7255# mig la sogs pa rnams sngar 'gags zin pa'i phyir dang  lus dang  srog dang  yid kyi dbang po dang  btang snyoms rnams phan tshun mi 'dor bas so sor 'gag pa ma yin pa de'i phyir rim gyis 'chi ba dag las bzhi 'gag go // /
column24: 0.027#TD4086E.TXT.r#2358223#2358229#TD4086E.TXT.r_2590;TD4086E.TXT.r_2591# thur du yang zug par byed de gyen du yang 'byung bar byed do // /

column26: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#848816#848818#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_2458;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_2459# tshad med pa'i sems bzhi ni tshangs pa'i gnas pa zhes bya'o // / +stong pa dang mtshan ma med pa dang  smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni 'phags pa'i gnas pa zhes bya'o // /
column27: 0.029#TD4014E.TXT.r#801236#801236#TD4014E.TXT.r_706# dus gsum du gtogs pa'i rgyal ba rnams kyi byang chub spyod pa smon lam gyi bye  brag gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad bdag gis ma lus par / /

column3: ji ltar rgyal po yang ni bka' yis yul la dbang sgyur gnas pa ltar // /

column7: 0.021#TD4027E.TXT.r#1005221#1005221#TD4027E.TXT.r_1143;TD4027E.TXT.r_1144# de gong nas gong du bsgrub pa ni de ma yin pa gzhan bzhi'o // / +bstan pa ni phyi ma phyi ma'i 'bras bu la sogs pa bzhi'o // /
column8: 0.022#TD4037E.TXT.r#2448056#2448056#TD4037E.TXT.r_4898# de la sems can la dbye ba med pa dang  dngos po la dbye ba med pa dang  dus la dbye ba med pas ni rgya cher rig par bya'o // /
column9: 0.023#TD4096E.TXT.r#2817304#2817304#TD4096E.TXT.r_619# du ni dmigs pa  kho na'i sgo nas nges par gzung nas 'dri bar mi byed pa ni 'di ltar gang dag dmigs pa'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur ba de dag ni gdon mi za bar mtshungs par ldan pa'i sgo nas kyang rgyas par 'gyur ro // /

column3: de bzhin gyem dang gnas dang rang gzhan phan bya don byed pa'i // /

column5: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#853557#853560#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_2819;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_2820# slob dpon nye ba'i 'od kyis byas pa'i 'grel pa las 'di ltar gzhal med khang chen po de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnga' bdag yin gyis gzhan ni ma yin te / / +khyad par du gyur pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das nyag gcig mnga'  ba yin no // /
column6: 0.021#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#2972632#2972632#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_6981# lhag ma bzhi pa ni chu bo rab med thal chu khol mas gang ba ste / /
column7: 0.021#TD4067E.TXT.r#1987586#1987586#TD4067E.TXT.r_1199;TD4067E.TXT.r_1200# 'jug pa rang dbang med par sems sdud pa'o // / +gnyid kyi rgyu la brten nas gti mug gi char gtogs pa sems las byung ba'i chos kyi sems rang dbang  med pa skyed do // /
column8: 0.027#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1478038#1478038#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_7863;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_7864# don 'di ni dad par bya ba yin gyi / / +rjes su dpag par bya ba ni ma yin no zhes bya ba 'byung ste / /
column9: 0.028#TD4027E.TXT.r#1006187#1006187#TD4027E.TXT.r_1236;TD4027E.TXT.r_1237# chos spyod rnam pa bcu gang zhe na / / +yi ge 'dri mchod sbyin pa dang / /
column10: 0.029#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1618155#1618155#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_19283# log pa'i chos kyis  kun nas dkris pa zhes bya ba ni log pa'i chos kun du ston par byed pa'o // /

column6: 0.0#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#2971898#2971905#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_6917;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_6918;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_6919# 'di nas byang du ri nag po // / +dgu 'das gangs ri'o // /
column7: 0.018#TD4067E.TXT.r#1976447#1976449#TD4067E.TXT.r_123;TD4067E.TXT.r_124# gzugs gang yin pa ci yang rung ste / /
column8: 0.018#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2708800#2708800#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_11110;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_11111# bstan pa'i phyir rnam grangs gnyis gsungs so zhes bya bar sbyar ro // / +mngon sum dang  zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni ma rig pa la sogs pa mngon sum dang  brgyud pa'i rgyun gyis rkyen gyi ngo bo bstan pa'i phyir rnam grangs gnyis gsungs pa yin te / /
column9: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#874184#874184#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4372;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4373# 'di ni sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams la bya bar bstan pa'i phyir / / +phyi ma sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba bstan to // /
column10: 0.023#TD4096E.TXT.r#2819208#2819208#TD4096E.TXT.r_747;TD4096E.TXT.r_748# de na khyad par du ma byas pas rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun  pa'i lam dgu po ni sa 'og ma'i gnyen po la dmigs pa yin no zhes bshad kyi / / +nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pas bsdus pas sa 'og ma'i gnyen po la dmigs so zhes khyad par du byas nas ni ma bstan la / /
column11: 0.025#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#2972903#2972903#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_7004# gshin rjes bsgo ba gang dag gi sems can rnams dmyal ba dag tu khrid par byed pa de dag gshin rje srin po zhes bshad kyi / /

column3: theg pa chen po de la de mchog tshul bzhin rig nas ni // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#536323#536332#TD4026E.TXT.r_3455;TD4026E.TXT.r_3456# dgongs pa rnam pa bzhi la mnyam  pa nyid la dgongs pa ni / / +'di ltar nga nyid de'i tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs su gyur to zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#2971912#2971915#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_6919# 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i byang    phyogs 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid na ri nag po gsum yod do // /

column3: 'di na brtan pas de la de nyid rtag par rab tu tshol // /

column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#536356#536369#TD4026E.TXT.r_3458;TD4026E.TXT.r_3459# don gzhan la dgongs pa ni 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid  med pa ma skyes pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa lta bu ste / /
column5: 0.022#TD4071E.TXT.r#747524#747526#TD4071E.TXT.r_1842;TD4071E.TXT.r_1843# 'dir ni rnam par brtag pa gnyis te / / +rim gyi de la bdag rag lus pa'i dngos po la bya ba byed dam cig car  yin grang na / /
column6: 0.022#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#973326#973326#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11868# rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i sgo nas bstan pa dang  'di ltar yon tan 'byung gnas zhes bya ba man chad kyis snga ma'i rnal 'byor bzlas nas zhus pa snga ma'i  lan gsungs pa'o // /
column7: 0.026#TD4035E.TXT.r#272233#272233#TD4035E.TXT.r_3649# de'i dbang gis 'ong ba dang 'gro ba dang  bskum pa dang  brkyang ba la sogs pa'i las 'jug ste / /
column8: 0.029#TD4026E.TXT.r#528259#528259#TD4026E.TXT.r_2696# med dang yod nyid dang yin dang / /

column3: gzhan  dag la ni zas sbyin pa'i // / +bsod nams 'phel ba ji lta bar // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#536368#536381#TD4026E.TXT.r_3458;TD4026E.TXT.r_3459;TD4026E.TXT.r_3460# don gzhan la dgongs pa ni 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid  med pa ma skyes pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa lta bu ste / / +don la sgra ji bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: bdag nyid za ba'i ma yin pa // / +de bzhin gzhan don rten gyi chos // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#536382#536394#TD4026E.TXT.r_3460;TD4026E.TXT.r_3461# dus gzhan la dgongs pa ni / /

column3: bstan las mdo las gsungs pa yi // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#536395#536402#TD4026E.TXT.r_3461;TD4026E.TXT.r_3462# 'di ltar gang dag bde ba can du smon lam 'debs pa de dag der skye bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste / /
column5: 0.025#TD4091E.TXT.r#1322799#1322799#TD4091E.TXT.r_7040# 'on kyang yod na ni nges par 'dus ma byas yin pa'i phyir rtag par yod par 'gyur te / /

column3: bsod nams cher 'byung thob pa ltar // /
