column15: 0.021#TD4026E.TXT.r#555801#555801#TD4026E.TXT.r_5432# mi dmigs pas min gang de brtse min te // /
column16: 0.022#TD4041E.TXT.r#2311915#2311915#TD4041E.TXT.r_994;TD4041E.TXT.r_995# rang gi yongs su gzung bar ma gyur pa gzhan gyi rgyud la yod pa tha ma dang 'bring dang khyad par can la ni nga rgyal gyi rnam pa la brten pas rlom sems su byed do // / +mnyam par  gzhag pa yin pa'i sa pa 'dod pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa la ni gong nas gong du don du gnyer bar byed do // /
column17: 0.022#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3111333#3111334#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2072# de dag mthong nas dge slong mngon par dga' ba dang  brjod pa dang  zhen pa dang  lhag par zhen cing gnas pa dang  yid kyi rnam    par shes par bya ba'i chos mi 'dod pa dang  mi dga' ba dang  mi sdug pa dang  yid du mi 'ong ba dang  'dod par bya ba ma yin pa dang  rab tu dga' bar bya ba ma yin pa dang  sdug bsngal ba dang  nad dang  rjes su mi mthun pa yod de / /
column18: 0.022#TD4064E.TXT.r#758444#758445#TD4064E.TXT.r_4;TD4064E.TXT.r_5# sum cu pa'i bshad pa / / +bam po dang po / /
column19: 0.022#TD4091E.TXT.r#1265472#1265472#TD4091E.TXT.r_1681# rang gi khams pa der gtogs rnams // /
column20: 0.023#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1957076#1957077#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_4171;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_4172# 'jig rten pa rnams ni sa bcu gcig na yod do // / +'jig rten las 'das pa rnams ni gang na lam yod pa na yod do // /
column21: 0.024#TD4026E.TXT.r#547181#547188#TD4026E.TXT.r_4562# 'jig rten pa dang  'jig rten  las 'das pa dman pa dang  'jig rten las 'das pa chen po'i rab tu rnam par 'byed pa des ni kun nas nyon mongs pa las shin tu rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro // /
column22: 0.024#TD4096E.TXT.r#2821254#2821254#TD4096E.TXT.r_882# yan lag gsum bor nas bsam gtan gsum pa rnam par gzhag ste de na dga' ba yang med pas so // /
column23: 0.025#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1938544#1938544#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2528# rigs pas bskyed pa'i sgo nas mi rtag pa dang  sdug bsngal ba dang  stong pa dang  bdag med pa dang  rgyu dang  kun 'byung ba dang  rab    tu skye ba dang  rkyen dang  'di ni gnas yod do // /
column24: 0.025#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1956520#1956522#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_4120;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_4121# bsam gtan dang po kho na rtog pa dang / /
column25: 0.026#TD4026E.TXT.r#540790#540790#TD4026E.TXT.r_3929# de ni 'di'i 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog gi gnas skabs yin no // /
column26: 0.026#TD4047E.TXT.r#2161730#2161732#TD4047E.TXT.r_10025# sbyin pa la khyad du gsod pa'i nyes pa spangs pa'i phyir gus pas byed de zhes bya ba'o // /
column27: 0.026#TD4048E.TXT.r#3078504#3078504#TD4048E.TXT.r_1512;TD4048E.TXT.r_1513# mi 'byed pa kun nas nyon mongs pa med par  dka' ba spyod pa ni / / +'khor ba yongs su mi gtong yang / /
column28: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1689780#1689780#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4855;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4856# thabs med pa ni mu stegs pa thal ba dang tsher ma la sogs pa la nyal ba'i sgo nas thar pa dang  mtho ris tshol bar byed pa ste / / +de dag la thar pa'i lam byang chub kyi phyogs ston par byed pa dang  mtho ris kyi lam dge ba bcu ston par byed  pa'i phyir ro // /
column29: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1690526#1690526#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4916;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4917# da ni gnas yongs su gyur pa'i don bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa drug rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // / +de la gnas zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi phung po nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du phung po lnga la bya ste / /
column30: 0.027#TD4026E.TXT.r#544819#544821#TD4026E.TXT.r_4323;TD4026E.TXT.r_4324# sbyin pa des rjes su bzung ba'i sems can de dag ni de lta ma yin te / /
column31: 0.027#TD4037E.TXT.r#2438744#2438744#TD4037E.TXT.r_4263# 'di la byang chub sems dpas ni sems can gang dag phun sum tshogs pa chen po la gnas pa  de dag kyang sdug bsngal gsum po 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal dang  'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal dang  sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dang 'brel par mthong na rgud pa la gnas pa rnams lta ci smos te / /
column32: 0.027#TD4069E.TXT.r#1117523#1117523#TD4069E.TXT.r_167;TD4069E.TXT.r_168# 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal las dgongs pa yin no zhes bya ba ni zag pa dang bcas pa thams cad ni 'du byed kyi sdug  bsngal gyis khyab pa de lta bu'i phyir ro // / +dgongs pas mtshon pa ni dgongs pa'i mtshan nyid do // /
column33: 0.027#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1460701#1460702#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_6361# rkub kyang rtug par bya ba la dbang po ma yin te zhes bya ba  ni mi gtsang ba rtug par bya ba la'o // /
column34: 0.027#TD4068E.TXT.r#1036327#1036327#TD4068E.TXT.r_611# sdug bsngal ni byung ba las gang bral bar 'dod pa'o zhes bya ba smos te / /
column35: 0.028#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3129241#3129241#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_3494# 'on kyang 'di ni nga'i bdag yin no zhes 'di ni nga'i bdag tu yang dag par rjes su mthong ba dang  de'i bdag tu rtogs par gyur te / /
column36: 0.028#TD4089E.TXT.r#1021145#1021145#TD4089E.TXT.r_1471;TD4089E.TXT.r_1472# mi dge'i 'gyod pa'ang ma yin no // / +sdug bsngal rgyu  mthong spang bya ba // /
column37: 0.028#TD4037E.TXT.r#2482507#2482507#TD4037E.TXT.r_7439# gnas pa mchog la ni nyon mongs pa dang  bag chags dang  bag la nyal gyi sgrib pa thams cad spong bar rig par bya ste / /
column38: 0.029#TD4035E.TXT.r#284529#284529#TD4035E.TXT.r_4789# ma byin par len pa ma spangs pa yin zhes bya ba ni srog gcod pa rnam par dbye ba bzhin du / /
column39: 0.029#TD4069E.TXT.r#1120897#1120897#TD4069E.TXT.r_391# de logs shig tu bstan par mi 'gyur  la zhes bya ba ni sems rnam par grol ba la sems rnam par grol lo snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so zhes bya bar 'dod chags la sogs pa dang mi ldan pa'i sems de logs shig tu bstan par mi 'gyur ro // /
column40: 0.029#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2587832#2587832#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_3434# yid ni don thams cad la dmigs par bya ba la zhes bya ba smos pa ni rang gi don la dmigs pa dang dbang byed phyir zhes bya ba kho nas grub pa las yid ni don thams cad la dmigs par bya ba la zhes 'byung  ba'i sa pa ni chos thams cad chos kyi khams kyi ngo bo nyid ma yin pa'i phyir te 'di ni gong du rnam par bshad zin to // /

column3: 'das pa'i ye shes bla med pa // / +rnam par mi rtog dri ma med // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#541470#541484#TD4026E.TXT.r_4003;TD4026E.TXT.r_4004;TD4026E.TXT.r_4005# bdag nyid che lta don chen rnyed pa gang // /
column5: 0.011#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1460700#1460702#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_6360;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_6361# de bzhin du nya la sogs pa rnams la yang brjod par bya'o // / +rkub kyang rtug par bya ba la dbang po ma yin te zhes bya ba  ni mi gtsang ba rtug par bya ba la'o // /
column6: 0.012#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#489111#489113#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6856# yang na rnam pa thams cad du byed pa dang bral ba'i phyir gong du bstan pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang  rnam par  byang ba'i chos rnams kyang bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i spros pa'i byed pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro zhe'o // /
column7: 0.013#TD4064E.TXT.r#758637#758637#TD4064E.TXT.r_18;TD4064E.TXT.r_19# yang na chos dang gang zag la mngon par zhen pa dag sems tsam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mi shes te / / +de'i phyir chos dang gang zag la bdag med par bstan pas rnam par rig pa tsam 'bras bu dang bcas pa la mthar gyis 'jug     // /
column8: 0.015#TD4047E.TXT.r#2130197#2130197#TD4047E.TXT.r_7596;TD4047E.TXT.r_7597# nyes par spyod pa'i 'bras bu yang dag par ston to // / +'khor chen po'i nang du byang chub sems dpa' la gnod par bya ba'i bsam pas mi smra ba la phyir 'dri ba'i lan lon du gzhug pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i gzugs 'jigs pa bstan pas skrag par  byas nas 'dri ba'i lan 'debs su gzhug pa dang  de'i sgo nas skye bo phal po che 'dul ba'i phyir ro // /
column9: 0.015#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1690526#1690526#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4916;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4917# da ni gnas yongs su gyur pa'i don bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa drug rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // / +de la gnas zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi phung po nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du phung po lnga la bya ste / /
column10: 0.018#TD4083E.TXT.r#1247387#1247387#TD4083E.TXT.r_1228# nyon mongs pa drag pos kun nas dkris pa la sogs pa dag gis slar yang 'jug pa dag gis 'das pa las ni nyes pa med do zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don to // /
column11: 0.018#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3129236#3129236#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_3494# 'on kyang 'di ni nga'i bdag yin no zhes 'di ni nga'i bdag tu yang dag par rjes su mthong ba dang  de'i bdag tu rtogs par gyur te / /
column12: 0.019#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1963102#1963103#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_4686# mngon par shes par bya ba dang   yongs su shes par bya ba ni mig dang  gzugs rnams dang  mig gi rnam par shes ba dang  mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang  gang yang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis nang gi tshor ba bde ba'am / /
column13: 0.019#TD4091E.TXT.r#1248872#1248873#TD4091E.TXT.r_99;TD4091E.TXT.r_100# so so re re yin / / +kun du sbyor ba'i rdzas rnams ji snyed pa bral ba'i rdzas rnams kyang de snyed do // /
column14: 0.020#TD4047E.TXT.r#2108083#2108083#TD4047E.TXT.r_5805;TD4047E.TXT.r_5806# sa phyi ma rnams su 'phel bar 'gyur bas sa dang po la stobs kyi khyad par 'phel ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro // / +bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang  chub tu byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsoms rtsom pa'i sgrub pa gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab rnam pa gnyis pa bstan pa'i phyir bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyis bsdus pas tshogs kyi lam ma sbyangs par de ltar gzhan gyis byas pas de thob bar mi byed do // /
column15: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#398521#398521#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_142# 'khor ba la gcig tu mi phyogs pa nyid yid la byed pas kun tu rmongs pa dang  mya ngan las 'das pa la gcig tu phyogs pa  nyid yid la byed pas kun tu rmongs pa dang  de'i gnas ngan len mi mthun pa'i phyogs so zhes bya ba ni lnga pa shin tu rgyal bar dka' ba'i sa'i sgrib pa bstan pa'o // /
column16: 0.021#TD4037E.TXT.r#2482507#2482507#TD4037E.TXT.r_7439# gnas pa mchog la ni nyon mongs pa dang  bag chags dang  bag la nyal gyi sgrib pa thams cad spong bar rig par bya ste / /
column17: 0.022#TD4036E.TXT.r#63392#63392#TD4036E.TXT.r_5279;TD4036E.TXT.r_5280# de ni re zhig lus kyi rab tu dbye ba yin no // / +de la rjes su lta ba ni rnam pa gsum ste / /
column18: 0.022#TD4047E.TXT.r#2102193#2102193#TD4047E.TXT.r_5305# mig med pa ni long ba zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column19: 0.022#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#931137#931137#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8627# bshad pa'i rnam grangs gzhan du na de las tshig dang pos ni tha snyad kyi phyogs kyi rnam pa bstan pa ste / /
column20: 0.023#TD4036E.TXT.r#63280#63280#TD4036E.TXT.r_5275;TD4036E.TXT.r_5276# lus ni rnam pa sum cu rtsa lnga yod de / / +'di lta ste / /
column21: 0.023#TD4044E.TXT.r#695360#695361#TD4044E.TXT.r_192;TD4044E.TXT.r_193# gnod pa byed pa la mi mjed pa'i bzod ba'i rtags ni 'dir rtags zhes bstan to // / +gnod pa byed pa la mi bzod pa ni shin tu smad pa'i phyir  ro ; / /
column22: 0.023#TD4037E.TXT.r#2482058#2482060#TD4037E.TXT.r_7408;TD4037E.TXT.r_7409# de lta bas na sa de chos kyi sprin ces bya ste / / +don de nyid kyis gnas pa mchog yin par blta'o // /
column23: 0.023#TD4026E.TXT.r#554244#554246#TD4026E.TXT.r_5277;TD4026E.TXT.r_5278# de la gyo ba ni nyams pa'i skal ba can te / / +yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // /
column24: 0.023#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1930212#1930213#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_1820# 'dis mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa lhag pa'i sems las byung ba bzhi thob pa gang dag yin pa de las gang yang rung ba zhig las 'di yongs su nyams par 'gyur bar ni nga smra'i  'di gcig pus sems kyi rnam par grol ba mi gyo ba'i bar du lus kyis mngon sum du byas pa gang yin pa de las ni 'di'i rnam grangs gang gis kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur bar na mi smra'o zhes gang gsungs pa yang ji ltar na ma gyo ba'i chos can mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa  dag las yongs su nyams par 'gyur zhe na / /
column25: 0.023#TD4035E.TXT.r#284529#284529#TD4035E.TXT.r_4789# ma byin par len pa ma spangs pa yin zhes bya ba ni srog gcod pa rnam par dbye ba bzhin du / /
column26: 0.023#TD4051E.TXT.r#2260660#2260663#TD4051E.TXT.r_2029# ji ltar rnam pa du mar snang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te / /
column27: 0.025#TD4035E.TXT.r#327134#327134#TD4035E.TXT.r_8921# sems can gyi khams dpag tu med pa la 'du shes pa dang  'jig rten gyi khams dang  chos kyi khams dang  'dul ba'i  khams dang  'dul ba'i thabs kyi khams dpag tu med pa la 'du shes pa dang  de kho na'i don gyi rjes su 'gro ba dpag tu med pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang  de'i ye shes gang yin pa dang  mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mos pa  dang  ye shes sgrib pa med pa dang  skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang  dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang  rnam pa thams cad yongs su dag pa bzhi dang  stobs bcu dang  mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang  bsrung ba  med pa gsum dang  snying rje chen po dang  bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang  bag chags yang dag par bcom pa dang  rnam pa thams cad dang  mchog gi ye shes so // /
column28: 0.025#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#977936#977936#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12208;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12209# chos shes par nus pa'i phyir chos zhes bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar dag go // / +rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rang gi mtshan nyid ni / /
column29: 0.027#TD4035E.TXT.r#260392#260393#TD4035E.TXT.r_2509;TD4035E.TXT.r_2510# thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa zhig yod de / / +de la ba gam brgya rtsa gcig yod do // /
column30: 0.027#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#2956770#2956770#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_5676;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_5677# rnam shes mtshams sbyor phung po yin // / +ma'i mngal  du nying mtshams sbyor ba'i skad cig ma la phung po lnga ni rnam par shes pa yin no // /
column31: 0.027#TD4035E.TXT.r#287719#287719#TD4035E.TXT.r_5076# de la snying rje'i bsam pas kyang las dge ba tshe 'di la myong bar 'gyur te / /
column32: 0.027#TD4064E.TXT.r#765057#765057#TD4064E.TXT.r_555# de med pas thog mar sems mnyam pa nyid do // /
column33: 0.028#TD4036E.TXT.r#96172#96172#TD4036E.TXT.r_7882# rgyu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de len pa'i tshul gyis rags shing brtag par sla ba'i sems rtse gcig pa nyid dang  sems dang lus shin tu sbyangs pa 'dren par byed de / /
column34: 0.028#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#2908116#2908116#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_1685;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_1686# bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re / / +bde ba la sogs pa lnga po dag ni kun nas nyon mongs pa la dbang byed de / /
column35: 0.029#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2550996#2550997#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_1111# logs shig tu gyur pa ni 'dus pa la gnas pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste de 'dra pa de ni med kyi / /

column5: 0.0#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3100177#3100183#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1221# ji lta ji ltar thos pa dang  ji ltar mthong ba dang  rtogs pa'i chos rnams rgyas par kha ton du byed pa de lta  de ltar chos rnams la don so so yang dag par rig par 'gyur ro // /
column6: 1.192#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3100206#3100207#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1222# chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang  don so so yang dag par rig pa de la chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang don so so yang dag par rig pa'i dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ro // /
column7: 0.025#TD4026E.TXT.r#541013#541013#TD4026E.TXT.r_3956# sdug bsngal dang ni don bya dang / /
column8: 0.028#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3100240#3100240#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1223;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1224# dga' ba da la rab tu dga'  ba skye bar 'gyur ba nas 'dod chags dang bral ba dang grol ba'i bar du ste / / +'di ni rnam par grol ba'i skye mched gnyis pa'o // /

column3: sa ni dang po yin par 'dod // /

column5: 0.0#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3100196#3100198#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1221;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1222# ji lta ji ltar thos pa dang  ji ltar mthong ba dang  rtogs pa'i chos rnams rgyas par kha ton du byed pa de lta  de ltar chos rnams la don so so yang dag par rig par 'gyur ro // / +chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang  don so so yang dag par rig pa de la chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang don so so yang dag par rig pa'i dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ro // /

column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#541526#541533#TD4026E.TXT.r_4009;TD4026E.TXT.r_4010# 'ching ba mi bzad yun yang ring por bcings // /

column3: sems can rnams la bdag med dang / /

column5: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#499450#499452#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7623;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7624# le'u gzhan bdun po dag ni 'phags pa'i bstan pa yang dag par bshad pa'i phyogs zhes bya'o // / +gsum pa bka' bzhin du yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyogs ni le'u bzhi po dag gi mjug tu bstan pa dag yin te / /

column3: lan la mi re 'di sems snyoms // /

column5: 0.022#TD4026E.TXT.r#541454#541459#TD4026E.TXT.r_4001;TD4026E.TXT.r_4002# bdag med sdug bsngal rgyas pa tsam shes te // / +don med rang bzhin bdag lta rnams sbangs  nas ; / /

column5: 0.016#TD4026E.TXT.r#540790#540790#TD4026E.TXT.r_3929# de ni 'di'i 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog gi gnas skabs yin no // /
column6: 0.016#TD4047E.TXT.r#2161730#2161732#TD4047E.TXT.r_10025# sbyin pa la khyad du gsod pa'i nyes pa spangs pa'i phyir gus pas byed de zhes bya ba'o // /
column7: 0.018#TD4035E.TXT.r#315475#315476#TD4035E.TXT.r_7778;TD4035E.TXT.r_7779# rtag    pa nas bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa'i bar dag gis chos thams cad stong par so sor rtog pa'o // / +de'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid ni 'di lta ste / /
column8: 0.023#TD4064E.TXT.r#760065#760065#TD4064E.TXT.r_120# shes pa dang brjod pa ma gtogs par  don gyi dngos kyi rang gi ngo bo yongs su gcod pa'i thabs gzhan med pas de'i phyir gtso bo'i rang gi ngo bo'i yul la shes pa dang brjod pa med pas don gyi dngos po med par khong du chud par bya'o // /
column9: 0.023#TD4026E.TXT.r#547923#547923#TD4026E.TXT.r_4634;TD4026E.TXT.r_4635# tshul khrims de nyid kyis kyang skye bo thams cad byang chub gsum la bkod // / +tshul khrims ye shes kyis yongs zin pas 'jig     // /
column10: 0.023#TD4064E.TXT.r#758444#758445#TD4064E.TXT.r_4;TD4064E.TXT.r_5# sum cu pa'i bshad pa / / +bam po dang po / /
column11: 0.025#TD4041E.TXT.r#2312123#2312123#TD4041E.TXT.r_1009# myong zin pa'i dngos po la 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni yid du 'thad pa'o // /
column12: 0.026#TD4047E.TXT.r#2135810#2135810#TD4047E.TXT.r_7997# bstan pa'i mjug thogs su dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob pa dang  kha cig ni mngon par ma thob pa dang  kha cig ni dge ba'i chos mang po las nyams te gnas yongs su btang ba ni sems tha dad pa rnams so // /
column13: 0.026#TD4091E.TXT.r#1265815#1265815#TD4091E.TXT.r_1712# stobs chung ba'i phyir sngar skye ba dang  phyis skye ba ni med kyi lhan cig skye ba nyid de / /
column14: 0.027#TD4069E.TXT.r#1117523#1117523#TD4069E.TXT.r_167;TD4069E.TXT.r_168# 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal las dgongs pa yin no zhes bya ba ni zag pa dang bcas pa thams cad ni 'du byed kyi sdug  bsngal gyis khyab pa de lta bu'i phyir ro // / +dgongs pas mtshon pa ni dgongs pa'i mtshan nyid do // /
column15: 0.028#TD4037E.TXT.r#2438744#2438744#TD4037E.TXT.r_4263# 'di la byang chub sems dpas ni sems can gang dag phun sum tshogs pa chen po la gnas pa  de dag kyang sdug bsngal gsum po 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal dang  'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal dang  sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dang 'brel par mthong na rgud pa la gnas pa rnams lta ci smos te / /
column16: 0.028#TD4096E.TXT.r#2821254#2821254#TD4096E.TXT.r_882# yan lag gsum bor nas bsam gtan gsum pa rnam par gzhag ste de na dga' ba yang med pas so // /
column17: 0.029#TD4026E.TXT.r#547181#547181#TD4026E.TXT.r_4562# 'jig rten pa dang  'jig rten  las 'das pa dman pa dang  'jig rten las 'das pa chen po'i rab tu rnam par 'byed pa des ni kun nas nyon mongs pa las shin tu rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro // /

column3: yang dag ma yin kun rtog par // /

column5: 0.016#TD4026E.TXT.r#541982#541982#TD4026E.TXT.r_4059# 'di dag gis ni sgom pa'i lam bstan te / /
column6: 0.019#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1957076#1957077#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_4171;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_4172# 'jig rten pa rnams ni sa bcu gcig na yod do // / +'jig rten las 'das pa rnams ni gang na lam yod pa na yod do // /
column7: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1689990#1689990#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4874;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4875# zhe sdang can la ni byams pa bstan pas 'dul / / +gti mug can la ni rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba bstan pas  'dul ba thugs su chud pa'i phyir ro // /
column8: 0.026#TD4048E.TXT.r#3078504#3078504#TD4048E.TXT.r_1512;TD4048E.TXT.r_1513# mi 'byed pa kun nas nyon mongs pa med par  dka' ba spyod pa ni / / +'khor ba yongs su mi gtong yang / /
column9: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#950795#950795#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10168# 'gro ba drug gi lus dang  skye ba rnam pa bzhi'i lus so zhes zer te / /
column10: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1690526#1690526#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4916;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4917# da ni gnas yongs su gyur pa'i don bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa drug rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // / +de la gnas zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi phung po nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du phung po lnga la bya ste / /
column11: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#953515#953515#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10390# kha cig ni rang gi ngo bor gzung ba la len pa zhes bya'o zhes ston te / /

column3: des na de tshe mthong ba'i lam // / +thob pa zhes ni nges par brjod // /

column5: 0.024#TD4086E.TXT.r#2378612#2378612#TD4086E.TXT.r_4135# lcags kyi tho bas brdung zhing rab tu brdung la kun tu rab tu brdung ste / /
column6: 0.027#TD4037E.TXT.r#2397752#2397752#TD4037E.TXT.r_1143;TD4037E.TXT.r_1144# bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang srid pa 'pho ba'i mdo las / / +don 'di nyid tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis 'di skad du / /

column3: rang bzhin stong pa nyid shes pas // / +stong pa shes  pa zhes brjod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#541646#541659#TD4026E.TXT.r_4022;TD4026E.TXT.r_4023# 'jig tshogs la lta ba nyon mongs pa can gang yin pa'o // / +bdag nyid chen po'i lta ba don chen po ni sems can thams cad la bdag dang mnyam pa'i sems  rnyed pa'i phyir / /

column5: 0.0#TD4086E.TXT.r#2378640#2378640#TD4086E.TXT.r_4137# gzhan yang sems can dmyal ba chen po tsha bar sems can gang skyes pa dang  kun tu skyes pa nas 'thon par 'gyur ba'i  bar du snga ma bzhin te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3099962#3099963#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1202;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1203# lnga gang zhe na / / +dge slong dag 'di la ston pa'am tshangs  par spyod pa mkhas pa bla ma'i gnas lta bu gzhan gang yang rung ba chos ston par byed de // /

column3: yang dag zad pa yin zhes bya // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#541668#541682#TD4026E.TXT.r_4024;TD4026E.TXT.r_4025;TD4026E.TXT.r_4026# bdag tu lta ba gang yin pa ste / / +de ni don thams cad byed pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir don chen po yin no // /
column5: 0.0#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3110493#3110496#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2004;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2005# 'di lta ste 'di yod pas skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang  sdug bsngal ba dang  yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa rnams 'byung zhing / / +de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'di 'ba' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te / /
column6: 0.029#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3110544#3110544#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2008# dge slong dag 'jig rten ni rgyu dang bcas rkyen dang bcas  pa las rab tu 'gag par 'gyur ro // /

column3: smon pa med par gyur pa'i de // / +yang dag ma yin kun rtog go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#541682#541691#TD4026E.TXT.r_4025;TD4026E.TXT.r_4026;TD4026E.TXT.r_4027# de ni don thams cad byed pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir don chen po yin no // / +don med pa'i rang bzhin gyis bdag tu lta ba med par bdag tu lta ba ni don chen po gang yin pa'o // /
column5: 0.010#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3110544#3110544#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2008# dge slong dag 'jig rten ni rgyu dang bcas rkyen dang bcas  pa las rab tu 'gag par 'gyur ro // /

column3: rgyal sras byang chub phyogs mthun pa // / +rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad ni // /

column3: rtag tu mthong ba'i lam  de dang / / +lhan cig tu ni thob par 'dod // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#541707#541714#TD4026E.TXT.r_4028;TD4026E.TXT.r_4029# can thams cad kyi rgyud las skyes pas shin tu sdug bsngal bar gyur pa'o // / +grol ba mchog ni theg pa bla na med pas sems can mthong ba'i lam gyis spang bar bya ba rnams las grol la / /

column3: gang zhig blo yis 'gro ba 'dus byas tsam // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#541715#541725#TD4026E.TXT.r_4029;TD4026E.TXT.r_4030# grol ba mchog ni theg pa bla na med pas sems can mthong ba'i lam gyis spang bar bya ba rnams las grol la / /

column3: bdag med sdug bsngal rgyas pa tsam shes te // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#541724#541733#TD4026E.TXT.r_4029;TD4026E.TXT.r_4030# grol ba mchog ni theg pa bla na med pas sems can mthong ba'i lam gyis spang bar bya ba rnams las grol la / / +sems can thams cad kyi rgyud las byung ba'i 'ching ba mi zad  pa yun ring pos kyang bcings pa'o // /

column3: don med rang bzhin bdag lta rnam spangs nas // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#541734#541742#TD4026E.TXT.r_4030;TD4026E.TXT.r_4031# sems can thams cad kyi rgyud las byung ba'i 'ching ba mi zad  pa yun ring pos kyang bcings pa'o // /

column3: bdag nyid che lta don chen rnyed pa gang // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#541743#541751#TD4026E.TXT.r_4031;TD4026E.TXT.r_4032# sems can gyi khams nam mkha' bzhin du mtha' yas pa'i phyir / / +sdug bsngal gyi mthar thug pa ma mthong yang sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal mthar bya ba'i phyir rab tu yang sbyor la / /

column3: 'di ni bdag lta med par  bdag tu lta // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#541752#541767#TD4026E.TXT.r_4032;TD4026E.TXT.r_4033# sdug bsngal gyi mthar thug pa ma mthong yang sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal mthar bya ba'i phyir rab tu yang sbyor la / /

column3: sdug bsngal med par shin tu sdug bsngal 'gyur // / +rang la phan byas bdag la ji lta bar // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#541768#541776#TD4026E.TXT.r_4033;TD4026E.TXT.r_4034# sems can tshad med pa'i don byed pa nyid  do ; / /

column3: don kun byed la lan kyang re ba med // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#541777#541785#TD4026E.TXT.r_4034;TD4026E.TXT.r_4035# byang chub sems dpa' de las bzlog pa yin no // / +de ni 'jig rten gnas pa ji srid par sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal bsdoms pa bkur bar nus so // /
column5: 0.026#TD4084E.TXT.r#2316332#2316332#TD4084E.TXT.r_86;TD4084E.TXT.r_87# zhe sdang gis ni dmyal bar 'gro // / +gti mug gis ni dud 'gror skye // /

column3: gang zhig grol ba mchog gis sems grol la // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#541786#541797#TD4026E.TXT.r_4035;TD4026E.TXT.r_4036# de ni 'jig rten gnas pa ji srid par sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal bsdoms pa bkur bar nus so // /

column3: 'ching ba mi zad yun yang ring por bcings // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#541796#541806#TD4026E.TXT.r_4036;TD4026E.TXT.r_4037# byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la dga' ba gang yin pa dang / /

column3: sdug bsngal  mthar thug pa ni ma mthong yang // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#541805#541814#TD4026E.TXT.r_4037# phan pa dang bde bar 'dod pa  gang yin pa dang  de'i don du sbyor ba gang yin pa dang  der sbyor ba la mi skyo ba gang yin pa de thams cad ni 'jig rten na shin tu ngo mtshar yang che la / /
column5: 0.016#TD4050E.TXT.r#2035127#2035131#TD4050E.TXT.r_3269;TD4050E.TXT.r_3270# 'jig rten las 'das pa rnam par mi rtog pa dang  de'i bla ma rjes las thob pa dang  de dag  gnyi ga'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las yang dag par byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni rgyu yin te / /
column6: 0.017#TD4013E.TXT.r#1111520#1111522#TD4013E.TXT.r_1193# 'di skad du ji ltar so so'i skye bo'i skye ba gcig  nas gcig tu brgyud pa rnams su las 'byung ba mtha' thug pa med pa de bzhin du bdag byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa'i smon lam 'byung ba yang mthar thug par ma gyur cig ces bya ba bshad pa yin no // /
column7: 0.017#TD4067E.TXT.r#1990540#1990541#TD4067E.TXT.r_1486;TD4067E.TXT.r_1487# lung gi bcom ldan 'das kyis chos mngon pa'i mdo las tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa / /
column8: 0.018#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1691741#1691744#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5000;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5001# kun la 'jug ces bya ba la / / +dus kun du 'jug bas na kun 'jug ste / /
column9: 0.018#TD4091E.TXT.r#1251470#1251473#TD4091E.TXT.r_348;TD4091E.TXT.r_349# rtsod pa'i rtsa ba dag ni gnyis te / / +'dod pa la lhag par zhen pa'o // /
column10: 0.019#TD4024E.TXT.r#807613#807613#TD4024E.TXT.r_490;TD4024E.TXT.r_491# ta la dang ni aa mra'i 'bras sbubs gseb nas shing skye ji ltar bar // / +sems can nyon mongs 'bras lpags nang chud rjod / /
column11: 0.019#TD4087E.TXT.r#2871158#2871158#TD4087E.TXT.r_4049# de 'dir skyes nas dgon pa'i gnas rnams su rgyu ba mi de dag gi glo nas  'dzin cing / /
column12: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#1244459#1244460#TD4083E.TXT.r_1051;TD4083E.TXT.r_1052# le lo ni lus dang sems kyi snyom pa'o // / +stsogs pa'i sgras ni snyom las dang gnyid kyi  bde ba dang  nyal ba'i bde ba dang  glos 'bebs pa'i bde ba rnams bsdu ste / /
column13: 0.022#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2620732#2620733#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_5571# stobs chung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni de mngon par 'du bya ba med par ldan pas stobs chung ba nyid yin no // /
column14: 0.022#TD4037E.TXT.r#2487968#2487968#TD4037E.TXT.r_7853# gzhan la rnam par mi 'tshe ba dang  ma byin par    len pa spangs pa dang  bla ma rnams la gus par smra ba dang  phyag 'tshal ba dang  mngon du ldang ba dang  thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud pa'i las byas pas gzhan dag gi yid mgu bar byas pa dang  dga' ba'i longs spyod nyams par ma byas pa dang  nga rgyal nges par bcom pas ni skyes bu  chen po'i mtshan sor mo ring ba brnyes so // /
column15: 0.022#TD4035E.TXT.r#266684#266688#TD4035E.TXT.r_3112;TD4035E.TXT.r_3113# las ni ci zhig byed cing 'jug ce na / / +de la sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi rtog pa dang dpyod pa rnams ni gcig tu nges par zhum pa'i rnam pa dang  mi sdug pa'i yul gyi 'dus te reg    pa dang  sdug bsngal gyis bskyod pa dang  yid mi bde ba dang ldan pa dang  sdug bsngal las thar bar 'dod pa dang  sems kun nas 'khrugs pa'i las byed cing 'jug go // /
column16: 0.023#TD4009E.TXT.r#587742#587744#TD4009E.TXT.r_236;TD4009E.TXT.r_237# de las gzhan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams ni shes rab la gnas so // / +shes rab la log par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub dang  byang chub thob par byed pa'i chos rnams la log par zhugs pa yin no // /
column17: 0.023#TD4086E.TXT.r#2370789#2370789#TD4086E.TXT.r_3535# thang las skyes  pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang  skad yid du 'ong ba dang  skad mnyen pa dang  'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can dag skad snyan pa 'byin to // /
column18: 0.023#TD4071E.TXT.r#748085#748088#TD4071E.TXT.r_1892;TD4071E.TXT.r_1893# de ltar gzhan gyi phyogs kyang rgya cher bsal te / /
column19: 0.025#TD4069E.TXT.r#1155287#1155287#TD4069E.TXT.r_2963;TD4069E.TXT.r_2964# rab tu byung ba dang  rtogs pa brgyud pa gnyis kyis so // / +skye bo mang po la phan pa ni skye bo mang po la brten pas so // /
column20: 0.025#TD4037E.TXT.r#2482506#2482507#TD4037E.TXT.r_7439# gnas pa mchog la ni nyon mongs pa dang  bag chags dang  bag la nyal gyi sgrib pa thams cad spong bar rig par bya ste / /
column21: 0.027#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3094351#3094352#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_729# bdag da ltar da ltar byung ba'i gzugs kyis bcom ste 'di lta ste  bdag da ltar da ltar byung ba'i gzugs kyis bcom pa de bzhin du 'das pa'i dus kyi gzugs kyis bdag bcom mo // /
column22: 0.028#TD4069E.TXT.r#1144352#1144352#TD4069E.TXT.r_2124# yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column23: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#862230#862230#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3433;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3434# 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa'i chos thams cad rnam par gzhag pa de rtog ge'i spyod yul las  shin tu 'das pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +de dag kyang mdor bsdu na bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis rnam par gzhag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas so so'i skye bo rnams kyis shes pa ma yin no zhes bstan par 'gyur ro // /
column24: 0.029#TD4035E.TXT.r#355593#355593#TD4035E.TXT.r_11504;TD4035E.TXT.r_11505# bden pa mngon par rtogs par bya // / +kun nas 'dod chags bral bar bya // /

column8: 0.027#TD4064E.TXT.r#760065#760065#TD4064E.TXT.r_120# shes pa dang brjod pa ma gtogs par  don gyi dngos kyi rang gi ngo bo yongs su gcod pa'i thabs gzhan med pas de'i phyir gtso bo'i rang gi ngo bo'i yul la shes pa dang brjod pa med pas don gyi dngos po med par khong du chud par bya'o // /
column9: 0.027#TD4037E.TXT.r#2438744#2438744#TD4037E.TXT.r_4263# 'di la byang chub sems dpas ni sems can gang dag phun sum tshogs pa chen po la gnas pa  de dag kyang sdug bsngal gsum po 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal dang  'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal dang  sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dang 'brel par mthong na rgud pa la gnas pa rnams lta ci smos te / /
column10: 0.028#TD4026E.TXT.r#506092#506092#TD4026E.TXT.r_577# byang chub den po'i rgyu mtshan yin pa'i phyir dang  ye shes chen po'i rgyu mtshan yin pa'i phyir dang  'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyu mtshan yin pa'i phyir te / /

column7: 1.192#TD4086E.TXT.r#2373738#2373738#TD4086E.TXT.r_3780# sems can de dag sems can gcig gis gcig mthong na shas cher sdang ba'i sems dang  gsad pa'i sems nye bar gnas par 'gyur te / /

column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#542061#542065#TD4026E.TXT.r_4064;TD4026E.TXT.r_4063# de'i 'og tu gnas gzhan du gyur pa'i mthar phyin pa dang  gang la gnas nas 'khor ba ji srid par mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang   yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yang dag par ston pa la sogs pas sems can rnams la phan pa rab tu sgrub par byed pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go 'phang bla na med pa nyon mongs pa dang  shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad kyi dri ma med pa 'thob po // /
column6: 0.0#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3110510#3110512#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2006# dge slong 'di ltar 'jig rten ni rgyu dang bcas shing rkyen dang bcas pa las rab tu byung ste / /
column7: 1.192#TD4026E.TXT.r#541157#541163#TD4026E.TXT.r_3969;TD4026E.TXT.r_3970# gnyis su med pa'i don gyis mthong // / +des ni khams gsum pa'i  'dus byas rnams yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun du rtog pa tsam du mthong ste / /
column8: 0.011#TD4036E.TXT.r#43241#43243#TD4036E.TXT.r_3574;TD4036E.TXT.r_3575# gti mug gi kun nas dkris pa de dang yun ring du rjes su 'brel bar 'gyur ba dang  de rmongs par 'gyur ba'i chos  rnams kyis zil gyis non par 'gyur zhing / /
column9: 0.012#TD4026E.TXT.r#541378#541384#TD4026E.TXT.r_3994;TD4026E.TXT.r_3995# mtshan ma med pa'i gzhi ni rnam par rtog pa rnams yang dag par zad pa yin la / / +smon pa med pa'i gzhi dmigs pa de ni    yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pa dmigs pa yin par shes par bya'o // /
column10: 0.012#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3110477#3110483#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2004# 'di lta ste 'di yod pas skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang  sdug bsngal ba dang  yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa rnams 'byung zhing / /
column11: 0.015#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1949980#1949981#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_3554;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_3555# rjes 'brang bcas na phung po lnga // / +'khor dang bcas na ni phung po lnga'i rang bzhin yin par rig par bya'o // /

column13: 0.021#TD4095E.TXT.r#149452#149453#TD4095E.TXT.r_3519# mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i sems ni de kun nas slong bar byed pa dpyod pa dang rtog pa dag gi gzhir gyur pa'i phyir rnam par rig byed rab tu 'jug par byed pa yin gyi sems kha phyir bltas pa'i phyir rjes su 'jug par byed pa ni ma yin no // /
column14: 0.023#TD4086E.TXT.r#2369542#2369542#TD4086E.TXT.r_3409;TD4086E.TXT.r_3410# 'jig rten gzhag pa las tshigs bcu gnyis pa'o //// / +'jig rten gzhag pa / /
column15: 0.023#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1687615#1687619#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4693;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4694# chos rin po che rnams 'byung ba'i rgyu dang rkyen dang gzhi byed pas  na sangs rgyas ni rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba'i don to // / +dge ba'i lo rtog rgyu yi phyir // /
column16: 0.027#TD4026E.TXT.r#534745#534746#TD4026E.TXT.r_3295;TD4026E.TXT.r_3296# gsal ba ni  tshig dang yi ge rab tu grags pa'i phyir ro // / +snyan cing 'jebs pa ni mu stegs can blo gros ngan pa thams cad kyi lta ba 'joms pa'i stobs kyi yon tan dang ldan pa'i phyir ro // /
column17: 0.028#TD4026E.TXT.r#540623#540624#TD4026E.TXT.r_3916;TD4026E.TXT.r_3917# 'di'i yid  kyi brjod pa kho na rang gi mtshan nyid dang  spyi'i mtshan nyid du snang bar mthong ba na / / +de ni 'di'i dro bar gyur pa'i gnas skabs yin te / /
column18: 0.029#TD4035E.TXT.r#234937#234937#TD4035E.TXT.r_227# dang  ma chags pa dang  zhe sdang med pa dang  gti mug med pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  shin tu sbyangs pa dang  bag yod pa dang  btang snyoms dang  rnam par mi 'tshe ba dang  'dod chags dang  khong khro ba dang  ma rig pa dang  nga rgyal dang  lta  ba dang  the tshom dang  khro ba dang  khon du 'dzin pa dang  'chab pa dang  'tshig pa dang  phrag dog dang  ser sna dang  sgyu dang  gyo dang  rgyags pa dang  rnam par 'tshe ba dang  ngo tsha med pa dang  khrel med pa dang  rmugs pa dang  rgod pa dang  ma dad pa dang  le lo dang   bag med pa dang  brjed ngas pa dang  rnam par gyeng ba dang  shes bzhin ma yin pa dang  'gyod pa dang  gnyid dang  rtog pa dang  dpyod pa dang  de lta bu dang mthun pa sems las byung ba'i chos lhan cig 'byung zhing mtshungs par ldan pa rnams kyi grogs zhes bya ste / /
column19: 0.029#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3110001#3110001#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1974;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1975# yang nyan thos kyi rnam par bshad pa las sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa bcu gsum pa'i mdo las tshe dang ldan pa bde byed kyi ji skad bstan  pa bzhin te / / +gzhan yang mdo de dang de las 'don pa lta bu'o // /
column20: 0.029#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#2999441#2999441#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_9140# srog gcod pa la sogs pa bzhin du 'phags pa rnams tshe 'phos kyang mi spyod pa'i phyir dang  lus kyi nyes par spyod pa zhes kyang 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes zer ro // /

column6: 5.960#TD4026E.TXT.r#541470#541474#TD4026E.TXT.r_4003;TD4026E.TXT.r_4004# bdag nyid che lta don chen rnyed pa gang // /
column7: 0.012#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1690526#1690526#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4916;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4917# da ni gnas yongs su gyur pa'i don bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa drug rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // / +de la gnas zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi phung po nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du phung po lnga la bya ste / /
column8: 0.015#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#950795#950796#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10168# 'gro ba drug gi lus dang  skye ba rnam pa bzhi'i lus so zhes zer te / /

column11: 0.016#TD4026E.TXT.r#541249#541249#TD4026E.TXT.r_3978;TD4026E.TXT.r_3979# med pa'i stong pa nyid shes  shing ; / / +de bzhin yod pa'i stong nyid dang / /
column12: 0.016#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3110418#3110418#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1999# dge slong dag  de la 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shin tu legs par tshul bzhin dpyod par byed do // /
column13: 0.017#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3110438#3110443#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2001# 'di skyes pa'i phyir 'di skye ste 'di lta ste 'di yod pas rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug 'byung la / /
column14: 0.018#TD4083E.TXT.r#1247387#1247387#TD4083E.TXT.r_1228# nyon mongs pa drag pos kun nas dkris pa la sogs pa dag gis slar yang 'jug pa dag gis 'das pa las ni nyes pa med do zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don to // /
column15: 0.019#TD4036E.TXT.r#63280#63280#TD4036E.TXT.r_5275;TD4036E.TXT.r_5276# lus ni rnam pa sum cu rtsa lnga yod de / / +'di lta ste / /
column16: 0.019#TD4044E.TXT.r#695360#695361#TD4044E.TXT.r_192;TD4044E.TXT.r_193# gnod pa byed pa la mi mjed pa'i bzod ba'i rtags ni 'dir rtags zhes bstan to // / +gnod pa byed pa la mi bzod pa ni shin tu smad pa'i phyir  ro ; / /
column17: 0.021#TD4047E.TXT.r#2108083#2108083#TD4047E.TXT.r_5805;TD4047E.TXT.r_5806# sa phyi ma rnams su 'phel bar 'gyur bas sa dang po la stobs kyi khyad par 'phel ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro // / +bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang  chub tu byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsoms rtsom pa'i sgrub pa gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab rnam pa gnyis pa bstan pa'i phyir bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyis bsdus pas tshogs kyi lam ma sbyangs par de ltar gzhan gyis byas pas de thob bar mi byed do // /
column18: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#823565#823565#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_452# 'di lta ste chos kyi sku ni nang gi mngon par rtogs pa'i spyod yul gyi phyir ro // /
column19: 0.021#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1544172#1544173#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_13355;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_13356# rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni rgyu dang 'dra ba yin te / / +de'i phyir  rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni skal ba mnyam pa dang kun du 'gro ba'i rgyu dag gi yin par rnam par gzhag go // /
column20: 0.022#TD4071E.TXT.r#742945#742945#TD4071E.TXT.r_1411# de zhes bya ba ni rnam par smin pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo'i rnam par shes pa bshad ma thag pa de lta bu de zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column21: 0.022#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#2908116#2908116#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_1685;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_1686# bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re / / +bde ba la sogs pa lnga po dag ni kun nas nyon mongs pa la dbang byed de / /

column20: 0.027#TD4037E.TXT.r#2405615#2405615#TD4037E.TXT.r_1706;TD4037E.TXT.r_1707# myos pa dang  sems 'khrugs pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong na rang gi sems thob par 'gyur ba dang  bud med mngal mi mthun par gnas pa rnams mngal mthun par gnas par 'gyur ba dang  long ba rnams mig thob par 'gyur ba dang  'on pa rnams rna bas  thos par 'gyur ba dang  chags pa rnams 'dod chags kyi kun nas dkris pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang  zhe sdang ba rnams zhe sdang gi kun nas dkris pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang  rmongs pa rnams gti mug gi kun nas dkris pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang  de lta bu dang mthun pa rnams ni  mthong bas phan 'dogs par mdzad pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i mthu yin par rig par bya'o // / +de la 'phags pa'i spyod pa dang  gnas pas bsdus pa lhan cig skyes pa'i mthu ni 'di lta ste / /

column8: 0.016#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3110629#3110633#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2016# 'di med pas skye ba dang  rga ba dang  na ba dang  'chi ba dang  mya ngan dang  smre sngags 'don pa dang  sdug bsngal ba dang  yid mi bde ba dang  'khrug pa rnams  'gag par 'gyur te / /
column9: 0.016#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3113710#3113713#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2278# pha dang ma'i khu ba byung zhing pha dang ma chags par gyur pa dang  de'i dus na pha dang ma rlung gis bzung bar ma gyur pa dang  bad kan gyis ma bzung ba dang  khrag gis ma bzung ba dang  shas gang ba ma yin pa dang  rmen can  lta bu ma yin pa dang  nas kyi bar lta bu ma yin pa dang  grog mo'i rked pa lta bu ma yin pa dang  rnga mo'i gdong pa dang  khyi'i gdong pa dang  shing rta'i gdong pa dang  ka ba lta bu dang  'dab ma lta bu dang  nang du rtse mo lta bu skyes pa ma yin pa dang  steng du zab pa  dang ; /

column7: 0.023#TD4086E.TXT.r#2360976#2360976#TD4086E.TXT.r_2776# kye hu sa'i bcud kye hud sa'i bcud ces kyang 'dzer te / /
column8: 0.023#TD4086E.TXT.r#2371506#2371506#TD4086E.TXT.r_3600# ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi shar phyogs kyi phyi rol gyi rgya mtsho chen po na shar gyi lus 'phags zhes bya ba'i gling ni rgya che la phyi rol zla gam ltar grub pa yod do // /

column19: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#1246016#1246016#TD4083E.TXT.r_1148;TD4083E.TXT.r_1149# na ste mi nus pa dang gzhan la sngar khas blangs zin pa dang  rgyun mi 'chad par dge ba'i phyogs la brtson pa dang  yid rtul po zhig ste mi mkhas pa yin pa dang  thabs des 'dul bar 'dod pa dang  dge 'dun gyi nang  khrims srung bar 'dod pa dang  gzhan mang po dag gis sems srung bar 'dod pa dang ma bcol ba dang  bcol bar gyur kyang gzhan zhig la yang bcol ba dang  gnod pa dang ldan pa'am / / +chos dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i bya ba yin pa dang  pha rol po rang nyid byed nus pa dang   rten yod pa nyid yin na nyes pa med do // /

column21: 0.029#TD4087E.TXT.r#2872185#2872185#TD4087E.TXT.r_4137# sems can gang dag skem pa dang  ngan pa la dga' ba dang  mdog ngan pa dang  'jigs pa dang  bag tsha ba dang  sngang sdang skyen pa dang  'bros pa dang  lus mdog tshig pa  ltar 'dug pa dang  rmi lam na me dang  ral gri dang  mdung thung dang  mda' bo che dang  mtshon nas 'bras lta bu dang  mde'u thung dang  lcags zangs dang  khar zangs kyi nang du bsregs pa rmi ba de dag ni nye zhing dubs nye bar sems can dmyal ba dag nas shi 'phos pa yin te / /
column22: 0.029#TD4068E.TXT.r#1048204#1048204#TD4068E.TXT.r_1482;TD4068E.TXT.r_1483# mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyi skabs su ni gdeng cung zad yod pa la brten nas / / +bdag gis kun thob po snyam du nga rgyal byed kyi / /
column23: 0.029#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#3000634#3000634#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_9230# de ltar na 'o na ni sngon gyi sems can ni sangs rgyas su gyur nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams las sangs rgyas phyi ma rnams kyis so sor thar ba'i sdom pa ma thob pa'i phyir ji ltar tshul khrims nyung bar mi 'gyur zhe na / /

column25: 0.029#TD4069E.TXT.r#1181471#1181471#TD4069E.TXT.r_4952;TD4069E.TXT.r_4953# de las nges par 'byung ba'i thabs las brtsams nas rig par bya ba ni nges par 'byung ba dang  rab tu dben pa dang  phan yon dang  rnam par byang ba'i phyogs dang  mthun pa'i chos rnams rgya cher  yang dag par rig pa ston par mdzad pa zhes bya ba'i tshig 'dis so // / +de gnyis kyis kyang zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni 'dod pa rnams la ro myang ba dang  de'i nyes dmigs bstan pa 'di gnyis kyis ni 'di ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa dang  rnam par byang bar byed do // /

column6: 5.960#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3110751#3110752#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2020;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2021# de ci'i phyir zhe na / / +dge slong dag 'di ltar 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'jig rten kun 'byung ba dang 'jig rten 'gog pa dang bcas pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes rab kyis rab tu mthong ba dang  rab tu rig pa  dang ; /

column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#543771#543782#TD4026E.TXT.r_4221;TD4026E.TXT.r_4222;TD4026E.TXT.r_4223# mtshan nyid  rnam par dbye ba'i tshigs su bcad pa drug ste / / +sbyin pa mi mthun phyogs nyams dang / /

column3: bsam gtan de nyid kyis kyang skye bo thams cad byang chub gsum la bkod // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#543783#543801#TD4026E.TXT.r_4222;TD4026E.TXT.r_4223;TD4026E.TXT.r_4224;TD4026E.TXT.r_4225# sbyin pa mi mthun phyogs nyams dang / / +rnam par mi rtog ye shes ldan // /

column3: bsam gtan ye  shes kyis yongs zin pas 'jig rten dag na mi zad bzhag / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#543802#543810#TD4026E.TXT.r_4225;TD4026E.TXT.r_4226# sems can rnam smin byed rnam gsum // / +byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i mtshan nyid ni rnam pa bzhi ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#544030#544033#TD4026E.TXT.r_4250;TD4026E.TXT.r_4251# sbyin pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa bzhi ji lta bar tshul khrims la sogs pa 'di dag gis yang de dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o // /
column6: 2.384#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3110766#3110774#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2021# dge slong dag 'di ltar 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'jig rten kun 'byung ba dang 'jig rten 'gog pa dang bcas pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes rab kyis rab tu mthong ba dang  rab tu rig pa  dang ; /
column7: 0.012#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#458447#458451#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4574;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4575# de la 'dod pa la longs spyod pa zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa bkod pa chen po'i mdo nas rtsal bstan pa'i le'u las ji skad  du ; / +de nas sh'akya rnams kyis rgyal po la rgyal bu ni cher skyes te mtshan mkhan dag gis gal te rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur na ni gdon mi za bar sangs rgyas su 'grub par 'gyur ro // /
column8: 0.012#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#458495#458499#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4576# gal te khyim na gnas na ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pas btsun mo  btsal to mngon par zhen par bgyis nas rgyu dang rkyen des rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes gsol to // /
column9: 0.012#TD4026E.TXT.r#544163#544167#TD4026E.TXT.r_4262;TD4026E.TXT.r_4263# rgyu gsum gyis sbyin pa la sogs pa de dag rim par bstan te / / +snga ma la brten nas phyi ma skye ba'i  phyir ni longs spyod la mi lta ba'i tshul khrims yang dag par len to // /
column10: 0.012#TD4086E.TXT.r#2333210#2333214#TD4086E.TXT.r_902# bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang  'di skad du dge slong dag zla ba phyed kyi tshes brgyad la ni rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gi zho shas 'tsho ba rnams ni ci mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na mar 'dzin pa dang  phar 'dzin pa dang  dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang  bram zer 'dzin pa dang  rigs kyi nang na rgan rabs la rim gro byed pa dang   don byed pa dang  bya ba'i rigs pa byed pa dang  bsod nams byed pa dang  tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par lta ba dang  sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa dang  gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang  tshul khrims yang dag par blangs  nas 'dug pa dag mang ngam zhes 'jig rten 'di thams cad du nyul lo // /
column11: 0.012#TD4086E.TXT.r#2333857#2333861#TD4086E.TXT.r_918# ji ste mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na mar 'dzin pa dang  phar 'dzin pa dang  dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang  bram zer 'dzin pa dang  rigs kyi  nang na rgan rabs la rim gro byed pa dang  don byed pa dang  bya ba'i rigs pa byed pa dang  bsod nams byed pa dang  tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma dang kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par lta ba dang  sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa dang  gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang  tshul  khrims yang dag par blangs nas 'dug pa dag mang na ni rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams lha'i mdun sa chos bzangs du 'dus shing 'khod pa'i nang du song nas 'di skad du grogs po dag 'di shes par gyis shig / /
column12: 0.012#TD4086E.TXT.r#2336669#2336673#TD4086E.TXT.r_1122;TD4086E.TXT.r_1123# mtshon cha rnam pa bzhi ral gri dang  mdung dang  'phang mdung dang  gzhu rnams blangs nas lha ma yin rnams  dang lhan cig tu gyul 'gyed do // /
column13: 0.014#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3113199#3113200#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2233# bud med gang bde zhing 'gro ba bzang por gyur pa dang  nye bar gdung ba dang  'khrug pa nyung ba dang  bza' ba dang btung ba gya nom pa ni yun ring por zla mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur te / /
column14: 0.014#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3113459#3113460#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2261;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2262# gyas phyogs yangs pa'am  gyon phyogs yangs pa'am / / +steng du yangs pa'am / /
column15: 0.014#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3113501#3113502#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2269;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2270# nyes pa dang bcas pa dang  bi sa ra ka zhes bya ba'i srog chags kyis zes par gyur pa sta / / +re zhig  de'i dus na mngal du 'jug par mi 'gyur ro // /
column16: 0.028#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3110784#3110784#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2022# rab tu yid la byed pa dang  rab tu bsten pa dang  yang dag par rab tu rig pa'i phyir ro zhes bka' stsal to // /

column3: rgyal ba'i sras rnams de nyid shes bya gang yin mtha' dag rnam kun shes // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#543809#543822#TD4026E.TXT.r_4226;TD4026E.TXT.r_4227# byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i mtshan nyid ni rnam pa bzhi ste / /

column3: mya ngan 'das la'ang blo yis chags rab mi skyed 'khor bar smos ci dgos // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#543823#543838#TD4026E.TXT.r_4227;TD4026E.TXT.r_4228# ser sna    spangs pa'i phyir mi mthun pa'i phyogs nyams pa dang  chos bdag med pa rtogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyir / / +rnam par mir tog pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa dang  gang ci 'dod pa de la de sbyin pa'i phyir // /

column3: ye shes de nyid kyis kyang skye bo thams cad  byang chub gsum la bkod // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#460158#460161#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4671;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4672# ma dad pa dag 'di skad du 'di sgyu byed pa yin te / / +shi ba'i ro la tsog pur 'dug pa ga la yod ces zer bas so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#543837#543852#TD4026E.TXT.r_4228;TD4026E.TXT.r_4229# rnam par mir tog pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa dang  gang ci 'dod pa de la de sbyin pa'i phyir // /
column6: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#544347#544349#TD4026E.TXT.r_4280;TD4026E.TXT.r_4281# don dam shes pa'i phyir bshad do // / +dbul ba 'dor bar byed pas na sbyin pa'o // /
column7: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#546179#546182#TD4026E.TXT.r_4444;TD4026E.TXT.r_4445# phan yon lngar ni yang dag bshad // /
column8: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#546381#546384#TD4026E.TXT.r_4468;TD4026E.TXT.r_4469# zhes bya ba ni mi mjed pa dang  ji mi snyam pa dang  shes pa zhes bya ba'i dbang du byas pa'o // /
column9: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#546425#546428#TD4026E.TXT.r_4474;TD4026E.TXT.r_4475# gnyis po dag gi don byed do // / +zhes bshad pa lta bu'o // /
column10: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#546954#546957#TD4026E.TXT.r_4537# chos thams cad kyi gtso bo ni ting nge 'dzin to zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o // /
column11: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#547058#547061#TD4026E.TXT.r_4547;TD4026E.TXT.r_4548# kun nas nyon mongs shin tu grol // / +shes rab 'tsho ba legs bshad dang / /
column12: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#547229#547232#TD4026E.TXT.r_4565;TD4026E.TXT.r_4566# des ni shes rab kyis 'tsho ba rnams kyi nang na bla na med par 'tsho ba dang  chos yang dag par 'chad par yang byed do // / +chos rnams kyi ni mchog yin te // /
column13: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#547414#547417#TD4026E.TXT.r_4586# gnyis ka ste mnyam par gzhag pa dang  mnyam par ma gzhag pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis kyis bsdus te / /
column14: 0.0#TD4084E.TXT.r#2319031#2319034#TD4084E.TXT.r_454;TD4084E.TXT.r_455;TD4084E.TXT.r_456# bla ma la yon  phul nas ni // / +des ni rtag par bsten par bya // /
column15: 0.0#TD4086E.TXT.r#2321582#2321588#TD4086E.TXT.r_127# yongs su tshim par byas shing yongs su khyab par byas nas bde bar reg pa la gnas so // /
column16: 0.0#TD4086E.TXT.r#2324400#2324402#TD4086E.TXT.r_337# tshangs ris  kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang  tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang  'od chung ba rnams dang  tshad med 'od pa rnams dang  'od gsal ba rnams dang  dge chung ba rnams dang  tshad med dge ba rnams dang  dge rgyas pa rnams dang  sprin med pa rnams  dang  bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang  'bras bu che ba rnams dang  mi che ba rnams dang  mi gdung ba rnams dang  gya nom snang ba rnams dang  shin tu mthong ba rnams dang  'og min gyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no // /
column17: 0.0#TD4086E.TXT.r#2334414#2334417#TD4086E.TXT.r_961# dge slong dag dge slong gang dgra  bcom pa yin zhing zag pa zad pa / /
column18: 0.014#TD4026E.TXT.r#546290#546290#TD4026E.TXT.r_4457# chos la brten pa ni tshul khrims yang dag par len pa dang  thos pa chub pa'o // /

column3: ye shes sems can yongs su gsung bas 'jig rten dag na mi zad bzhag / /

column5: 0.017#TD4086E.TXT.r#2321180#2321180#TD4086E.TXT.r_91;TD4086E.TXT.r_92# gsum gang    gang zhe na / / +sems can 'dod pa nye bar gnas pa dag yod de / /
column6: 0.019#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3112344#3112345#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2159;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2160# gzhan ni gti mug pa'o zhes tha snyad du byed mod kyi / / +don ston par bya ba'i phyir byas so zhes tha snyad du byed de / /
column8: 0.027#TD4043E.TXT.r#662417#662417#TD4043E.TXT.r_1201;TD4043E.TXT.r_1202# lus las gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro // / +che zad pa ni 'dir sa bon de zhes bya ba ni rnam par smin par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de'o // /

column3: rgya che ba dang zang zing med // / +don che ba dang mi zad pa // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#543866#543880#TD4026E.TXT.r_4230;TD4026E.TXT.r_4231;TD4026E.TXT.r_4232# tshul khrims mi mthun phyogs nyams dang / /

column3: sbyin la sogs pa thams cad kyi // / +yon tan bzhir ni shes par bya // /

column3: slong ba mthong rdzogs  dga' ba dang / / +mi dga' ba dang smon pa dang / /

column3: sbyin pa po ni brtser ldan pas // / +lhag par ldan pas rtag zil gnon // /

column3: brtse bas sems can rnams la ni // /

column5: 0.028#TD4086E.TXT.r#2342479#2342479#TD4086E.TXT.r_1511;TD4086E.TXT.r_1512# zheng du yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu / / +mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod la  dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa / /

column3: gzhan gyi sdug bsngal skye bas shin tu 'jigs // /

column6: 0.019#TD4035E.TXT.r#246071#246072#TD4035E.TXT.r_1220# sdom pa can ma yin pa yang ma yin pa rnams dang  'dod chags dang bral ba rnams dang  'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin pa  rnams dang  log pa nyid du nges pa'i phung po rnams dang  yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i phung po rnams dang  ma nges pa nyid du nges pa'i phung po rnams dang  dge slong rnams dang  dge slong ma rnams dang  dge slob ma rnams dang  dge tshul rnams dang  dge tshul ma rnams dang   dge bsnyen rnams dang  dge bsnyen ma rnams dang  spong ba pa rnams dang  kha ton pa rnams dang  zhal ta byed pa rnams dang  gnas brtan rnams dang  bar ma rnams dang  gsar bu rnams dang  slob dpon rnams dang  mkhan po rnams dang  lhan cig  gnas pa rnams dang  nye gnas pa rnams dang  glo bur du lhags pa rnams dang  dge 'dun gyi las byed pa rnams dang  rnyed pa 'dod pa rnams dang  bkur sti 'dod pa rnams dang  yo byad bsnyungs pa rnams dang  mang du thos pa rnams dang  mkhas shing bsod nams  dang ldan pa rnams dang  chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos la zhugs pa rnams dang  mdo sde 'dzin pa rnams dang  'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams dang  ma mo 'dzin pa rnams dang  so so'i skye bo rnams dang  bden pa mthong ba rnams dang  slob pa rnams dang  mi slob pa  rnams dang  nyan thos rnams dang  rang sangs rgyas rnams dang  byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang  de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang  'khor los sgyur ba rnams so // /

column10: 0.023#TD4086E.TXT.r#2345474#2345474#TD4086E.TXT.r_1695# shing rta sna  tshogs tshal dang  rtsub 'gyur tshal dang  'dres pa'i tshal dang  dga' ba'i tshal ji lta ba de bzhin du lha ma yin rnams kyi skyed mos tshal bzhi yang 'di lta ste / /

column12: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#547412#547416#TD4026E.TXT.r_4585;TD4026E.TXT.r_4586# bsam gtan dang  yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi shes rab dag ni mnyam par gzhag pa yin pa'i phyir ro // / +gnyis ka ste mnyam par gzhag pa dang  mnyam par ma gzhag pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis kyis bsdus te / /

column15: 0.0#TD4086E.TXT.r#2324397#2324402#TD4086E.TXT.r_337# tshangs ris  kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang  tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang  'od chung ba rnams dang  tshad med 'od pa rnams dang  'od gsal ba rnams dang  dge chung ba rnams dang  tshad med dge ba rnams dang  dge rgyas pa rnams dang  sprin med pa rnams  dang  bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang  'bras bu che ba rnams dang  mi che ba rnams dang  mi gdung ba rnams dang  gya nom snang ba rnams dang  shin tu mthong ba rnams dang  'og min gyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no // /
column16: 0.0#TD4086E.TXT.r#2334412#2334416#TD4086E.TXT.r_961# dge slong dag dge slong gang dgra  bcom pa yin zhing zag pa zad pa / /

column20: 0.023#TD4026E.TXT.r#546291#546291#TD4026E.TXT.r_4457# chos la brten pa ni tshul khrims yang dag par len pa dang  thos pa chub pa'o // /

column5: 2.980#TD4086E.TXT.r#2328015#2328018#TD4086E.TXT.r_522# tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang  tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang  'od chung ba rnams dang  tshad med 'od pa rnams dang  'od gsal ba  rnams dang  dge chung ba rnams dang  tshad med dge ba rnams dang  dge rgyas pa rnams dang  sprin med pa rnams dang  bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang  'bras bu che ba rnams dang  mi che ba rnams dang  mi gdung ba rnams dang  gya nom snang ba rnams dang  shin tu  mthong ba rnams dang  'og min pa rnams kyang de bzhin no // /

column9: 0.018#TD4064E.TXT.r#760075#760076#TD4064E.TXT.r_120# shes pa dang brjod pa ma gtogs par  don gyi dngos kyi rang gi ngo bo yongs su gcod pa'i thabs gzhan med pas de'i phyir gtso bo'i rang gi ngo bo'i yul la shes pa dang brjod pa med pas don gyi dngos po med par khong du chud par bya'o // /

column9: 0.028#TD4026E.TXT.r#544822#544822#TD4026E.TXT.r_4323;TD4026E.TXT.r_4324# sbyin pa des rjes su bzung ba'i sems can de dag ni de lta ma yin te / / +bsam  pa de lta bu gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa la dga' ba'i bsam pa yin no // /
column10: 0.028#TD4026E.TXT.r#547194#547194#TD4026E.TXT.r_4562;TD4026E.TXT.r_4563# 'jig rten pa dang  'jig rten  las 'das pa dman pa dang  'jig rten las 'das pa chen po'i rab tu rnam par 'byed pa des ni kun nas nyon mongs pa las shin tu rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro // / +shes rab 'tsho ba legs bshad dang / /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#424396#424404#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2100# dang po'i sgrib pa ni 'dod pa'i yul  la dga' ba dang  longs spyod dang bdag nyid kyi bsod nams la yon tan khyad par du 'phags par lta ba ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#544627#544637#TD4026E.TXT.r_4310;TD4026E.TXT.r_4311# pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa bsam pa la brten pa ni rnam pa drug  ste ; / +ngoms mi shes pa'i bsam pa dang  rgya chen po'i bsam pa dang  dga' ba'i bsam pa dang  phan pa'i bsam pa dang  ma gos pa'i bsam pa dang  dge ba'i bsam pa'o // /

column3: sems can yongs smin byed mi 'gyur // /

lo ma 'dor len rkyen rnam gnyis // /

column10: 0.012#TD4026E.TXT.r#539764#539766#TD4026E.TXT.r_3807;TD4026E.TXT.r_3808# ro gcig pas kyang dpyad par bya // / +chos kyi ming ni bsdoms pa'ang 'di // /

column14: 0.020#TD4026E.TXT.r#537535#537537#TD4026E.TXT.r_3582# mthun pa'i yul du gnas pa la sogs pa 'khor lo bzhis bag yod par bya ba ston te / /

column3: med dang 'jig rten 'das pa yod ma yin // /

column10: 0.023#TD4069E.TXT.r#1184032#1184032#TD4069E.TXT.r_5158# bde ba dang  sdug bsngal dang  bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal  yang ma yin pa'o // /
column11: 0.024#TD4027E.TXT.r#1000395#1000395#TD4027E.TXT.r_641;TD4027E.TXT.r_642# 'bras bu dang rgyu'i de kho na ni rtsa ba'i de kho na nyid la sdug bsngal dang  kun 'byung ba dang  'gog pa dang  lam gyi bden pa nyid do // / +ji ltar rtsa ba'i de kho na rnam  pa gsum las sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i bden pa zhes bya zhe na / /

column17: 0.026#TD4036E.TXT.r#62405#62405#TD4036E.TXT.r_5209# rab tu brtson par byed pa ni ji srid du nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag skyed par  mi byed pa de srid du ni las dang po pa yin no // /
column18: 0.026#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2551735#2551735#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_1157# de la cig shos kyis 'di ni re zhig bye brag tu smra ba'i ma yin te zhes bya ba rgyas par smras te 'di ni bye brag tu smra ba'i gzhung lugs ma yin no // /

column7: 0.0#TD4086E.TXT.r#2381665#2381666#TD4086E.TXT.r_4371# 'on kyang bdag cag ni bkres so zhes nas de dag sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma dag gis lcags kyi spyad kyis kha phye nas / /

column10: 1.788#TD4086E.TXT.r#2363747#2363747#TD4086E.TXT.r_2958# gang gi tshe dge ba zhes bya ba rgyal por gyur pa de'i tshe ni mi rnams kyi  ming til las skyes til las skyes zhes bya bar gyur to // /
column11: 0.010#TD4086E.TXT.r#2383629#2383629#TD4086E.TXT.r_4530# nya ni skam la bor ba bzhin // /
column12: 0.011#TD4026E.TXT.r#501678#501679#TD4026E.TXT.r_163# de lta bas na sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin no snyam du sems na / /
column13: 0.011#TD4086E.TXT.r#2344903#2344904#TD4086E.TXT.r_1653# sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po skyed mos tshal du spyad pas srung gi bu zhes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing blta  na sdug la mdzes pa zhig yod do / /

column15: 0.014#TD4035E.TXT.r#258409#258410#TD4035E.TXT.r_2356;TD4035E.TXT.r_2357# rang dbang med par yang gsod pa dang   brdeg pa dang  gnod pa byed pa la lha dang mi rnams kyi yo byad du gyur pa yang yin te / /

column24: 0.021#TD4026E.TXT.r#531566#531566#TD4026E.TXT.r_2996# sbyin pa la sogs pa rnam pa  drug po sbyin pa'i sbyin pa nas shes rab kyi sbyin pa'i bar dang  de bzhin du tshul khrims la sogs pa rnam pa drug la mthu thob pa dang  pha rol tu phyin pa dag kho nas bsdu ba'i dngos po'i sbyor bas sems can yongs su smin pa dang  mchod pa ste / /

column32: 0.023#TD4086E.TXT.r#2342222#2342222#TD4086E.TXT.r_1495;TD4086E.TXT.r_1496# me tog phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog gi phreng ba tha gu la brgyus pa dang  me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te / / +thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang  skad snyan yid du 'ong ba dang  skad mnyen pa dang  'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can  rnams skad snyan par 'byin to // /

column40: 0.028#TD4086E.TXT.r#2356709#2356709#TD4086E.TXT.r_2465# kun tu rab tu 'thul te  dper na rdza mkhan so btang ba des thog ma me btang ba na du ba 'thul zhing rab tu 'thul la kun tu rab tu 'thul ba de bzhin du nyi ma drug pa 'jig rten du byung bas sa chen po 'di dang ri'i rgyal po ri rab la du ba 'thul zhing rab tu 'thul la / /

column6: 0.020#TD4035E.TXT.r#256918#256918#TD4035E.TXT.r_2220;TD4035E.TXT.r_2221# gzhi de las yun ring por sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur te / / +ji srid du sdig pa mi dge ba'i las    thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs su ma zad cing ma byang gi bar du ste / /

column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#547382#547384#TD4026E.TXT.r_4583;TD4026E.TXT.r_4584# sbyin pa dang yang dag par blangs pa'i tshul khrims dag ni mnyam par gzhag pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro // / +mnyam  par bzhag pa ni phyi ma gnyis kyis te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4086E.TXT.r#2334411#2334417#TD4086E.TXT.r_961# dge slong dag dge slong gang dgra  bcom pa yin zhing zag pa zad pa / /
column7: 0.013#TD4026E.TXT.r#547283#547285#TD4026E.TXT.r_4572;TD4026E.TXT.r_4573# shes rab can dag la yod pa'i phyir ro // / +rab tu dbye ba rnam pa gsum gyis 'jug pa ni 'jig rten pa dang  'jig rten las 'das pa dman pa dang  'jig rten las 'das pa chen po'o // /
column8: 0.020#TD4026E.TXT.r#547510#547513#TD4026E.TXT.r_4596# longs spyod la chags pa dang  bshol pa la chags pa dang  de tsam gyis chog par 'dzin pa la chags pa dang  len la re  pa la chags pa dang  rnam par smin pa la chags pa dang  de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs la chags pa'i bag la nyal yang dag par ma bcom pa'i phyir mi mthun pa'i phyogs la chags pa dang  rnam par gyeng ba la chags pa'o // /

column10: 0.025#TD4091E.TXT.r#1358324#1358324#TD4091E.TXT.r_10304;TD4091E.TXT.r_10305# yid myur 'gro ba / / +yid bzhin du myur ba'i phyir te / /

column8: 0.022#TD4086E.TXT.r#2368621#2368621#TD4086E.TXT.r_3319;TD4086E.TXT.r_3320# dpag tshad  brgyad khri ni chu'i 'og gser gyi sa gzhi chen po la brten to // / +dpag tshad khri ni chu las gyen du 'phags so // /
column9: 0.024#TD4026E.TXT.r#501680#501680#TD4026E.TXT.r_163# de lta bas na sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin no snyam du sems na / /
column10: 0.024#TD4037E.TXT.r#2387971#2387971#TD4037E.TXT.r_344;TD4037E.TXT.r_345# gti mug shas che ba dang  ngo tsha med cing khrel med pa shas che ba dang  phrag dog dang ser sna  shas che ba dang  sdug bsngal shas che ba dang  gnas ngan len shas che ba dang  nyon mongs pa shas che ba dang  nyes par spyod pa shas che ba dang  bag med pa shas che ba dang  le lo shas che ba dang  ma dad pa shas che ba rnams kyis nye bar nyon mongs pa mthong ngo // / +mthong     // /
column11: 0.024#TD4099E.TXT.r#224342#224342#TD4099E.TXT.r_3250;TD4099E.TXT.r_3251# kye ma'o shin tu bde bar 'tsho // / +sha khon can gyi mi nang na // /
column12: 0.024#TD4086E.TXT.r#2344902#2344902#TD4086E.TXT.r_1653# sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po skyed mos tshal du spyad pas srung gi bu zhes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing blta  na sdug la mdzes pa zhig yod do / /
column13: 0.024#TD4099E.TXT.r#230975#230976#TD4099E.TXT.r_4083# brgal nas pha rol 'gro bar sems // /
column14: 0.026#TD4035E.TXT.r#236565#236565#TD4035E.TXT.r_372;TD4035E.TXT.r_373# de'i tshe des gang lan mang du goms par byas pa de     // / +ches stobs dang ldan par 'gyur te / /
column15: 0.027#TD4086E.TXT.r#2343028#2343028#TD4086E.TXT.r_1560# skyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal na rdzing bu dga' ba zhes bya ba dang  shing rnams dang  lo ma rnams dang   me tog rnams dang  'bras bu rnams dang  gos rnams dang  rgyan rnams dga' ba dang  lha'i bu mo dga' ba rnams yod la / /
column16: 0.028#TD4086E.TXT.r#2383369#2383369#TD4086E.TXT.r_4502;TD4086E.TXT.r_4503# zhes bya'o // / +drang srong dag dang sdom can dang / /
column17: 0.029#TD4099E.TXT.r#226265#226265#TD4099E.TXT.r_3502;TD4099E.TXT.r_3503# skur pa mi gdab gnod mi bya // / +so sor thar pas bsdam par bya // /
column18: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#451133#451133#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4072;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4073# ci'i phyir  bag la nyal la sogs pas bzlas te ma bstan zhe na / / +sngar bstan pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi nang du bsdus pa'i phyir logs shig tu ma bstan to // /
column19: 0.029#TD4035E.TXT.r#267334#267334#TD4035E.TXT.r_3161;TD4035E.TXT.r_3162;TD4035E.TXT.r_3163# tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid ni / / +rnam pa bzhi ste / / +'dod pa dang chu lon gyis glon pa dang  kun tu mi spyod pa dang  yang dag par shes pa'o // /
column20: 0.029#TD4099E.TXT.r#222999#222999#TD4099E.TXT.r_3066# gang zhig bde ba 'dod pa dag / /
column21: 0.029#TD4099E.TXT.r#226802#226802#TD4099E.TXT.r_3570# gyul ngor glang chen mda' yis bsnun pa bzhin // /

column3: byang chub la gzhol dge la gzhol ba yin // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#547127#547138#TD4026E.TXT.r_4555;TD4026E.TXT.r_4556;TD4026E.TXT.r_4557# shes bya zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa'i bya ba yang dag par rab tu rnam par 'byed pa bsal ba'i phyir ro // / +yang dag  pa zhes bya ba ni log pa ma yin pa'o // /
column5: 1.192#TD4026E.TXT.r#535162#535163#TD4026E.TXT.r_3334# mi dma' ba ni smad kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir ro // /
column6: 1.192#TD4026E.TXT.r#547921#547930#TD4026E.TXT.r_4634;TD4026E.TXT.r_4635;TD4026E.TXT.r_4636# tshul khrims de nyid kyis kyang skye bo thams cad byang chub gsum la bkod // / +tshul khrims ye shes kyis yongs zin pas 'jig     // /
column7: 1.192#TD4026E.TXT.r#548437#548438#TD4026E.TXT.r_4681;TD4026E.TXT.r_4682# sbyin pa po ni brtser ldan pas // /
column8: 1.192#TD4026E.TXT.r#548492#548493#TD4026E.TXT.r_4683# slong ba po'i skye bo la sbyin pa po mthong ba dang  de las ci 'dod pa thob pas yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs pas dga' ba gang yin pa dang  ma mthong ba dang  yongs su ma rdzogs pas  mi dga' ba dang  de mthong ba dang  yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par smon pa skye ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' la dus thams cad du slong ba po mthong ba dang  de'i yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs pa dang  ma mthong ba dang  yongs su ma rdzogs pas lhag par skye  ste ; /
column9: 1.192#TD4035E.TXT.r#260532#260534#TD4035E.TXT.r_2523;TD4035E.TXT.r_2524# srang bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par byas pa dag yod de / / +phyogs bzhin  sgo bzhi bzang zhing sdug la mdzes par byas pa dag yod de / /
column10: 1.192#TD4061E.TXT.r#2763513#2763517#TD4061E.TXT.r_1752;TD4061E.TXT.r_1753# spro ba mi bskyed pa dang    mi smad pa ni gang su dag 'di 'dra ba thams cad ni yang dag pa la zhugs pa dag go zhe'am / / +log pa la zhugs pa dag go zhes bya ba lta bu ste / /
column11: 1.192#TD4061E.TXT.r#2763559#2763562#TD4061E.TXT.r_1756;TD4061E.TXT.r_1757# rigs pa ni tshad ma dang mi 'gal ba'i phyir ro // / +'brel pa ni snga phyi 'brel ba'i phyir ro // /
column12: 1.192#TD4086E.TXT.r#2379675#2379677#TD4086E.TXT.r_4227;TD4086E.TXT.r_4228# de bzhin gang zhig pha ma dang / / +gang zhig bla ma gzhan gsod pa // /
column13: 1.192#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3098345#3098349#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1097;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1098# bram ze lta ba la chags pa dang  zhen pa    dang ; / +'brel pa dang  mngon par 'dod pa dang  yang dag par chags pa'i rgyus rab tu byung ba dang rab tu byung ba rnams lhan cig rtsod par gyur to // /
column14: 0.014#TD4041E.TXT.r#2311915#2311915#TD4041E.TXT.r_994;TD4041E.TXT.r_995# rang gi yongs su gzung bar ma gyur pa gzhan gyi rgyud la yod pa tha ma dang 'bring dang khyad par can la ni nga rgyal gyi rnam pa la brten pas rlom sems su byed do // / +mnyam par  gzhag pa yin pa'i sa pa 'dod pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa la ni gong nas gong du don du gnyer bar byed do // /
column15: 0.014#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3111333#3111333#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2072# de dag mthong nas dge slong mngon par dga' ba dang  brjod pa dang  zhen pa dang  lhag par zhen cing gnas pa dang  yid kyi rnam    par shes par bya ba'i chos mi 'dod pa dang  mi dga' ba dang  mi sdug pa dang  yid du mi 'ong ba dang  'dod par bya ba ma yin pa dang  rab tu dga' bar bya ba ma yin pa dang  sdug bsngal ba dang  nad dang  rjes su mi mthun pa yod de / /
column16: 0.018#TD4026E.TXT.r#548102#548102#TD4026E.TXT.r_4649# ces bya ba ni go cha'i brtson 'grus dang sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus yin no // /
column17: 0.018#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3099929#3099931#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1198;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1199# skye mched 'di dag ni gnyis pa'i  de ma thag mdo'i dum bu rnam par dbye ba las blta bar bya'o // / +rnam par grol ba'i skye mched lnga po zhes bya ba la / /
column18: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#460252#460252#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4677# bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir nam gyi gung thun cha las yongs su mya ngan las 'das she  na ; /
column19: 0.019#TD4026E.TXT.r#540898#540899#TD4026E.TXT.r_3942;TD4026E.TXT.r_3943# rnam par mi rtog pa ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro // /
column20: 0.019#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3099994#3099994#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1204# ji lta ji ltar ston pa'am tshangs par spyod pa bla ma'i gnas lta bu gzhan gang yang rung ba chos ston par byed pa de lta de ltar chos rnams don so so yang dag par rig pa dang  chos so so  yang dag par rig par 'gyur ro // /
column21: 0.026#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3111294#3111294#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2070# bdud kyi 'ching ba las ma grol zhing bdud kyi dbang du gyur pa zhes brjod do // /
column22: 0.027#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3100025#3100025#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1207# yid dga' na lus shin tu sbyangs par 'gyur ro // /
column23: 0.027#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#2991877#2991877#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_8521;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_8522# mnyam par bzhag pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa la ni bsam pa med do // / +mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems ni skal ba mi mnyam pa'i phyir de kun nas slong bar byed pa ma yin na ji ltar de dge ba nyid yin no // /
column24: 0.028#TD4086E.TXT.r#2379768#2379768#TD4086E.TXT.r_4241# ci'i phyir sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa zhes     // /
column25: 0.029#TD4095E.TXT.r#175413#175413#TD4095E.TXT.r_6083# lus kyi ngo bo ni 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa nyid do // /

column3: ji ltar ba de ba gsum gyis tshim pa'i yid // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#547135#547147#TD4026E.TXT.r_4556;TD4026E.TXT.r_4557;TD4026E.TXT.r_4558;TD4026E.TXT.r_4559# yang dag  pa zhes bya ba ni log pa ma yin pa'o // / +ting nge 'dzin la brten pa dang / /

column17: 0.022#TD4047E.TXT.r#2126869#2126869#TD4047E.TXT.r_7368# sdug bsngal gyis gyen spyo ba rnams la nad gyog ge sgo nas grogs byed pa dang  'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i don rnams la thabs mi shes pas rmongs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis gyen spyo ba rnams la spyir chos bstan pa sngon du gtong ba'i rigs pa ston pa dang   sems can so so la bye brag tu thabs bstan pa sngon du gtong ba'i rigs pa ston pa'o // /
column18: 0.024#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3111281#3111281#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2069# bdud sdig can gyis ji ltar dga' mgur byed pa zhes bya'o // /
column19: 0.029#TD4035E.TXT.r#266192#266192#TD4035E.TXT.r_3060# skyes la 'gags su zin kyang rkyen gzhan dang phrad na byed kyi ma phrad na mi byed do // /

column3: brtse ldan yongs su gtong bas dga' 'gyur ba // / +longs  spyod can dag nye bar spyad pa yis // /

column3: de ltar dga' bar 'gyur ba ma yin no // / +bkren la brtse dang ma rungs ba la brtse // /

column3: kun 'khrugs la brtse bag med rnams la brtse // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#547180#547192#TD4026E.TXT.r_4562;TD4026E.TXT.r_4563# 'jig rten pa dang  'jig rten  las 'das pa dman pa dang  'jig rten las 'das pa chen po'i rab tu rnam par 'byed pa des ni kun nas nyon mongs pa las shin tu rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#1036365#1036370#TD4068E.TXT.r_613;TD4068E.TXT.r_614# sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin ba'i tshor ba'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir / /
column6: 1.192#TD4064E.TXT.r#758442#758444#TD4064E.TXT.r_4;TD4064E.TXT.r_5# sum cu pa'i bshad pa / /
column7: 0.018#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1938263#1938264#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2505# sems 'di chags pa yin no zhes bya bar shes kyi gzugs che ge mo zhig la chags so zhes bya bar ni mi shes so // /
column8: 0.018#TD4026E.TXT.r#547921#547924#TD4026E.TXT.r_4634;TD4026E.TXT.r_4635# tshul khrims de nyid kyis kyang skye bo thams cad byang chub gsum la bkod // / +tshul khrims ye shes kyis yongs zin pas 'jig     // /
column9: 0.024#TD4026E.TXT.r#541463#541469#TD4026E.TXT.r_4002;TD4026E.TXT.r_4003# don med rang bzhin bdag lta rnams sbangs  nas ; / /
column10: 0.024#TD4064E.TXT.r#760065#760065#TD4064E.TXT.r_120# shes pa dang brjod pa ma gtogs par  don gyi dngos kyi rang gi ngo bo yongs su gcod pa'i thabs gzhan med pas de'i phyir gtso bo'i rang gi ngo bo'i yul la shes pa dang brjod pa med pas don gyi dngos po med par khong du chud par bya'o // /
column11: 0.027#TD4047E.TXT.r#2135810#2135810#TD4047E.TXT.r_7997# bstan pa'i mjug thogs su dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob pa dang  kha cig ni mngon par ma thob pa dang  kha cig ni dge ba'i chos mang po las nyams te gnas yongs su btang ba ni sems tha dad pa rnams so // /
column12: 0.027#TD4091E.TXT.r#1265815#1265815#TD4091E.TXT.r_1712# stobs chung ba'i phyir sngar skye ba dang  phyis skye ba ni med kyi lhan cig skye ba nyid de / /
column13: 0.027#TD4026E.TXT.r#535260#535260#TD4026E.TXT.r_3343# sems can rnams kyi de dag gi don thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i  phyir ro ; / /
column14: 0.027#TD4026E.TXT.r#540820#540820#TD4026E.TXT.r_3932;TD4026E.TXT.r_3933# 'dzin pa'i rnam par gyeng ba spang // / +'di dag go rims bzhin du ni // /
column15: 0.027#TD4026E.TXT.r#544820#544820#TD4026E.TXT.r_4323# sbyin pa des rjes su bzung ba'i sems can de dag ni de lta ma yin te / /
column16: 0.029#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1957075#1957075#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_4171;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_4172# 'jig rten pa rnams ni sa bcu gcig na yod do // / +'jig rten las 'das pa rnams ni gang na lam yod pa na yod do // /
column17: 0.029#TD4026E.TXT.r#541580#541580#TD4026E.TXT.r_4015;TD4026E.TXT.r_4016# byang chub sems dpa' de las bzlog pa yin // / +rgyal sras sems can rnams la dga' ba dang / /
column18: 0.029#TD4087E.TXT.r#2864022#2864022#TD4087E.TXT.r_3389;TD4087E.TXT.r_3390# de ltar na rtsig pas chod pa 'am / / +brag gis chod pa'am / /
column19: 0.029#TD4068E.TXT.r#1036350#1036350#TD4068E.TXT.r_612# byung ba las zhes bya ba 'di dngos po gang dang phrad par gyur ba las de dang phyis bral bar 'dod cing mi phrad par 'dod pa ni sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba zhes bya'o // /
column20: 0.029#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#2992451#2992451#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_8574# rjes 'jug byed kyang rnam gsum    'gyur ; / /

column3: yul gyi gzhan dbang can la snying rje dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#547189#547207#TD4026E.TXT.r_4562;TD4026E.TXT.r_4563;TD4026E.TXT.r_4564# 'jig rten pa dang  'jig rten  las 'das pa dman pa dang  'jig rten las 'das pa chen po'i rab tu rnam par 'byed pa des ni kun nas nyon mongs pa las shin tu rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.021#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3099712#3099713#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1188# nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs dmar po  kha dog dmar po dmar po lta bur ston pa 'od dmar po 'byung ba 'di lta ste dper na / /
column6: 0.027#TD4026E.TXT.r#544820#544820#TD4026E.TXT.r_4323# sbyin pa des rjes su bzung ba'i sems can de dag ni de lta ma yin te / /
column7: 0.028#TD4026E.TXT.r#545623#545623#TD4026E.TXT.r_4379# sprul pa'i sku yin par blta bar bya ste / /
column8: 0.028#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2587832#2587832#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_3434# yid ni don thams cad la dmigs par bya ba la zhes bya ba smos pa ni rang gi don la dmigs pa dang dbang byed phyir zhes bya ba kho nas grub pa las yid ni don thams cad la dmigs par bya ba la zhes 'byung  ba'i sa pa ni chos thams cad chos kyi khams kyi ngo bo nyid ma yin pa'i phyir te 'di ni gong du rnam par bshad zin to // /

column7: 0.024#TD4086E.TXT.r#2324397#2324397#TD4086E.TXT.r_337# tshangs ris  kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang  tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang  'od chung ba rnams dang  tshad med 'od pa rnams dang  'od gsal ba rnams dang  dge chung ba rnams dang  tshad med dge ba rnams dang  dge rgyas pa rnams dang  sprin med pa rnams  dang  bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang  'bras bu che ba rnams dang  mi che ba rnams dang  mi gdung ba rnams dang  gya nom snang ba rnams dang  shin tu mthong ba rnams dang  'og min gyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no // /

column5: 0.005#TD4007E.TXT.r#757846#757848#TD4007E.TXT.r_182# srid pa'i btson rar 'khyams shing byang chub chen po mi 'thob pa'i rgyu ni rang gis sdig pa'i las bsags pa dang  gzhan gyi dge ba la zhe sdang ba dang  sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa med cing de 'jig rten na mi bzhugs pa dang  smon lam phyin ci log btab pa dang  sangs  rgyas lam gus pa dang  de'i skyabs dang bral ba las yin la / /

column7: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#1051517#1051524#TD4068E.TXT.r_1716# tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs dang de'i gnas kyi phung po 'dis 'khor ba las 'byung zhing mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam thob par byed do zhes 'dzin pa ni 'byung bar yang dag par rjes su lta ba zhes bya ste / /

column9: 1.192#TD4013E.TXT.r#1109131#1109133#TD4013E.TXT.r_1049# spyod pa ni ma lus pa la mchod pa dang  phyag bya ba dang  sdig pa bshags pa dang  rjes su yi rang ba dang  bskul ba dang  gsol ba gdab pa dang  yongs su bsngo ba dang  sems can ma     // /
column10: 1.192#TD4068E.TXT.r#1036733#1036740#TD4068E.TXT.r_639# gzugs kyang 'di ni sngon po nyid yin gyi ser po ni ma yin no zhes bye brag tu 'byed pa ni 'du shes te de bas na khyad par yod do // /

column12: 1.788#TD4013E.TXT.r#1109079#1109084#TD4013E.TXT.r_1047# 'og min pa rnams kyi nang na lha'i rgyal po'i gnas khang ba brtsegs pa shin tu bzang po na bzhugs pa rnams kyi bya dka' ba brgya stong gis rnam par sbyangs pa rnam pa bzhi po me long lta bu dang  mnyam pa nyid dang  so sor rtog pa dang  bya ba sgrub pa zhes bya ba 'khrul pa rnam pa sna  tshogs dang bral ba dri ma med pa rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par gyi rtog pa'i dri ba ma lus pa zad par mdzad pa na skye ba gang yin pa'o // /
column13: 1.788#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1690470#1690475#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4913# sems can rnams kyi sdug  bsngal skye rga na 'chi la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal bzlog par bya ba dang  'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'byor pa thams cad 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir skyabs mdzad do zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column14: 1.788#TD4041E.TXT.r#2310534#2310536#TD4041E.TXT.r_871# rab tu byung ba rnams ni yul nyams su myong ba rjes su dran pa las ni rjes su rtog pa tsam yin la gyo ba kun tu spyod pa las ni spros pa yin gyi / /

column10: 0.029#TD4026E.TXT.r#547784#547784#TD4026E.TXT.r_4624# mi mthun pa'i phyogs la chags pa ni de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi bag la nyal  yang dag par ma bcom pa'i phyir ro // /
